NK045(bi)002:1: // sdud 'grel yum la 'jug pa'i legs bshad las mdo
NK045(bi)002:2: dang bstan bcos sbyar tshul ma pham zhal lung bzhugs
NK045(bi)002:3: so // mnyam pa nyid gyur ye shes sku //
NK045(bi)002:5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bka' //
NK045(bi)002:6: bstan bcos dang sbyar mdo tsam bshad //
NK045(bi)002:7: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)002:8: don mkha' ltar yangs shing rgya che ba dag gi
NK045(bi)002:9: gnad ma lus pa 'dus shing sdud pa'i gzhung yon
NK045(bi)002:10: tan rin po che sdud pa'i 'di shugs bstan mngon
NK045(bi)002:11: par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang sbyar tshul 'phags yul
NK045(bi)002:12: gyi pan grub rnams kyi gzhung mtha' dag gi bcud
NK045(bi)002:13: dril te nyung ngu'i ngag gis brjod na /
NK045(bi)002:14: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)002:15: gzhung gi dngos bstan ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi
NK045(bi)002:16: bar gyi chos thams cad spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang
NK045(bi)002:17: bral ba'i de bzhin nyid du gtan la phab pa
NK045(bi)002:18: yin pas / de dag gi tshul bsdus 'bring rgyas
NK045(bi)002:19: pa'i dbye sgo gsum las brtsams te gzhi lam 'bras
NK045(bi)002:20: bu'i chos thams cad dbu ma'i gtan tshigs kyi sgo
NK045(bi)002:21: nas spros bral du shes par byas nas mthong ba
NK045(bi)002:22: med pa'i don mthong ba la gnas pa med pa'i
NK045(bi)002:23: tshul gyis gnas pa'i sgo nas /
NK045(bi)002:24: thabs shes zung du 'brel ba stong nyid snying rje'i
NK045(bi)002:25: snying po can gyi lam las yongs su dag pa
NK045(bi)002:26: 'bras yum rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)002:27: gang zhig dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam nyid
NK045(bi)002:28: chos sku thob tshul gyis 'chad par bya ba ni
NK045(bi)002:30: da ni gnyis pa lam mngon rtogs dang sbyar ba'i 'chad tshul la /
NK045(bi)002:32: de'i nang gi dbye ba'i don bdun bcur rnam par bzhag pa'i tshul dang mthun par bshad pas /
NK045(bi)002:33: theg pa chen po'i zab cing rgya che ba'i lam
NK045(bi)002:34: gyi rim pa ma lus pa tshang zhing zlos pa
NK045(bi)002:36: rgyal tshab sa bcu'i sems dpa' chen po'i dgongs pa
NK045(bi)002:37: bzhin bka' dang bstan bcos sbyar nas 'chad pa ni
NK045(bi)002:38: 'chad tshul bla na med pa yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:40: thog mar rnam mkhyen mtshon byed kyi chos bcu las sems bskyed la /
NK045(bi)002:41: mdo rgyas pa rnams su mdor bstan dang rgyas bshad
NK045(bi)002:42: kyi rim pas sa mtshams nyer gnyis su yod pa
NK045(bi)002:43: las / 'dir dga' dang gus dang sogs kyis bstan te dga' ba dang ba /
NK045(bi)002:45: dad pa yid ches gsum gyis don du gnyer bya byang chub la dmigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:46: 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don khur du khyer ba'i
NK045(bi)002:47: sgo nas zhugs pa snying rje'i ched du bya ba
NK045(bi)002:48: gzhan don la dmigs pa ste zur gnyis tshang ba'i
NK045(bi)002:49: kun rdzob sems bskyed bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:50: sems bskyed de skye ba'i gegs sgrib pa dang nyon
NK045(bi)002:51: mongs bsal nas zhes pa'i tshogs lam chung ngu nas
NK045(bi)002:52: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du de'i gegs dang bral
NK045(bi)002:53: zhing grogs 'dun pa sogs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)002:54: sgo nas sa lta bu'i sems bskyed la sogs par
NK045(bi)002:55: 'jog pa yin pas gzhan kun kyang don gyis 'dir
NK045(bi)002:57: don du gnyer bya gzhan don dang ched du bya
NK045(bi)002:58: ba sangs rgyas gnyis po de gang gis 'grub par
NK045(bi)002:59: byed pa ni / sher phyin la rag las pas /
NK045(bi)002:60: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam lngar sa
NK045(bi)002:61: mtshams nyer gnyis su gang la spyod pa'i shes rab
NK045(bi)002:62: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mnyan par gyis
NK045(bi)002:64: zhar byung 'bras yum sher phyin mthu dang bcas par /
NK045(bi)002:65: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sogs kyis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:66: gnyis pa gdams ngag la rgyas par rnam grangs bcu las /
NK045(bi)002:67: 'dir gtso bor sgrub pa rang gi ngo bo la 'doms pa'i gdams ngag bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:68: gang la shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig go //
NK045(bi)002:69: de yang 'khor gsum mi dmigs par ston pa'i gdams
NK045(bi)002:70: ngag thos nas don dam rang bzhin med pa la
NK045(bi)002:72: tha snyad snang ba sgyu ma lta bu mi 'gogs pas stong pa nyid la skrag pa med par /
NK045(bi)002:73: bden gnyis zung du chud pa'i sgo nas lam sgrub par gdams pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:74: des gdams ngag gi dmigs yul bden pa bzhi /
NK045(bi)002:77: 'bras bu spyan lnga mngon shes drug /
NK045(bi)002:78: gzhi mthong sgom gyi lam la 'doms pa'i gdams ngag rnams kyang don gyis 'phang ste /
NK045(bi)002:79: dper na byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs zhes pas dge 'dun dkon mchog /
NK045(bi)002:80: byang chub sems mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas /
NK045(bi)002:81: sher phyin mi dmigs pas chos bstan pa la sogs par shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:82: gsum pa nges 'byed yan lag bcu gnyis po 'dir
NK045(bi)002:83: bzhir bsdus nas ngo bo'i sgo nas bstan pa la
NK045(bi)002:84: / dang po drod kyi ye shes gzugs med tshor ba med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:85: gnas pa med par spyod pa'i cha nas btags tsam
NK045(bi)002:86: las gzugs sogs rang gi ngo bo stong pa ni
NK045(bi)002:87: dmigs pa / rnam pa ni yongs su bzung ba'am brjod du med pa'i rnam pa can no //
NK045(bi)002:88: rtse mo ni ji ltar kun tu rgyu ba sogs
NK045(bi)002:89: kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang mtshan mar dmigs pas
NK045(bi)002:90: nyer zhi ma thob nas bstan pa 'di la zhugs
NK045(bi)002:92: gzugs sogs mi dmigs pa'am mtshan mar mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa /
NK045(bi)002:93: de la shes rab kyis yongs su rtogs pa na
NK045(bi)002:94: chos kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad du mi
NK045(bi)002:96: bzod pa yang 'di shes rab sogs /
NK045(bi)002:97: chos thams cad stong par rtogs nas gzung bya'i mtshan ma med par mthong ba dmigs pa /
NK045(bi)002:98: mtshan ma la blo mi rten pa'i tshul gyis mos
NK045(bi)002:99: pa min pa dang 'du shes pa med pa'i rnam
NK045(bi)002:100: pa ni / nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med
NK045(bi)002:101: sogs kyis bstan te zab mo'i don la ma zhum
NK045(bi)002:102: mi skrag par dang por bzod pa thob pa'i skabs
NK045(bi)002:103: 'di byang chub la nye ba'i dang po lta bu'o
NK045(bi)002:104: pa ni / // chos mchog ni gal te mi
NK045(bi)002:105: shes bzhin du sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ldog pa
NK045(bi)002:106: dang sgrub pa'i sgo nas bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:107: bsgom bya gzugs sogs med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:109: bdag spyod ces sgom pa po mi dmigs pa ste
NK045(bi)002:110: gsum po phan tshun stong nyid kyi ngo bor gcig
NK045(bi)002:112: 'dir chos mchog gi skabs su son pas shes rab brtan pa yin zhing /
NK045(bi)002:113: skye med kyi blo dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin rnam pa /
NK045(bi)002:114: des de ma thag tu zhi ba mthong lam la reg ces so //
NK045(bi)002:115: skabs 'dir sbyor lam bzhi'i nang gi chen po bzhi po'i dmigs rnam bstan pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:116: de la sbyor lam gyi dmigs rnams 'di dag la la ngo bo'i cha nas dang /
NK045(bi)002:119: kha cig tu rten ting 'dzin lta bu'i sgo nas bstan kyang /
NK045(bi)002:120: don du drod la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kun tu sher phyin sgom pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:121: spros pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas /
NK045(bi)002:122: 'dzin stangs kyi rnam pa'ang mtha' dang spros pa'i rang bzhin gang yang med pa yin pas na /
NK045(bi)002:123: dgag bya spros pa gang dang gang bcad pa'i cha
NK045(bi)002:124: nas brjod kyang de dang de ltar yin pa'i gnad
NK045(bi)002:125: ma go bar / res 'ga' ba'i 'dzin stangs can
NK045(bi)002:126: du sems pas sher phyin gyi dgongs don zab mo
NK045(bi)002:127: phyogs tsam yang shes par dka' bas 'di gal che'o
NK045(bi)002:128: ma go bar / // des na 'grel pa so
NK045(bi)002:129: so'i sbyar tshul mi 'dra ba phal la don gyis
NK045(bi)002:131: sa mtshams la sbyar ba de mi bde che ba ni gzhung de dag mthong bas gsal lo //
NK045(bi)002:132: de 'dra'i theg chen sbyor lam de dag gis theg
NK045(bi)002:133: pa gsum char gyis rtogs rigs 'thob pa'i rgyu byed
NK045(bi)002:134: pa sogs kyi yon tan brjod pas mjug bsdu ba
NK045(bi)002:135: ni / byang chub sems gang de ltar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:136: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa yin te /
NK045(bi)002:137: rlom pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:138: 'dir lung ston pa dang rlom pa zad pa chos
NK045(bi)002:139: mchog 'bring gi dmigs rnam lta bu yod kyang spyir
NK045(bi)002:140: chos mchog pa la sbyar ba shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:141: theg pa chen po'i rtogs rigs 'di kho nas byed pa'i 'thad pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:142: de ltar spyod na zhes sogs gcig ste spyod med kyi spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:143: spang bya rtog pa la gzung 'dzin gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:144: gzung ba la spang bya kun nyon phyogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:146: de gnyis la 'dzin pa po'am longs spyod pa po
NK045(bi)002:147: gang zag rdzas yod kyis longs spyod snyam pa'i rtog
NK045(bi)002:148: pa dang / rdzas su med kyang brtags pa'i skyes
NK045(bi)002:149: bu tsam longs spyod pa por 'dzin pa ste gnyis
NK045(bi)002:150: su yod pas spyir bzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:151: nang sel kun nyon phyogs la /
NK045(bi)002:152: kun 'byung dang sdug bsngal las phye bas ma rig pa sogs dgu dang /
NK045(bi)002:153: rnam byang phyogs la zag med kyi phung po sogs dgu dang /
NK045(bi)002:155: bdag rang dbang can du 'dzin pa sogs 'dzin stangs kyis yul du byed tshul las dgu dang /
NK045(bi)002:156: kun byang gi chos kyi gdags gzhi la brten nas
NK045(bi)002:157: btags tshul gyis phye ba'i dgu ste rtog pa so
NK045(bi)002:158: drug tu gsungs pa mdo rgyas pa rnams nas 'byung
NK045(bi)002:159: ste / 'di dag bden grub tu 'dzin pa ni rjes thob nges pa'i ngor yang ldog la /
NK045(bi)002:160: btags pa tsam du'ang zhen pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni mnyam bzhag gi stobs kyis ldog pas na /
NK045(bi)002:161: sbyor lam gyi rtogs pas spang bya de dag mngon gyur nyams smad par byed pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:162: skabs 'dir kun byang gi gzung rtog spong ba bsdus nas /
NK045(bi)002:163: gang zhig yod pa ma yin sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:164: kun byang gi gzung ba gang zhig don dam dpyod
NK045(bi)002:165: byed kyi rigs pas bden pa'am rdzas su yod pa
NK045(bi)002:166: ma yin te de ni med ces bya ste lung
NK045(bi)002:167: dang rigs pas grub pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:168: de ltar byis pa rnams kyis chos de dag la
NK045(bi)002:169: brtags nas tha snyad btags tsam du yod pa dang
NK045(bi)002:170: / bden grub tu med par 'dzin par byed de /
NK045(bi)002:171: yang dag pa'i gnas lugs kyi don du btags pas yod pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:172: bden par med pa 'di gnyis kyang med pa'i chos yin te /
NK045(bi)002:173: gnyis ka rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa tsam du
NK045(bi)002:174: mgo mnyam ste de gnyis ka yang dpyad mi bzod
NK045(bi)002:175: pa'i phyir ro // des na byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)002:176: gang gis tshul 'di ltar kun rdzob tu yod pa
NK045(bi)002:177: pa'i phyir ro // dang / don dam par med
NK045(bi)002:178: pa lta bu'i spros pa phyogs re ba'i dmigs pa
NK045(bi)002:179: mtha' dag dang bral ba'i chos dbyings brjod bral gyi
NK045(bi)002:180: gnas lugs 'di shes na srid zhi'i mtha' gnyis las
NK045(bi)002:181: nges par 'byung ste mi gnas pa'i myang 'das thob
NK045(bi)002:182: pa'i phyir ro // dang / par byed do // zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:184: gang 'dir phung po lnga dang sogs te /
NK045(bi)002:185: kun byang la longs spyod pa po ni phung po lnga tsam yin la /
NK045(bi)002:186: de ni sgyu ma dang khyad med pas rdzas su med par bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:187: gdags gzhi'i cha nas btags pa'i btags yod du 'dzin
NK045(bi)002:188: pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes bral zhing nye bar
NK045(bi)002:189: zhi ba la spyod pa zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:190: yongs 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
NK045(bi)002:191: dge ba'i bshes dang sogs kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:192: bzhi pa sgrub pa'i rten chos dbyings rang bzhin gnas rigs ni /
NK045(bi)002:193: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra don las brtsams te /
NK045(bi)002:194: ci phyir 'di ni sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:195: mdo rgyas par drod nas ye shes rtsol ba mi
NK045(bi)002:196: mnga' bar 'jug pa'i bar gyis rten chos sgrub pa
NK045(bi)002:197: bcu gsum po'i rten du gyur pa'i chos dbyings bstan
NK045(bi)002:198: kyang / 'dir drod nas ye shes rtsol ba mi
NK045(bi)002:199: mnga' ba'i bar du chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la
NK045(bi)002:201: dngos zhen gyi chags pa rim bzhin gcod par byed cing /
NK045(bi)002:202: mthar shes bya'i chos kun la chags pa drung nas
NK045(bi)002:203: zad pa sangs rgyas kyi sar 'phen pa'ang rten chos
NK045(bi)002:204: dbyings nyid rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i rigs las yin
NK045(bi)002:205: te / de bzhin nyid gnas lugs su ye nas yod pa yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:206: de la dmigs nas sgrib pa spong bar grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:207: lnga pa sgrub pa'i dmigs pa ni spyir blang dor
NK045(bi)002:208: btang snyoms su bya ba'i chos kun la dmigs dgos
NK045(bi)002:209: la khyad par theg chen gyi lam 'bras la dmigs
NK045(bi)002:210: dgos shing / de yang mdo rgyas par rnam grangs bcu gcig gsungs pa'ang /
NK045(bi)002:211: 'dir rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:212: dmigs pa bcu gcig gi tha ma thub pa'i thun
NK045(bi)002:213: mongs min pa rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags
NK045(bi)002:214: thogs med pa'i ye shes la dmigs par bstan zhing
NK045(bi)002:215: / de sgrub pa la blang dor du bya ba
NK045(bi)002:216: dge sdig lung ma bstan dang zag bcas zag med
NK045(bi)002:218: thun min thub pa'i ye shes ni shes bya'i chos
NK045(bi)002:219: kun gyi nang na dam pa bla na med par
NK045(bi)002:220: shes nas / de sgrub pa'i tshul la dmigs pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:221: drug pa sgrub pas ched du bya ba ste /
NK045(bi)002:222: thob bya gang gi phyir yin pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:223: mthar thug gi sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'am sems chen po dang /
NK045(bi)002:225: rtogs pa chen po gsum yin la /
NK045(bi)002:226: de ni ci phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:227: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa'i sde dang ris
NK045(bi)002:228: chen po'i mchog tu gyur pa'i sems chen po dang
NK045(bi)002:229: lta ba'i d+r+wa ba thams cad gcod pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)002:231: des spang bya mtha' dag spangs pa shugs la bstan pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:232: bdun pa bsam pa go cha'i sgrub pa la rgyas
NK045(bi)002:233: par phar phyin re re yang drug ldan du bsgrub
NK045(bi)002:234: pa'i go cha'i sgo nas phyogs dus kyis chas dpag
NK045(bi)002:235: par dka' ba'i go char gyur pa yin pas so
NK045(bi)002:236: drug gi tshul du bshad kyang 'dir gtong ba sbyin
NK045(bi)002:238: mthus phar phyin gzhan bzhi bsdus te /
NK045(bi)002:239: re re yang drug ldan du bsgrub pa'i go cha'i sgo nas sbyin pa phra mo gcig byin kyang /
NK045(bi)002:240: rang don dang dman lam yid byed dang mtshan mar
NK045(bi)002:241: 'dzin pa sogs mi mthun phyogs kyi dri ma dang
NK045(bi)002:242: bral zhing / phan yon gyi khyad par phyogs dus
NK045(bi)002:243: kyi mu bzhin du dpag par dka' ba'i ngang tshul
NK045(bi)002:244: du gyur pas na che ba'i sgra yis khyad par
NK045(bi)002:247: gtong ba che ba sbyin pa /
NK045(bi)002:248: 'chal tshul spong ba'i sems pa blo che ba tshul khrims /
NK045(bi)002:250: theg chen la zhugs pa brtson 'grus /
NK045(bi)002:251: g.yeng bas mi tshugs pa'i go cha bgos pa bsam gtan /
NK045(bi)002:252: bdud kyi sgyu 'dul ba shes rab tu'ang bshad /
NK045(bi)002:253: yang gtong ba che dang sogs tshigs bcad 'di go
NK045(bi)002:254: sgrub sogs phyi ma bzhi po thun mong du mdor
NK045(bi)002:255: bstan yin par yang bshad pa sogs sna tshogs snang
NK045(bi)002:256: ngo // brgyad pa 'jug sgrub ni go cha de
NK045(bi)002:257: lta bu dang ldan pa'i sgo nas theg chen gyi
NK045(bi)002:258: lam dang 'bras bus bsdus pa'i chos kun la 'jug
NK045(bi)002:259: ngo // pa yin zhing / mdo rgyas par dgur gsungs kyang 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:260: dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:261: dang po go cha dang bsgrub pa'i dpe thun mong bar yang 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:262: sgyu ma'i dpe bzhin du rang bzhin ma grub par
NK045(bi)002:263: shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub chen po'i lam dang
NK045(bi)002:264: 'bras bu la mi ldog par zhugs nas rdzogs smin
NK045(bi)002:265: sbyang ba mthar phyin par sgrub pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:266: de yang lam gyi ngo bo theg pa chen po'i mthong sgom la 'jug pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:267: rten zhi gnas sam bsam gzugs /
NK045(bi)002:268: lhag mthong gi char gyur ba mnyam bzhag dmigs med dang /
NK045(bi)002:270: nyams len sbyin sogs phar phyin drug /
NK045(bi)002:271: grogs byams sogs tshad med bzhi /
NK045(bi)002:272: mthu mngon par shes pa drug /
NK045(bi)002:273: ched du bya ba chen po gsum dang /
NK045(bi)002:274: 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:275: de dag la mi zhum par 'jug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:276: dgu pa tshogs sgrub ni spyir byang chub sems dpas
NK045(bi)002:277: lam la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa tshad med pa'i sgo
NK045(bi)002:278: nas tshogs pa mtha' yas pa bsags par byas te
NK045(bi)002:279: / de'i dbang gis mtha' gnyis las nges par 'byung
NK045(bi)002:280: ba mi gnas pa'i myang 'das su 'grub pa yin
NK045(bi)002:281: / la / tshogs tshad med pa de dag kyang
NK045(bi)002:282: spyi rigs nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
NK045(bi)002:284: nang gi dbye ba shin tu mang yang mdo rgyas
NK045(bi)002:285: pa rnams su tshogs sgrub bcu bdun du bstan pa
NK045(bi)002:286: 'dir ni / ci phyir 'di ni byang chub theg chen sogs tshigs bcad gcig gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:287: rang zab rgyas kyi theg chen la gnas nas gzhan
NK045(bi)002:288: mya ngan las zlo ba'i tshul la 'jug pa la
NK045(bi)002:289: tshogs mtha' yas pa 'du bas de ltar gsungs la
NK045(bi)002:290: / der yang tshogs sgrub bcu bdun de don gyis 'phang ste /
NK045(bi)002:291: de gang zhes pa theg pa chen po'i lam phar phyin drug la /
NK045(bi)002:292: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang de gnyis zung 'brel dang gsum gyi sgo nas slob pa'am zhon nas /
NK045(bi)002:293: brtse ba snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad mya ngan las zlo ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:294: de yang thabs mkhas dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis 'grub la /
NK045(bi)002:295: theg pa de yi rang bzhin la zab mo mkha'
NK045(bi)002:296: 'dra stong nyid nyi shu po sgom pa'i yul can
NK045(bi)002:298: gzhal med khang 'dra ba bsod nams dang gzugs kyi gter tshad med pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:299: bsod nams ni spyir dge ba'i las thams cad yin kyang /
NK045(bi)002:300: 'dir zag med kyi dge ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:301: de las khyad par du dpa' bar 'gro ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:302: rin chen phyag rgya la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mdo nas gsungs pa rnams te /
NK045(bi)002:303: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'di dag gi stobs
NK045(bi)002:304: las bsod nams tshad dpag tu med pa skad cig
NK045(bi)002:305: re res kyang tshegs med par 'grub pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)002:306: // dga' ba zag med lam lnga /
NK045(bi)002:307: gtan du skyed pa sa bcu bde ba gzung 'dzin
NK045(bi)002:308: gyi rtog pa rnams las nges par 'byung bar byed
NK045(bi)002:309: pa'i gnyen po'i tshogs sgrub ste mthong sgom gyi lam
NK045(bi)002:310: na gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa bzhi po kun brtags
NK045(bi)002:311: dang lhan skyes spong ba'i bar chad med lam brgyad
NK045(bi)002:312: du bstan pa lta bu rnams bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:313: mdo rgyas pa rnams las sa'i tshogs bye brag tu
NK045(bi)002:314: bstan pa yongs sbyong dang gnyen po'i tshogs bye brag
NK045(bi)002:315: tu bstan par mdzad pa ni rtogs dka' ba bye
NK045(bi)002:316: brag tu bshad pa tsam las don gong du 'dus
NK045(bi)002:317: so // bcu pa nges 'byung sgrub pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:318: gong du bshad pa'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa
NK045(bi)002:319: dgu po mthar phyin par bsgrub pa la brten nas
NK045(bi)002:320: / mthar thug gi 'byung sa brgyad du nges par
NK045(bi)002:321: 'byung ba la nges 'byung sgrub pa zhes bya ste
NK045(bi)002:322: byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa khyad par can gyis
NK045(bi)002:323: / ni / mthar 'bras mi gnas pa'i myang 'das
NK045(bi)002:324: la sgrib pa'i phyogs kun las 'das nas 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:325: byang chub chen por nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)002:326: / ni / // de yang mthar thug gi nges
NK045(bi)002:327: par 'byung sa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa yin la
NK045(bi)002:328: / ni / // / de la bar chad med lam rdor ting dang /
NK045(bi)002:329: rnam grol lam la yon tan gyi cha nas bdun du phye ba ste brgyad po der 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)002:331: gang zhig zhon nas sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:332: de la ched du bya ba chen po gsum ni thob bya mthar thug yin pas spyir bstan /
NK045(bi)002:333: de las bye brag tu sems chen po'i khyad par gsum ste /
NK045(bi)002:334: shes rab mthar phyin pas chos kun mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pa las mi g.yo ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:335: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po yongs su
NK045(bi)002:336: smin pas phyogs dus kun tu sems can gyi don
NK045(bi)002:337: mtha' yas par mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:338: de yang g.yo rtsol gyi 'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa dang gsum mo //
NK045(bi)002:339: spang pa chen po'i khyad par gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:340: rtag chad dam srid zhi'i mtha' las 'das par nges 'byung dang /
NK045(bi)002:341: theg gsum gyi spangs rtogs kyi rigs thams cad thob
NK045(bi)002:342: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi nges 'byung ste spangs pa
NK045(bi)002:344: rtogs pa chen po'i khyad par gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:345: sems bskyed sogs chos bcus mtshon pa shes bya'i rnam
NK045(bi)002:346: pa thams cad mngon sum mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang
NK045(bi)002:347: / de la bar ma chad du sbyor nus pa
NK045(bi)002:348: rgyun mtha'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sangs
NK045(bi)002:349: rgyas kyi bar chad med lam ni lam gyi yul
NK045(bi)002:351: de rnams mdo rgyas par le'u bcu bzhi pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:352: de ltar brgyad du yod pa'i ched du bya ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:353: lam gyi theg pa gang zhig la zhon nas ched
NK045(bi)002:354: du bya ba chen po gsum dang ldan pa 'bras
NK045(bi)002:355: bu mi gnas pa'i myang 'das su 'gro ba yang
NK045(bi)002:356: don dam par mi dmigs zhes pas bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:357: rgyu des de ni mya ngan 'das zhes pas srid
NK045(bi)002:358: zhi'i mtha' las nges 'byung bstan thob pa'i mtshan nyid
NK045(bi)002:359: nges 'byung la / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
NK045(bi)002:360: mtha' dang sogs kyis thob pa po mi dmigs pa
NK045(bi)002:361: gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin zhes pas
NK045(bi)002:362: thob bya dngos por mi dmigs pa /
NK045(bi)002:363: thob pa'i ngo bo spros med de sogs kyis bstan
NK045(bi)002:364: te don dam par thob pa med pa'i cha nas
NK045(bi)002:365: bstan pa dngos bstan stong nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:366: tha snyad du thob pa ni mngon rtogs kyi rim par sbyar ro //
NK045(bi)002:367: sems can don gyi nges 'byung ni /
NK045(bi)002:368: byang chub sems mkhas rig sogs tshigs bcad gcig /
NK045(bi)002:369: 'bad med nges 'byung ni ldog pa'am spang ba'i sgo nas bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:370: gal te sems can 'du shes sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis so //
NK045(bi)002:371: de yang bdag gzhan du rtog pa sogs spros pa
NK045(bi)002:372: ma lus pa nye bar zhi bas 'bad rtsol gyi
NK045(bi)002:373: g.yo ba mi srid par bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:375: bdag ci 'dra bar sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:376: bdag nyid chos sku mnyam pa nyid thob pa de
NK045(bi)002:377: bzhin chos thams cad dang chos nyid ro mnyam par
NK045(bi)002:378: gzigs pa ste / chos kun gyi gnas lugs de
NK045(bi)002:379: bzhin nyid gzigs pa la sgrib pa'i rab rib phra
NK045(bi)002:380: mo yang mi mnga' ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)002:381: gzigs pa ste / phyir / gnas snang rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:382: kun tu mtshungs dgos la gnas tshul mnyam pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:384: des na chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
NK045(bi)002:385: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bdag nyid du
NK045(bi)002:386: gzigs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa thun mong
NK045(bi)002:387: min pa ste / de dag mdo dang bstan bcos
NK045(bi)002:388: nas ches gsal bar gsungs pa'i gnad gal po che
NK045(bi)002:389: min pa ste / yin no // lam gyi yul can ni /
NK045(bi)002:390: 'jig rten dag na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:391: chos thams cad dmigs nas de kun la skye 'gags
NK045(bi)002:392: med par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pa'i rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:393: can no // ngo bo rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK045(bi)002:394: ye shes 'chi ba med pa ste rtogs pas mi
NK045(bi)002:395: 'chi ba'am mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting
NK045(bi)002:396: can no // 'dzin no // slob lam na dam
NK045(bi)002:397: pa de las gzhan med pa de thob ces so
NK045(bi)002:399: ni zhes pa'i 'bras bu'i sher phyin zhes bya'o zhes
NK045(bi)002:400: can no // 'dzin no // // so // mnyam nyid nges 'byung ni /
NK045(bi)002:401: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:402: da ni skabs gnyis pa theg pa gsum gyi lam
NK045(bi)002:403: shes par bya ba la de mtshon byed chos bcu
NK045(bi)002:404: gcig yod pa'i thog ma lam shes skye ba'i rten
NK045(bi)002:405: bstan pa la mdo rgyas pa rnams su mdo lngar
NK045(bi)002:406: mdzad kyang 'dir rten shugs la bstan pa las dngos
NK045(bi)002:407: su med / gnyis pa nyan thos kyi lam shes
NK045(bi)002:408: ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rnam pa mi
NK045(bi)002:410: de yang dro ba sogs sbyor lam bzhi'i rnam pa nas bstan par mdzad pas /
NK045(bi)002:411: mdor na dngos su gsungs pa ni dmigs med spros
NK045(bi)002:412: pa dang bral ba'i theg chen gyi lam yin kyang
NK045(bi)002:413: / des shugs bstan nyan thos kyi lam de'ang de'i rigs can gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i ched dang /
NK045(bi)002:414: byang sems rang nyid kyis shes mthong gis bltas nas
NK045(bi)002:415: 'da' bar bya ba'i ched du shes par bya ba
NK045(bi)002:416: yin no // de la mdo rgyas pa las gzugs
NK045(bi)002:417: sogs kyi stong pa tha dad du dbyer med par
NK045(bi)002:418: bstan pas nyan thos kyi dro ba /
NK045(bi)002:419: gzugs sogs mi dmigs par bstan pas rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:420: gzugs sogs de la rtag mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa bkag pas bzod pa /
NK045(bi)002:421: sa bcu las brtsams te mi gnas pa'i tshul rgyas par brjod pas chos mchog mtshon pa yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:423: gang zhig gzugs la sogs pas bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:424: phung po lnga stong pa'i phyir de la mi gnas pa dro ba'i ye shes dang /
NK045(bi)002:425: chos nyid gnas pa zhes pas mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can rtse mo bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:426: dgag phyogs nas mi dmigs pa zhes dang /
NK045(bi)002:427: sgrub phyogs nas chos nyid la gnas pa don gcig tu grub pas so //
NK045(bi)002:428: rtag dang mi rtag sogs kyis bzod pa bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:429: 'dis mtshon nas sgro 'dogs so gnyis dang bral bar shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:430: 'bras bu thob dang sogs kyis chos mchog bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:431: rgyas par sa bcu las brtsams te bstan kyang 'dir 'phags pa bzhi'i sar bsdus nas bstan pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:432: gsum pa rang rgyal gyi lam shes pa'i lam shes la /
NK045(bi)002:433: rang gis rten 'brel gyi don ji ltar rtogs tshul /
NK045(bi)002:434: gzhan la chos ji ltar ston tshul /
NK045(bi)002:436: lam dngos bshad pa bzhi las /
NK045(bi)002:437: dang po gzhan gyis bstan pa med par rang byung
NK045(bi)002:438: gi tshul gyis rten 'brel zab mo'i don khong du
NK045(bi)002:439: chud pa shugs la ston byed kyi mdo ni /
NK045(bi)002:440: ji ltar 'dren pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:441: sangs rgyas kyi thugs dmigs pa'i rnam pa gang la'ang
NK045(bi)002:442: mi gnas pa yin pas de'i ye shes ni dmigs
NK045(bi)002:443: rkyen las skye ba min te /
NK045(bi)002:444: rang byung gi ye shes so //
NK045(bi)002:445: des shugs kyis mtshon pa rang rgyal gyi bdag med
NK045(bi)002:446: phyed gnyis rtogs pa'i ye shes kyang gzhan gyis bstan
NK045(bi)002:447: pa'i rgyu med kyang rang gis mngon du rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:448: bstan / 'o na rang rgyal de'i ye shes rgyu
NK045(bi)002:449: med du 'gyur snyam na de'i dogs pa bsal ba'am
NK045(bi)002:450: bstan / / spyir rang byung gi ye shes yin
NK045(bi)002:451: na de la rgyu med pas lam gyis sgrub tu
NK045(bi)002:452: bstan / / mi rung ba'am / yang na lam ma goms kyang mngon du 'gyur ro snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:453: dmigs pa mtha' dag zhi ba'i ye shes de lta
NK045(bi)002:454: bu ni zab mo'i don la bzod pa'i lam sher
NK045(bi)002:455: phyin 'di la ma brten par mngon du mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:456: te / glo bur ba'i dri mas bsgribs nas mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:457: chos nyid de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med par gshegs
NK045(bi)002:458: pa'i rang byung gi ye shes mthar thug pa lta
NK045(bi)002:459: ci smos / theg pa dman pa'i lam gyis thob
NK045(bi)002:460: pa'i de bzhin nyid sgrib pa ci rigs pas dag
NK045(bi)002:461: ci smos / pa'am / dngos por lta ba bcad
NK045(bi)002:462: pa'i stong pa nyi tse ba'i don la bzod pa'am
NK045(bi)002:463: blos lcogs pa'i sher phyin gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:464: mthus yin par bstan pas na /
NK045(bi)002:465: rang rgyal la'ang bdag med phyed gnyis la sngon goms
NK045(bi)002:466: pa'i rgyus srid pa tha ma gyur pa na gzhan
NK045(bi)002:467: gyis bstan pa med kyang de ltar rtogs pa 'thad
NK045(bi)002:468: par don gyis bstan par mdzad do //
NK045(bi)002:469: gnyis pa des sgra med lus kyis chos ston tshul ston pa mdo 'dir med /
NK045(bi)002:470: gsum pa de'i lam gyi khyad par ni /
NK045(bi)002:471: gzung don gyi rtog pa spangs la 'dzin pa ma spangs pas /
NK045(bi)002:472: nyan thos las 'phags la theg chen gyi rtogs rigs
NK045(bi)002:473: las dman pa'i dbang po 'bring du gyur pa'i rten
NK045(bi)002:474: nam rigs can gyi lam mngon par rtogs pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:475: de las gzung ba ma grub pa dang 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:476: grub par 'dzin pa'i lam mngon rtogs shugs la 'phen
NK045(bi)002:478: chos 'chad pa dang sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:479: ji ltar rmi lam dang sgyu ma'i snang ba la /
NK045(bi)002:480: snang yul de ngo bos ma grub kyang 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:481: la der snang mi khegs pa ltar gzung ba med
NK045(bi)002:482: la 'dzin pa yod par 'dod pa'i rtogs rigs de
NK045(bi)002:485: gang zag bzhi po sogs kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:486: dngos bstan stong nyid la mi skrag pa'i gang zag bzhi bshad pas /
NK045(bi)002:487: gzung ba rang bzhin med pa dang gang zag gi
NK045(bi)002:488: bdag med la mi skrag pa'i rang rgyal kyang 'phang
NK045(bi)002:489: ba'o // bzhi pa lam dngos la rang rgyal gyi
NK045(bi)002:490: sbyor lam bzhi shugs la 'phen byed kyi skabs bzhi
NK045(bi)002:491: ba'o // ni / yum rgyas pa rnams su btags
NK045(bi)002:492: pa'i tshul mi 'dor la chos nyid dang mi 'gal
NK045(bi)002:493: bar ston pa'i rnam pas dro ba mtshon par mdzad
NK045(bi)002:494: ba'o // ni / pa skabs 'dir / byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig ces sogs kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:495: tha snyad btags pa tsam gyi sgo nas chos ston
NK045(bi)002:496: pa la mkhas shing de ltar btags nas bstan kyang
NK045(bi)002:497: don dam par brjod du med pa'i chos nyid rig
NK045(bi)002:498: pa des chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur bar
NK045(bi)002:499: chos ston pa la spyod pa zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:500: gzugs sogs 'phel 'grib med par rtogs pa'i rnam pa rtse mo ni /
NK045(bi)002:501: gzugs 'phel yongs su nyams dang sogs rkang pa gcig gis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:502: nang stong ba nyid la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)002:503: gzugs sogs la der mi 'dzin pas bzod pa bstan
NK045(bi)002:504: pa ni 'dir / chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su gzung phyir mi slob par /
NK045(bi)002:505: slob cing zhes pas bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:506: phyi dang nang sogs chos sna tshogs su 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:507: bzlog pa'i don du stong nyid bco brgyad bstan pa
NK045(bi)002:508: lta bu ste / tshul de lta bu'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)002:509: chos sna tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob
NK045(bi)002:510: lta bu ste / pa'am / yongs su mi gzung ba'am mi dmigs par slob par bstan pas so //
NK045(bi)002:511: chos mchog ni skye med kyi rnam pa can gyi
NK045(bi)002:512: tshig gis mdo rgyas pa rnams su bstan par mdzad
NK045(bi)002:513: kyang 'dir ni / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la /
NK045(bi)002:515: bsam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su 'dzin la /
NK045(bi)002:516: skye med du mthong ba'i rnam can chos mchog gi
NK045(bi)002:517: ye shes de'i nus pas 'das lam du nges par
NK045(bi)002:518: 'byung ba'o // da ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mthong sgom gnyis las /
NK045(bi)002:519: dang po lam shes mtshon byed kyi chos bzhi pa
NK045(bi)002:520: byang sems kyi mthong lam bzod shes skad cig ma
NK045(bi)002:521: bcu drug gi tshul du mdo gzhan na bstan kyang
NK045(bi)002:522: 'dir bden bzhi mngon sum mthong ba'i ye shes bzhir
NK045(bi)002:523: bstan te / de yang rgyas pa ltar na chos
NK045(bi)002:524: bzod bzhi'i ye shes mtshon pa'i mdo bzhi tsam 'dir
NK045(bi)002:525: bstan te / bstan pa ni / dang po gzugs
NK045(bi)002:526: sogs kyi de bzhin nyid yul dang de'i yul can
NK045(bi)002:527: sher phyin ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:528: de gnyis phan tshun rten brten par dpyad na ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:529: yul yul can gcig tha dad sogs kyis rnam grangs
NK045(bi)002:530: khas mi len pa ste de ltar mthong ba'i ye
NK045(bi)002:531: shes des sdug bsngal chos bzod mtshon no //
NK045(bi)002:533: gzugs ni shes rab ma yin sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:534: sdug bden gyi mtshan gzhi gzugs dang gzhi sher phyin gcig tha dad gang yang min pa sogs kyis /
NK045(bi)002:535: de bzhin nyid dang chos can rnams gnyis dang gcig
NK045(bi)002:536: gi tshul du med pas chos thams cad ye nas
NK045(bi)002:537: mnyam nyid nam mkha'i tshul du rnam grangs kyis ris
NK045(bi)002:538: su bcad du med par gnas pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:539: de'i shugs kyis gzhan gsum 'phang ngo //
NK045(bi)002:540: kun 'byung gi gzhi las dang po mtha' med pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:541: dmigs pa rnams kyis rang bzhin sogs kyis bstan te mtha' dmigs su med pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:542: de yang kun 'byung ba zag bcas kyi rgyur gyur pa gzugs sogs gzung ba dmigs pa rnams dang /
NK045(bi)002:544: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)002:545: de'i yul can 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes rab pha mtha' med par rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
NK045(bi)002:546: de ltar rtogs pa'i byed las las gzugs sogs sangs
NK045(bi)002:547: rgyas su nges par 'dzin pa blang dor med pa
NK045(bi)002:548: / byams sogs bsgom pa 'byongs pa rnams 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)002:549: 'gogs pa bzhi las stong nyid kyi rnam pa ni 'du shes tshu rol sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:550: de yang stong pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams 'gogs
NK045(bi)002:551: pa ma yin gyis dngos po la med bzhin 'du
NK045(bi)002:552: shes sna tshogs kyis dmigs par byas pa ni tshu
NK045(bi)002:554: yul rang bzhin med par mthong bas der zhen gyi
NK045(bi)002:555: 'du shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba'am 'gog pa
NK045(bi)002:556: de pha rol myang 'das kyi sar phyin nas ston
NK045(bi)002:557: pa'i bka' la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:558: de ltar chos kun ye nas stong pa 'gog pa
NK045(bi)002:559: yang dag pa'i mtha' la dmigs pa ni 'gogs bden
NK045(bi)002:561: de las sangs rgyas thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:562: gnyen po rnam byang kun der 'du ba /
NK045(bi)002:563: 'tshe ba kun zhi ba thob pa gsum des thob pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:564: lam gyi gzhi las myang 'das la der zhen zhi ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:565: gal te ston pas sogs kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:566: sems can gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa yin gyi /
NK045(bi)002:567: thob pa po ma grub pa sogs kyis na don
NK045(bi)002:568: dam par myang 'das thob pa mi dmigs par rtogs
NK045(bi)002:569: pa'i ye shes ni lam bden gyi chos nyid mthong
NK045(bi)002:571: de'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung skyob sba ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:572: rang rnam mkhyen gyi lam la gnas nas gzhan der 'god pa /
NK045(bi)002:573: sbyin sogs rdzogs byang du bsngo ba yin no //
NK045(bi)002:574: de ltar na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
NK045(bi)002:575: mthong ba'i ye shes des bden pa bzhi'i chos nyid
NK045(bi)002:576: ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa yin pas na
NK045(bi)002:577: / sa dang rnam pa'i sgo nas bcu drug tu
NK045(bi)002:578: phye yang gnad gcig la kha cig tu yon tan
NK045(bi)002:579: gyi cha nas bstan par yang mdzad mod don 'dir
NK045(bi)002:581: gnyis pa theg chen sgom lam la /
NK045(bi)002:582: sgom lam gyi byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:584: dngos la zag bcas sgom lam rjes thob kyi skabs dang /
NK045(bi)002:585: zag med sgom lam mnyam bzhag gi skabs gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:586: 'di gnyis la ye shes zhabs kyis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes dang /
NK045(bi)002:587: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes zhes rnam bzhag mdzad do //
NK045(bi)002:588: dang po la mos bsngo yi rang gsum /
NK045(bi)002:589: mos pa la dngos dang de yi phan yon bstod bkur basngagasa gsum /
NK045(bi)002:590: zag med la sgrub pa sgom lam mnyam bzhag gi ngo bo dang /
NK045(bi)002:591: rnam dag sgom lam rnam grol lam gnyis su yod pa spyir btang nas /
NK045(bi)002:592: da ni lnga pa sgom lam byed pa la spyir
NK045(bi)002:593: sgom lam gyi byed pa tshad med kyang yum gzhan
NK045(bi)002:594: las drug tu gsungs pa de dag gi nang nas
NK045(bi)002:595: skabs 'dir / bla med byang chub thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:596: gnod pas mi bardzi ba gnyis bstan te gzhan bzhi don gyis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:597: de dag ni gang tshe nga ni zhes dang /
NK045(bi)002:598: shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la sogs sho lo ka re res bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:599: drug pa mos pa la mdor rgyas par /
NK045(bi)002:603: de re re la'ang chung 'bring che gsum /
NK045(bi)002:604: slar yang chung ngu'i chung ngu sogs gsum du phye
NK045(bi)002:605: ba'i mos pa nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur la
NK045(bi)002:606: de dag gi phan yon bshad pa'i rim pa nyer
NK045(bi)002:608: 'dir rang don mos pa chen po'i chen po'i phan yon /
NK045(bi)002:609: la las bde gshegs zhes pa nas char mi phod
NK045(bi)002:610: kyi bar du gsungs rgyas par gling bzhi dge bcu
NK045(bi)002:611: la bkod pa sogs dgu las 'di tha ma'o //
NK045(bi)002:613: rgyal ba'i shes rab nas chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:614: 'dis rang gzhan gyi don 'grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:615: 'di 'khor 'das kyi bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas su yid ches par bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:616: de ni sa dang 'khor sgyur gyi dpes bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:617: gzhan don mos pa rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba sogs nas ro gcig 'gyur bar du ste /
NK045(bi)002:618: shing gi grib ma'i dpes lam thams cad byang chub
NK045(bi)002:619: chen por tshul gcig byed pa'i 'thad pa dang bcas
NK045(bi)002:620: te bstan to // bdun pa bstod bkur basngagasa gsum
NK045(bi)002:621: la rgyas par nyer bdun yod kyang 'dir gzhan don
NK045(bi)002:622: mos pa'i basngagasa pa kho na bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:623: de yang dang por gzhan don du sher phyin ston
NK045(bi)002:624: pa na ltar snang dang yang dag gi khyad par
NK045(bi)002:625: gsungs pa / byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:626: de'i basngagasa pa la spyi bye brag gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:627: dang po la las gang+ga'i klung gi sogs /
NK045(bi)002:628: gnyis pa de'i 'thad pa dpes bstan pa la /
NK045(bi)002:629: chung ngu mos spyod kyi sa pa'i mos pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:630: myu gu med par sogs te /
NK045(bi)002:631: myu gu lta bu sems dang po bskyed pa las lam gyi yon tan kun 'byung tshul dang /
NK045(bi)002:632: 'bring po ma dag sa bdun gyi mos pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe sogs kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:633: 'jig rten 'dir 'phags pa'i ye shes don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems byung na zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:634: chen po dag pa sa gsum gyi mos pa /
NK045(bi)002:635: dper na ma dros mtsho la sogs kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:636: dag sa pa'i ye shes byang chub sems med na
NK045(bi)002:637: bde gshegs kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
NK045(bi)002:638: pa mi 'byung ba'i tshul du gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:639: 'dir sgom lam mos pa yin kyang mos spyod kyi mos pa'i basngagasa pa zhar la bstan pa'am /
NK045(bi)002:640: yang na ma dag sa bdun dang /
NK045(bi)002:641: dag sa snga ma gnyis dang /
NK045(bi)002:642: sa bcu par rim bzhin sbyar shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:643: brgyad pa rjes su yi rangs mdo rgyas par bsngo ba sngon dang yi rang rjes su gsungs kyang /
NK045(bi)002:646: 'jig rten 'di na snang byed sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:647: de la thabs yi rang dang shes rab mi dmigs
NK045(bi)002:648: pa zung du 'brel ba'i sgo nas dge rtsa la
NK045(bi)002:649: yi rang bar bya ba'ang bsngo ba'i dmigs rnams dang
NK045(bi)002:651: seng bzang gis sho lo ka 'di gnyis basngagasa pa'i khongs su yar sbyar bar mdzad do //
NK045(bi)002:652: dgu pa bsngo ba la rgyas par rnam grangs bcu gcig tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:653: bsngo ba'i 'khor 123 gsum po dag pa don dam gyi ngos nas dang /
NK045(bi)002:654: kun rdzob tu bsngo bya sangs rgyas 4kyi tshogs rjes su dran pa /
NK045(bi)002:655: grogs rnam mkhyen yid byed kyis zin pa'i phar phyin sogs dang ldan pa 5 /
NK045(bi)002:656: de yang shes rab kyis 'khor gsum gyi mtshan mar mi dmigs pa 6 /
NK045(bi)002:657: de'i yon tan sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i bsngo ba yin pa 7 /
NK045(bi)002:658: 'bras bu khams gsum la mi gtogs pa 8 /
NK045(bi)002:659: dbye ba chung 9'bring 10che 11gsum ste bcu gcig tu gsungs pa kun /
NK045(bi)002:660: don du kun rdzob tu rang gzhan gyi dge rtsa
NK045(bi)002:661: kun la dmigs nas byang chub kyi rgyur bsngo ba
NK045(bi)002:662: dang / don dam par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngo ba la 'dus so //
NK045(bi)002:664: 'das dus sngon gyi sogs nas zil gyis gnon par du gsungs pas /
NK045(bi)002:665: 'das dus nas zag med pa zhes pa'i bar gyis
NK045(bi)002:666: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs rjes su dran pa bstan te
NK045(bi)002:667: / bsngo bya tshogs kyi dam pa sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)002:668: tshogs kyis mtshon nas zag bcas zag med kyi dge
NK045(bi)002:669: ba thams cad dmigs yul du byas nas yi rangs
NK045(bi)002:670: dang bsngo ba bya bar gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:671: bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' sogs rkang pa gnyis
NK045(bi)002:672: kyis thabs bcas dang khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin
NK045(bi)002:673: pa bstan / yongs bsngo gal te nas chud ma yin zhes pa'i bar gyis /
NK045(bi)002:674: de ni dmigs med rnam pa can sogs 'khor gsum ma grub par rtogs pa bstan /
NK045(bi)002:675: gal te 'di ltar nas rgyal bas gsungs zhes pa'i bar gyis mtshan med kyi bsngo ba bstan /
NK045(bi)002:676: de ltas 'di ltar sogs nas rgyal bas gsungs pa smra zhes pa'i bar gyis /
NK045(bi)002:677: sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i bsngo ba bstan /
NK045(bi)002:678: gzhan mdo las gsungs pa'i bsngo ba gsum ni dmigs
NK045(bi)002:679: yul gyis phye ba yin pas 'dir de gsum bsdus
NK045(bi)002:680: te / de ltar yongs bsngo sogs rkang pa gnyis
NK045(bi)002:681: kyis te gong gi khongs su de rnams yar ldan
NK045(bi)002:683: bcu pa sgrub pa sgom lam la /
NK045(bi)002:685: sgrub pa sgom lam gyi ngo bo mnyam bzhag tu spros bral mngon sum rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
NK045(bi)002:686: de ni lam gyi chos rnams kyi gtso bo'am mchog nyid de /
NK045(bi)002:687: phar phyin gzhan 'dis bzung nas bla med byang chub tu phyin par byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:688: de ni yon tan gyi cha nas so //
NK045(bi)002:689: khyad par ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen bar gyi chos
NK045(bi)002:690: kun la bden zhen dang mtshan zhen gyis mngon par
NK045(bi)002:691: 'du mi byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK045(bi)002:692: 'bras bu gnas skabs su chos rnams dmigs su med
NK045(bi)002:693: par gnas pa'i don sgom pa po'i rgyud la gtod
NK045(bi)002:695: mthar thug don chen po bla na med pa'i byang chub 'grub par byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:697: dmus long dmigs bu med pa sogs sho lo ka gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:698: de'i shugs kyis don chen po sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang 'phang ngo //
NK045(bi)002:699: kun la mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:700: gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang sogs tshigs
NK045(bi)002:701: bcad gnyis kyis sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)002:703: ngo bo spros bral rtogs pa'i blo dang /
NK045(bi)002:704: chos rnams dmigs su med par gtod par byed pa yin par shes nus so //
NK045(bi)002:705: bcu gcig pa rnam dag sgom lam la skye ba'i
NK045(bi)002:706: rgyu mi skye ba'i rgyu rnam dag sgom lam rang
NK045(bi)002:709: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:710: gnyis pa sngon spyod tshe na sogs kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:712: gzugs kyi dag pa sogs tshigs su bcad pas bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:713: yul can dag pa'i rtogs pa las 'bras bur bzhag la /
NK045(bi)002:714: yul can dag pa de ni yul gzugs sogs kyis dag pa yin te tha dad du med do //
NK045(bi)002:715: de'i rgyu mtshan blo la bden zhen dang gnyis snang
NK045(bi)002:716: gi mtshan zhen gyi sgrib pa dag tshul las theg
NK045(bi)002:717: gsum gyi rtogs rigs kyi 'bras bu rnams 'jog la
NK045(bi)002:718: / yul can de ltar dag pa'i tshe mig skyon dag pa'i mthong ba bzhin du /
NK045(bi)002:719: yul gyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir yul kyang dag par snang la /
NK045(bi)002:720: dag pa de gnyis tha dad pa min te /
NK045(bi)002:721: blo dag pa yul gyi rang bzhin mthong ba'i dbang gis yin la /
NK045(bi)002:722: yul dag pa rang bzhin gyis de ltar gnas pa
NK045(bi)002:723: yin gyi blos dag par bcos pa min pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)002:724: na / don du chos thams cad ye nas rnam
NK045(bi)002:725: dag chen po sgrib bral gyi bdag nyid du gnas
NK045(bi)002:726: su zin kyang dung dkar po yin kyang mig ser
NK045(bi)002:727: can la ser por snang ba ltar /
NK045(bi)002:728: phyin ci log gis blo bslad nas phyin ci log
NK045(bi)002:729: tu dmigs pa nyid yang dag pa'i lam gyis sbyangs
NK045(bi)002:730: nas rim bzhin dngos po'i gnas tshul dag pa mthong
NK045(bi)002:731: ba yin pa'i gnad kyis so //
NK045(bi)002:733: rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa
NK045(bi)002:734: de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do
NK045(bi)002:736: bye brag nyan thos kyi dag pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK045(bi)002:737: dug gsum dag pa dang gzugs sogs dag pa gnyis tha dad du med par bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:738: rang rgyal la de steng shes sgrib phyogs gcig gis dag pa ston byed du /
NK045(bi)002:739: gzugs dag pa 'bras bu dag pa 'bras bu dag
NK045(bi)002:740: pa sher phyin dag pa sogs dang ma rig pa
NK045(bi)002:741: dag pas 'du byed dag pa'i bar du'o //
NK045(bi)002:742: byang sems kyi dbang du byas te sbyin pa dag
NK045(bi)002:743: pas tshul khrims dag pa sogs lam kun dag par
NK045(bi)002:744: bstan pas so // de ltar na bral bya nyon sgrib dang /
NK045(bi)002:745: rang rgyal gyi de steng shes sgrib phyogs gcig /
NK045(bi)002:746: byang sems kyi lam gyi sgrib pa rnams nyams pa'am
NK045(bi)002:747: bral ba'i cha nas nyan rang byang sems kyi dag
NK045(bi)002:748: pa gsum bshad ma thag pa'i mdo des bstan la
NK045(bi)002:749: / sangs rgyas rnams ni sgrib gnyis bag chags dang
NK045(bi)002:750: bcas pa dag pa'i shin tu dag pa mthar thug
NK045(bi)002:751: / pa'o // de yang sgom lam dgu yod pa'i
NK045(bi)002:752: chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam dag sher phyin dag pas
NK045(bi)002:753: gzugs rnam par dag pa sogs nas /
NK045(bi)002:754: chen po'i chen po mngon par ma grub pa'o sogs kyi bar du gsungs pas bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:755: spros pa med pa'i ye shes ni 'jal byed shes
NK045(bi)002:756: pa dang gzhal bya bden gnyis lta bu tha dad
NK045(bi)002:757: du yul yul can du mi rten te /
NK045(bi)002:758: mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i sgo nas khams gsum
NK045(bi)002:759: gyi gnyen po nyid du gyur pa theg pa chen
NK045(bi)002:760: po'i rtogs rigs khyad par can no //
NK045(bi)002:762: dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa sogs kyis mnyam pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:763: dag pa ni 'dod gzugs gzugs med kyi khams su
NK045(bi)002:764: skye ba ma lags sogs kyis khams gsum gyis bsdus
NK045(bi)002:765: pa'i spang bya 'joms pa'i gnyen por bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:766: de la klan ka spang ba'i sher phyin 'di sman par mi bgyid /
NK045(bi)002:768: thob pa ma mchis pa sogs kyis spang gnyen du lta ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:770: thob byar lta ba sogs kyis klan ka bsal ba
NK045(bi)002:771: yin te dper na spang bya chen po gnyen po
NK045(bi)002:772: chung ngu'i 'joms pa sogs mi 'thad pa lta ba
NK045(bi)002:773: la don dam par spang gnyen dang che chung du
NK045(bi)002:774: ma grub la / kun rdzob tu gos la dri
NK045(bi)002:775: ma chags pa bkru ba'i tshul bzhin 'thad par rtogs
NK045(bi)002:776: pa sogs mang po zhig kyang shugs las 'phang ba
NK045(bi)002:777: ma grub la / shes par bya'o // 'di rnams
NK045(bi)002:778: mdo rgyas pa na bzhugs pas bstan bcos su de
NK045(bi)002:780: sdud pa 'dir ma gsungs te don gyis shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:781: skabs gsum pa gzhi thams cad shes pa la de mtshon byed chos dgu yod la /
NK045(bi)002:782: de yang gzhi zhes pa sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i gzhir
NK045(bi)002:783: gyur pa phung khams skye mched kyi chos kun yin
NK045(bi)002:784: la / de thams cad gang zag gi bdag gis
NK045(bi)002:785: stong pa tsam du shes pa ni nyan thos pa'i
NK045(bi)002:786: la / rtogs pa'o // bdag gnyis kyis stong pas
NK045(bi)002:787: spros bral du shes pa ni theg chen gyi rtogs
NK045(bi)002:788: la / rtogs pa'o // pa'o // de las theg
NK045(bi)002:789: chen gyi rtogs pa'i rigs su gnas pa'i gzhi shes
NK045(bi)002:790: de dngos su bstan nas dman pa'i rtogs pa shugs
NK045(bi)002:791: la shes par bya dgos pa spyir btang nas /
NK045(bi)002:792: mtshon byed chos dgu ni shes pas srid la mi gnas pa'i gzhi shes /
NK045(bi)002:793: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas pa'i gzhi shes /
NK045(bi)002:794: thabs ma yin pas ring ba'i gzhi shes /
NK045(bi)002:795: thabs kyis nye ba'i gzhi shes /
NK045(bi)002:796: mi mthun phyogs kyi gzhi shes /
NK045(bi)002:797: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi gzhi shes drug ni theg pa
NK045(bi)002:798: che chung gi khyad par byed chos su spyir bstan
NK045(bi)002:799: nas / gzhi shes kyi sbyor ba /
NK045(bi)002:800: de yi mnyam nyid de 'dzin stangs /
NK045(bi)002:801: 'bras bu mthong lam dang gsum gyi lam dngos bshad
NK045(bi)002:802: pas de ltar dgus gzhi shes gtan la 'bebs so
NK045(bi)002:803: // de ltar dgu po de dag mdo rgyas par bstan pa /
NK045(bi)002:804: so so'i nang gi bye brag dang bcas pa'i sbyar
NK045(bi)002:805: tshul bstan bcos dang zhib tu sbyar nas shes par
NK045(bi)002:806: bya la / skabs 'dir gzhi shes bdun du bstan
NK045(bi)002:807: te mi mthun phyogs bstan pas ring ba shes shing
NK045(bi)002:808: bya la / / gnyen po bstan pas nye ba don gyis shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:809: de la dang por srid zhir mi gnas pa'i gzhi shes ni /
NK045(bi)002:810: dpa' bo gar spyod sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:811: khams gsum yang dag 'das la yan chad kyis srid par mi gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:812: de man gyis snying rjes zhi bar mi gnas par bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:813: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi gzhi shes ni /
NK045(bi)002:814: 'gro ba 'di dag ming dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:815: 'gro ba rnams dngos por zhen pa'i rang gi rnam
NK045(bi)002:816: par rtog pa'i d+r+wa bar chud pa ni spang bya
NK045(bi)002:817: ste / de ltar shes nas gzung 'dzin gyi spros
NK045(bi)002:818: pas ma bcings par chos nyid kyi mkha' la bya
NK045(bi)002:819: bzhin rgyu ba'i shes rab ni gnyen po'o //
NK045(bi)002:820: de la ci phyir gnyen po gzhi shes 'di rtogs
NK045(bi)002:821: pa'i sgo nas srid zhir mi gnas pa yin snyam
NK045(bi)002:822: na / dngos po'i rang bzhin can gyi phung po
NK045(bi)002:823: lnga tshu rol te so skyes bgrod mthong gi lam
NK045(bi)002:824: du gyur pa 'khor ba'i mtha' dang /
NK045(bi)002:825: phung lnga rgyun chad pa'i dngos med ni pha rol myang 'das kyi mtha' yin la /
NK045(bi)002:826: yin lugs chos nyid ni mtha' de gnyis kar ngo
NK045(bi)002:827: bo nyid kyis mi gnas te zung 'jug mnyam pa
NK045(bi)002:828: chen po'o // de ni de ltar dngos dngos med dang /
NK045(bi)002:829: de gnyis kyi bar na phung gsum pa'i chos gang yang min pas te /
NK045(bi)002:830: dngos dngos med kyang chos can nyi tse ba yin la /
NK045(bi)002:831: de gnyis ka chos nyid kyi klong du mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:832: chos nyid mnyam pa chen po 'khor 'das gang gi
NK045(bi)002:833: mthar ma gnas pa de ni gzhi sher phyin dang
NK045(bi)002:834: bde gshegs snying po dang chos kyi dbyings zhes bya
NK045(bi)002:835: ba'o // des na de la dmigs pa'i yul can
NK045(bi)002:836: la lam sher phyin zhes bya ste de yang mtha'
NK045(bi)002:838: zhi mthar mi gnas pa'i cha nas dmigs med kyi snying rje chen po dang /
NK045(bi)002:839: srid mthar mi gnas pa'i cha nas shes rab phar phyin zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:840: gang gis de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas mtha' gnyis la gnas mi srid pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:841: de'i phyir de ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogs
NK045(bi)002:842: nas dngos dngos med kyi mtshan mar dmigs pas 'jug
NK045(bi)002:843: na yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i thabs med
NK045(bi)002:844: pas ring la / dngos dngos med kyi mtshan mar
NK045(bi)002:845: mi rtogs par mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni
NK045(bi)002:846: thabs kyis nye ba zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:847: de bzhin nyid chos kun la nye ring med kyang
NK045(bi)002:848: tshul bzhin rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis
NK045(bi)002:850: des na gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos su mtshan mar
NK045(bi)002:851: zhen pa ni spang bya'i gzhi shes zhes bya la
NK045(bi)002:852: / bzlog pa ni gnyen po'i gzhi shes te /
NK045(bi)002:853: de yang spang bya spong ba'i ched du blos bskyed
NK045(bi)002:854: pa lta bu ma yin gyi chos rnams kyi lam
NK045(bi)002:855: mam gnas lugs ni rang bzhin gyis 'khor 'das dngos
NK045(bi)002:856: dngos med la sogs pa'i spros pas dben pa yin
NK045(bi)002:857: pa'i phyir gnas lugs de ni shin tu zab pa
NK045(bi)002:858: yin no // zab mo mnyam pa nyid de rtogs
NK045(bi)002:859: nas 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad dbye bsal med
NK045(bi)002:860: par rang bzhin mnyam pa chen por gcig par shes
NK045(bi)002:861: yin no // pas ni / mngon zhen gyi chags pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:862: des srid zhi'i mtha' ngang gis 'gog pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:863: de lta bu'i chos nyid de gzugs la sogs pa
NK045(bi)002:864: dngos dngos med gang gi yang rnam par shes par
NK045(bi)002:866: yul can mig shes sogs kyis mthong ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' zhing /
NK045(bi)002:867: phal pa'i blo yi bsam yul las 'das pas so
NK045(bi)002:868: so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi yul du gyur
NK045(bi)002:869: pa'o // des na dbang po dman pa'i nyan rang rnams 'di ma shes pas zhi mthar lhung la /
NK045(bi)002:870: gang gis mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam
NK045(bi)002:871: las nyams mi srid pa'i gnad mthar thug 'di yin
NK045(bi)002:872: pas sher phyin gyi gnad gal po che yin la
NK045(bi)002:873: thog mtha' bar kun tu tshul de dang mthun par
NK045(bi)002:874: 'chad shes pa don gyi snying po yin no //
NK045(bi)002:875: sbyor ba la rgyas par bcu yod de /
NK045(bi)002:876: khyad gzhi gzugs sogs la mngon zhen bkag pa'i sbyor ba /
NK045(bi)002:877: de'i khyad chos rtag mi rtag sogs su dang /
NK045(bi)002:878: de lam gyi yon tan gyi rten du rdzogs ma rdzogs la dang /
NK045(bi)002:879: de la bden zhen gyi chags pa med pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:880: la ste de gsum la mngon zhen gyis spyod pa
NK045(bi)002:881: bkag pa'i sbyor ba gsum dang bcas pa bzhi'i chos
NK045(bi)002:882: can la zhen tshul gyi sgo nas de spang bar
NK045(bi)002:883: gdams pa'o // de yang rdzogs ma rdzogs ni gzhan
NK045(bi)002:884: dbang dang kun btags kyi gzugs te gnyis su snang
NK045(bi)002:885: bzhin pa'i gzugs la gzugs su zhen pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)002:886: gzugs la ci tsam dmigs kyang lam gyi yon tan
NK045(bi)002:887: mi skyed de so skye rnams bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:888: chos nyid kyi gzugs te rang bzhin med pas khyad
NK045(bi)002:889: par du byas pa'i gzugs la dmigs na sgyu ma
NK045(bi)002:890: ltar mthong ba'i phyir lam gyi yon tan skyed de
NK045(bi)002:891: 'phags pa rnams kyi rjes thob bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:892: yang chos nyid sher phyin las brtsams te spyod pa lnga gsungs pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:893: sher phyin gyi ngo bo la 'gyur ba med pas
NK045(bi)002:894: na bstan pas 'phel ba dang ma bstan pas 'bri
NK045(bi)002:895: ba sogs rnam pa kun tu med par rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:896: dang / sher phyin nyid bstod smad chags sdang sogs
NK045(bi)002:897: zhi ba'i skyed pa por don dam par med pa
NK045(bi)002:898: dang / nyid de / rang gi ngo bo 'dus
NK045(bi)002:899: ma byas yin pas de sus kyang ma bskyed la
NK045(bi)002:900: don dam par des gang yang skyed par mi byed
NK045(bi)002:901: dang / nyid de / pas so // de ni
NK045(bi)002:902: bya dka' ba rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can
NK045(bi)002:903: dang / nyid de / pas so // te /
NK045(bi)002:904: rnam mkhyen ched du bya dka' ste don dam par
NK045(bi)002:905: thob tu med pa'i phyir dang /
NK045(bi)002:906: lam shes sbyor bas bya dka' ste don dam par bskyed du med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:907: gzhi shes las su bya dka' ste don dam par bstan du med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:908: des na de la kun rdzob tu 'jug pa na bya dka' ba zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:910: sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba
NK045(bi)002:911: de ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs pa lags
NK045(bi)002:912: so // zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:913: des na gzhi lam rnam pa de dag shes bya
NK045(bi)002:914: dang blang bya dang thob bya yin kyang der zhen
NK045(bi)002:915: na mi rung bas bya dka' ba'o //
NK045(bi)002:916: de ltar mi 'gyur ba dang byed po med pa
NK045(bi)002:917: dang bya dka' ba ste de gsum ni ngo bo'i
NK045(bi)002:919: sher phyin de'i byed las gnyis ni /
NK045(bi)002:920: yum la spyod pas rang rang gi skal ba bzhin
NK045(bi)002:921: 'bras bu thob pas 'bras bu chud mi za bar
NK045(bi)002:922: yod pa dang / de yang yum nyid las gzhan
NK045(bi)002:923: la rag ma lus par yum yod na lam 'bras
NK045(bi)002:924: kyi yon tan kun sdud pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:925: kun rdzob tu de ltar yin kyang don dam par
NK045(bi)002:926: ma zhen par bstan pa'i rnam can gyi sbyor ba'o
NK045(bi)002:927: // snang yang rang bzhin med par shes byed kyi dpe ni /
NK045(bi)002:928: rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs pa'i snang ba bdun
NK045(bi)002:929: bstan pa ni dpe'i sbyor ba ste de ltar bcu'o
NK045(bi)002:930: // de ltar bcu po yang mdor bsdus na dmigs
NK045(bi)002:931: pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor la 'du
NK045(bi)002:933: spyod pa yongs dag sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:934: der yang don gyis gzhan kun 'du ste /
NK045(bi)002:935: mi spyod na zhes pas gzugs sogs la mi spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:936: de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing /
NK045(bi)002:937: zhes yul gang du'ang mi dmigs pas gzugs rtag mi
NK045(bi)002:938: rtag rdzogs ma rdzogs chags med la spyod pa'i chags
NK045(bi)002:939: pa thams cad yongs su spong zhing /
NK045(bi)002:940: chags las rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod /
NK045(bi)002:941: ces pas mi 'gyur byed po med pa 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:942: ji bzhin thob pa gzhan la rag mi las pa
NK045(bi)002:943: bya dka' ba dang ldan pa'i bde gshegs kyi shes
NK045(bi)002:945: dpe bdun ni 'dir ma gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:946: gzhi shes kyi 'dzin stangs mnyam pa nyid bzhi ni /
NK045(bi)002:948: gzugs rlom sems su mi byed /
NK045(bi)002:949: gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
NK045(bi)002:950: gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
NK045(bi)002:951: gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed /
NK045(bi)002:952: ces 'gres rkang sbyar te gsungs pa'i don rim pa bzhin /
NK045(bi)002:956: yul can bzhir mngon zhen gyi rlom pa med par mnyam nyid kyi 'dzin stangs can du bstan pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:957: yang na stong nyid mtshan med smon med 'dus ma
NK045(bi)002:958: byas pa'i sgo bzhir sbyar te bshad kyang rung ngo
NK045(bi)002:960: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:961: yul gzugs lta bu'i ngo bo mtshan ma khyad par du snang ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:962: de 'dzin pa'i yul can med par shes bya shes byed mnyam pa nyid du song ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:963: chags pa bcad nas zhes pas rlom pa bzhi'i chags pa bcad nas 'grol /
NK045(bi)002:964: chags pa med pa'i mnyam nyid du 'gro zhes snga
NK045(bi)002:965: ma rnam gcod dang phyi ma yongs gcod kyi tshul
NK045(bi)002:966: gyis bstan la / snga ma'i dpe nyi ma gza' bral dang /
NK045(bi)002:967: phyi ma'i dpe me btang ba ste shes rab kyi mes spros pa'i tshang tshing tshigs pas na'o //
NK045(bi)002:968: dgu pa mthong lam ni rgyas par ye shes bcu drug po ston byed /
NK045(bi)002:969: gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa ma yin pa sogs rnam grangs bcu drug tu yod pa las /
NK045(bi)002:970: 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing
NK045(bi)002:971: sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis don ma lus pa bsdus
NK045(bi)002:972: nas bstan te chos thams cad gdod nas rang bzhin
NK045(bi)002:973: gyis dag cing 'od gsal ba yin la de'i ngang
NK045(bi)002:974: tshul las nam yang mi g.yo bas na 'khrul ba
NK045(bi)002:975: ltar snang ba'i dus nyid na'ang /
NK045(bi)002:976: ma dag pa gzhi mi srid pas yongs su dag pa las ma 'das pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:977: de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)002:978: pa la yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis blta bar
NK045(bi)002:979: byas te mnyam par bzhag na lta bar byed pa
NK045(bi)002:980: po dang blta bar bya ba'i chos kun mi dmigs
NK045(bi)002:981: par mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba 'di ni shes
NK045(bi)002:982: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la spyod
NK045(bi)002:983: pa yin no // zhes gsungs te skye med mnyam
NK045(bi)002:984: pa nyid du mthong ba ni chos kun gyi gnas
NK045(bi)002:985: lugs mthar thug mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:986: des sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i chos nyid ji bzhin par gzigs pa yin gyi /
NK045(bi)002:987: mi rtag par mthong ba sogs ni mthar thug gi bden pa mthong ba min te /
NK045(bi)002:988: de kho na nyid du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba sogs ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:989: gzhan yang sdug bsngal gyi chos kun rang bzhin dag cing /
NK045(bi)002:990: las nyon kun 'byung gi rnam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:991: dgag bya gdod nas med pas na 'gog pa thob
NK045(bi)002:992: pa'i byed po'am 'gog pa med de byed po ma
NK045(bi)002:993: dmigs pa dang / lam bden gyi chos kun kyang mi dmigs te zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:994: mdo rgyas pa rnams su mkhyen gsum bstan zin pa'i
NK045(bi)002:995: skabs 'dir gnas skabs rdzogs pa'am mjug sdud kyi mdo
NK045(bi)002:996: / rab 'byor yum 'di ni chos gang yang thob
NK045(bi)002:997: par byed pa ma yin 'das par byed pa ma
NK045(bi)002:998: yin zhes sogs de ltar gsungs pa 'di gzhi shes
NK045(bi)002:999: kyi mjug sdud ston pa'i tshigs dang yang rab 'byor
NK045(bi)002:1000: yum 'di ni khams gsum las 'da' bar byed pa
NK045(bi)002:1001: ma yin zhes sogs gsungs pa 'di lam shes kyi
NK045(bi)002:1002: / dang / yang rab 'byor yum 'di ni sangs
NK045(bi)002:1003: rgyas kyi chos rnams nas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
NK045(bi)002:1004: rnams ster bar byed pa ma yin 'dor bar byed
NK045(bi)002:1005: pa ma yin zhes sogs gsungs pa rnam mkhyen gyi
NK045(bi)002:1006: mjug sdud de skabs gsum rdzogs par ston pa yod
NK045(bi)002:1007: / dang / pa yin yang / mdo bsdus pa 'dir de ma gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:1008: de ltar yul mkhyen gsum bshad nas de nyams su len pa la sbyor ba bzhi gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1009: mkhyen gsum du gtan la phab pa'i rnam pa mtha'
NK045(bi)002:1010: dag bsdus te sgom pa rnam rdzogs sbyor ba dang
NK045(bi)002:1011: / sbyor ba de goms nas grub pa'i tshad du
NK045(bi)002:1012: gyur pa drod nas skad cig ma'i bar gyi gnas
NK045(bi)002:1014: skabs so so'i goms pa rdzogs pa'i rtse mo yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1015: de rnams rtags dang rnam 'phel sogs kyis mtshon nas bstan pa rtse mo'i sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1016: slob lam mthar thug pa skad cig ma'i sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:1017: grub pa'i ched du lam gyi rnam pa grangs dang
NK045(bi)002:1018: go rim nges can du phan tshun gcig gis kun
NK045(bi)002:1019: 'dren pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa mthar gyis pa /
NK045(bi)002:1020: de yongs su grub pa mthar phyin nas skad cig
NK045(bi)002:1021: gcig la zag med kyi chos kun tshang bar sgom
NK045(bi)002:1022: pa skad cig ma'i sbyor ba dang bzhi las /
NK045(bi)002:1023: dang po rnam kun mngon rdzogs sbyor ba la /
NK045(bi)002:1024: de mtshon byed chos bcu gcig tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1025: bsgom bya rnam pa ni mkhyen gsum gyi rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:1026: kun bsdus pas rnam pa brgyad don gsum du bshad
NK045(bi)002:1027: pa rnams so1 // sgom pa sbyor ba nyi shu dang 2 /
NK045(bi)002:1028: sbyor ba sgom pa'i gegs su gyur pa skyon bdud las zhe drug dang 3 /
NK045(bi)002:1029: bsgoms pa las thob pa'i yon tan bcu bzhi dang 4 /
NK045(bi)002:1030: sbyor ba nyid mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni
NK045(bi)002:1031: shes mtshan khyad mtshan byed mtshan ngo bo nyid mtshan
NK045(bi)002:1032: bzhi las phye ba'i mtshan nyid dgu bcu go gcig
NK045(bi)002:1033: dang 5 / mos spyod na sbyor ba bsgoms pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1034: dbang du byas te thar pa cha mthun tshogs lam
NK045(bi)002:1035: dang 5 / dang 6 / nges 'byed cha mthun sbyor lam 7gnyis bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1036: sbyor ba sgom pa po slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs dang 8 /
NK045(bi)002:1037: sbyor ba khyad par ba'i dbang du byas te srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi sbyor ba 9 /
NK045(bi)002:1039: thabs mkhas sbyor 11ba ste de ltar bcu gcig go //
NK045(bi)002:1040: de la rnam pa ni mdo rgyas par gzhi shes
NK045(bi)002:1041: kyi rnam pa bden pa so so la bzhi re
NK045(bi)002:1042: dang / lam la gang zag gi bdag med pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1043: ldog cha nas bstan pa bzhi nyan rang dang thun
NK045(bi)002:1045: de'i steng du rang rgyal gyi gzung ba rang bzhin
NK045(bi)002:1046: med rtogs la mnyam rjes gnyis su phye ba'i rjes
NK045(bi)002:1047: thob tu rmi lam dang sgyu ma ltar rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:1048: sogs dpe lngas bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1049: mnyam bzhag tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
NK045(bi)002:1050: sogs drug ni rang rgyal la phyi don rang bzhin
NK045(bi)002:1051: med pa kho na'i cha las bzhag cing /
NK045(bi)002:1052: theg chen du chos rnams rang bzhin med pa'i don gyis sgra ji bzhin par gzung dgos la /
NK045(bi)002:1053: de ltar nyer bdun ni gzhi shes kyi rnam pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1054: lam shes kyi rnam pa la'ang kun 'byung bden pa
NK045(bi)002:1055: spong gnyen gyi sgo nas bstan pa chags bral gyi
NK045(bi)002:1057: lam bden dam bca' dang 'thad pa'i sgo nas bstan pa tshad med pa'i rnam pa sogs bdun /
NK045(bi)002:1058: sdug bden mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas bshad pa mi rtag pa'i rnam pa sogs lnga /
NK045(bi)002:1059: 'gog bden stong nyid kyi sgo nas bshad pa phyi
NK045(bi)002:1060: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa sogs stong nyid bcu
NK045(bi)002:1061: drug ste de ltar lam shes pa rnam pa so
NK045(bi)002:1062: drug go // rnam mkhyen ni gzhi lam rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:1063: ma lus pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir snga ma
NK045(bi)002:1064: gnyis kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen mod /
NK045(bi)002:1065: 'dir yul can lam bden dang rjes su mthun par
NK045(bi)002:1066: slob ma nyan thos la yod pa dang rjes su
NK045(bi)002:1067: mthun par byang phyogs so bdun /
NK045(bi)002:1068: byang sems la yod pa dang rjes mthun rnam thar sgo gsum /
NK045(bi)002:1070: mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgu /
NK045(bi)002:1071: bden bzhi mthong ba'i bzod pa bzhi /
NK045(bi)002:1072: phar phyin bcu bcas khyon so bzhi'o //
NK045(bi)002:1073: sangs rgyas nyid kyi thun mong min pa'i chos stobs bcu /
NK045(bi)002:1075: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi /
NK045(bi)002:1077: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa /
NK045(bi)002:1079: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa ste khyon bsdoms pas so dgu ste /
NK045(bi)002:1080: don la rnam mkhyen gyi rnam pa brgya dang bcu tham pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1081: de ltar rnam pa brgya don gsum po de dag
NK045(bi)002:1082: tu gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos rnams gnad bsdus te
NK045(bi)002:1083: bstan pas / de dag yid la byed tshul kyang
NK045(bi)002:1084: rjes thob tu de dang de'i ngo bo rgyu dang
NK045(bi)002:1085: byed las sogs ma 'dres par shes shing sgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1086: rnam pa can du bsgoms la /
NK045(bi)002:1087: mnyam bzhag tu mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can du bsgom pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1088: mdo bsdus pa 'dir ni rnam pa logs su ma bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1089: sbyor ba nyid bstan pas des dmigs byar don gyis shes par bya ba yin te /
NK045(bi)002:1090: gzhi lam rnam gsum kun rdzob tu shes shing don
NK045(bi)002:1091: dam par mi dmigs par bsgom pa tsam du zad
NK045(bi)002:1092: pas na chos thams cad stong nyid spros bral du
NK045(bi)002:1093: bsgom pa la ldog cha nas bstan pa'i rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:1094: tshad med pa snyed zad par 'adu'o //
NK045(bi)002:1095: sbyor ba la rgyas par nyi shur gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1096: yul gang la'ang mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba 1 /
NK045(bi)002:1097: yul can gyis gang du'ang mi 'dzin pa'am mi sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1098: ba'i sbyor ba 2gnyis ni sher phyin bsgom pa'i sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1100: sher phyin de la'ang gzhi lam rnam pa gsum gyi ldog pas phyes na /
NK045(bi)002:1101: gzhi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa dang 3 /
NK045(bi)002:1102: lam gting dpag dka' ba dang 4 /
NK045(bi)002:1103: rnam pa tshad med pa'i phyir de dang de'i yul
NK045(bi)002:1104: can la zab pa'i sbyor ba 5la sogs pa'i ming
NK045(bi)002:1105: gis bstan pa yin pas de lnga ni sbyor ba'i
NK045(bi)002:1107: de nas bco lnga pos mtshams kyi dbye ba ste /
NK045(bi)002:1108: tshogs lam pa'am dbang rtul gyi sher phyin sgom pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1109: sbyor ba de ni tshegs chen pos 'bad na yun
NK045(bi)002:1110: ring mo zhig na rtogs pa skyed pa'i phyir tshegs
NK045(bi)002:1111: chen yun ring rtogs pa'i sbyor ba 6zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:1112: drod lung bstan thob pa'i sbyor ba 7 /
NK045(bi)002:1113: rtse mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba 8 /
NK045(bi)002:1114: bzod pa nyan rang gi sa las nges par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba 9 /
NK045(bi)002:1115: chos mchog gi de ma thag tu mthong lam skye bas bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba 10 /
NK045(bi)002:1116: mthong lam pas sher phyin sgom pa byang chub la nye ba'i sbyor ba 11 /
NK045(bi)002:1117: sa gnyis pa nas bdun pa'i bar byang chub thob pa myur ba'i sbyor ba 12 /
NK045(bi)002:1118: sa brgyad par sher phyin bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la yon tan gyi cha nas lngar bshad de /
NK045(bi)002:1119: gzhan don du chos 'khor bskor ba'i sbyor ba 13 /
NK045(bi)002:1120: 'phel 'grib dang skye 'gag kun byang sogs mi mthong ba'i sbyor ba 14 /
NK045(bi)002:1121: chos dang chos min blang bya dor bya sogs mi mthong ba'i sbyor ba 15 /
NK045(bi)002:1122: gzugs sogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang gzhal du
NK045(bi)002:1123: med pa tsam du'ang zhen pa med pa'i sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:1124: 16 / gzugs sogs kyi mtshan ma dang ngo bor mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba ste 17 /
NK045(bi)002:1125: sa brgyad par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)002:1126: yongs su smin pas mnyam rjes kun tu mnyam pa
NK045(bi)002:1127: nyid la gnas pa'i phyir de ltar bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1128: sa dgu pa'i sher phyin sgom pa'i sbyor ba la
NK045(bi)002:1129: 'bras bu rin po che sbyin par byed pa'i sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1131: rgyun zhugs sogs 'bras bu bzhi dang rang rgyal dgra
NK045(bi)002:1132: bcom dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste de drug la
NK045(bi)002:1133: 'bras bu rin chen rnam drug ces bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:1134: de gzhan la chos bstan pa sogs kyis sbyin par byed pa tsam dang po nas yod mod kyi /
NK045(bi)002:1135: skabs 'dir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
NK045(bi)002:1136: gdul bya la rang rang gi skal pa dang 'tshams
NK045(bi)002:1137: par chos bstan pas rang 'bras thob par mdzad pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1139: sa bcu pa'i sgom pa dag pa'i sbyor ba 19zhes
NK045(bi)002:1140: bya ste gnas ngan len gyi sgrib pa phra mo
NK045(bi)002:1141: sa 'og mar dag ma nus pa rnams 'dir dag
NK045(bi)002:1142: pas slob lam gyi dag pa la 'di las lhag
NK045(bi)002:1143: pa med pas dag pa zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:1144: lo dang zla ba sogs su brtson pa mi 'dor
NK045(bi)002:1145: bar thun nam mtshams su bcad de sgom pa ni
NK045(bi)002:1146: sgom mi sgom gyi mtshams byed pas na mtshams dang
NK045(bi)002:1147: bcas pa'i sbyor ba 20zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:1148: 'di ni sbyor ba rnams grub pa'i thabs yin no //
NK045(bi)002:1149: mdo bsdus pa 'dir sbyor ba dang po gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:1150: rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1151: rkang pa gsum pas mi gnas sbyor //
NK045(bi)002:1152: bzhi pas mi sbyor sbyor bstan te //
NK045(bi)002:1153: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos thams cad
NK045(bi)002:1154: la mtha' bzhi'i tshul gyis dmigs par bya ba rdul
NK045(bi)002:1155: tsam ma grub pas yul gang la'ang mi gnas pa
NK045(bi)002:1156: dang / mtha' bzhi'i spros pa dang bral ba'i chos
NK045(bi)002:1157: nyid la rjes su son pa'i yul can rnam par
NK045(bi)002:1158: mi rtog pa'i ye shes de'ang dmigs pa gang yang
NK045(bi)002:1159: mi 'dzin pa'am mi sbyor ba yin pas na mi
NK045(bi)002:1160: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba zhes sam mi brtson pa'i sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1162: don la yul yul can gnyis su med par sher phyin rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
NK045(bi)002:1163: de'i don gyis bya dka' ba gsum yang bsdus te
NK045(bi)002:1164: gsum po gzhi lam rnam pa'i cha nas phye ba
NK045(bi)002:1166: tshogs lam dang drod dang rtse mo gsum gyi sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:1167: gang zhig chos 'di sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1168: thos bsam gyis som nyi med pa tshogs lam /
NK045(bi)002:1169: slob pa ste sgom byung gi gsal snang gtso bor gyur pa drod /
NK045(bi)002:1170: phyir zhing cher brtson pas dge rtsa g.yo ba'i rtse mor gyur pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o //
NK045(bi)002:1171: yang na thun mong du tshogs lam nas rtse mo man chad du sbyar ro //
NK045(bi)002:1172: bzod pa nges 'byung gi sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:1173: dgon pa'i lam ni sogs sho lo ka gnyis kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1174: chos dbyings la dang por don spyi 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis blos lcogs shing bzod pa na /
NK045(bi)002:1175: zab mo'i don la mi skrag par rtogs par 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:1176: du 'ong ngo snyam du dbugs phyin nas nyan rang
NK045(bi)002:1178: chos mchog bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:1179: mi zhig rgya mtsho'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1180: mtha' bral chos dbyings kyi rgya mtsho chen po dngos
NK045(bi)002:1181: su mthong ba la nye bar 'gyur ba'i rtags su
NK045(bi)002:1182: lta ba dang the tshom la sogs pa gzung 'dzin
NK045(bi)002:1183: gyi rtog pa mngon gyur pa'i ri dang shing sogs
NK045(bi)002:1184: ma mthong bas yid ches shing chos mchog gi sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1185: ba des chos nyid mngon sum mthong ba mthong lam
NK045(bi)002:1186: bar ma chad du 'dren par bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1187: mthong lam byang chub nye ba'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:1188: dpyid dus bzang la sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis te /
NK045(bi)002:1189: sbyor lam pa'i rtogs pa sdong po lta bu la
NK045(bi)002:1190: 'das lam dang por skye ba mthong lam gyi ye
NK045(bi)002:1191: shes lo ma lta bu lhags par gyur pa na
NK045(bi)002:1192: / byang chub lam gyi yal ga rnams lam ring
NK045(bi)002:1193: por mi thogs par yon tan gyi lo 'dabs dang
NK045(bi)002:1194: 'bras bu me tog rnams shin tu rgya chen por
NK045(bi)002:1195: skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur bar bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1196: sa gnyis pa nas bdun pa'i bar gyi sbyor ba byang chub myur du thob pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1197: dper na bud med sbrum gang sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1198: dpe snga ma sdong pos 'bras bu rim gyis 'byin pa las myur bar /
NK045(bi)002:1199: btsa' ba'i dus su bab pa na yun ma 'gyang
NK045(bi)002:1200: bar btsa' nges bltar ma dag pa'i sa bdun po'i
NK045(bi)002:1201: dri ma mngal sbubs dang 'dra ba bral nas /
NK045(bi)002:1202: dag sa'i ye shes dngos su snang zhing myur du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'o //
NK045(bi)002:1203: dag sa'i sbyor ba rnams thun mong du ston pa /
NK045(bi)002:1204: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod tshe sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis te /
NK045(bi)002:1206: chos chos min mi mthong ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1207: gzhal med kyi chos dbyings tsam du zhen pas mi
NK045(bi)002:1208: mthong ba gsum bstan pas gzugs sogs kyi mtshan ma
NK045(bi)002:1209: dang ngo bor mi rtog pa don gyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1210: mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas zhes pas /
NK045(bi)002:1211: gzhan don du chos 'khor bskor nas 'bras bu rin chen sbyin par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1212: mtshan 'dzin phra mo'ang dag pa'i ye shes yin par shugs la 'phang pa yin zhing /
NK045(bi)002:1213: mtshams dang bcas pa ni logs su ma bstan kyang rung bas 'dir ma gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:1214: sbyor ba'i yon tan ni rgyas par bdud kyi mthu
NK045(bi)002:1215: bcom pa la sogs par bcu bzhir gsungs kyang 'dir
NK045(bi)002:1216: / gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis yon tan bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1217: gang la'ang mi rtog pa sbyor ba'i ngo bo yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1218: mi rtog pa de'i byin rlabs kyis bdud kyi mthu bcom pa sogs 'gal rkyen dang bral ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1221: dge rtsa thun min skyed pa sogs yon tan 'phel ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1222: gzhan la chos ston pa sogs rang gzhan gyi don lhun gyis grub par 'byung zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:1223: spang bya bdud las ni sher phyin la sbyor ba'i bar chad du gang gyur pa rnams yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1224: de yang yum rgyas par 'gal rkyen rang la gnas pa nyi shu /
NK045(bi)002:1225: rang gzhan gang rung la brten pa'i mthun rkyen ma tshang ba nyer gsum /
NK045(bi)002:1226: gzhan la brten pa'i 'gal rkyen gsum ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug tu gsungs pa las skabs 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:1227: smra ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas sogs nas dgongs pa mdzad kyi bar gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1230: des mi tshugs pa'i rgyu bstan pa gsum las dang po /
NK045(bi)002:1231: spobs pa tha dad rnam pa du ma zhes pas /
NK045(bi)002:1232: spobs pa skyes bu rab dang theg chen las g.yeng ba'i rgyu brgyad dang /
NK045(bi)002:1233: gzhan yang rang gi rtog pa ngan pas sher phyin
NK045(bi)002:1234: 'bri ba dang 'chad nyan gyi tshogs pa mi ldan
NK045(bi)002:1235: par byed pa thams cad bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1236: 'gro ba'i don ma byas par sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis /
NK045(bi)002:1237: spobs pa myur ba dang 'gro don la mi dga' ba bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1238: 'di bshad tshe na sogs sho lo ka gcig gis
NK045(bi)002:1239: yum las phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan 'dzin pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1240: / de ltar mi shes sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis rgyu las nyams pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1241: glang po rnyed nas sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis lam theg chen las nyams pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1242: zas mchog rnyed nas sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis sher phyin gyi ro myong ba las nyams pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1243: 'bras bu bla na med pa sku gsum las nyams pa bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1244: de dag gis rgyu 'bras 'brel nyams dang /
NK045(bi)002:1245: ched du bya ba gsum las nyams pa don gyis
NK045(bi)002:1246: shes pas na theg chen las nyams byed kyi rgyu
NK045(bi)002:1247: bdun bstan to // bsti stangs 'dod par 'gyur zhing sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis /
NK045(bi)002:1248: rang nyid bsti stangs 'dod pa sogs kyis sher phyin
NK045(bi)002:1249: la sbyor ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba kun bsdu
NK045(bi)002:1250: zhing chos min bya ba zhes pas gnas ngan len
NK045(bi)002:1251: gyi dbang du byas pa gsum yang bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1252: gang dag de yi tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis gzhan la brten pa'i 'gal rkyen kun bsdu'o //
NK045(bi)002:1253: de yi tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis chos
NK045(bi)002:1254: dang gang zag gi bar du bdud kyis 'byed pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1255: sbyor ba / lam ltar snang bcos ma nye bar
NK045(bi)002:1256: sgrub pa gus pa'i yul min pa bdud kyi sprul
NK045(bi)002:1257: pa la dga' ba ste gzhan la brten pa gsum
NK045(bi)002:1258: sogs bar chad du ma zhig bsdus te bstan pa'o
NK045(bi)002:1259: sbyor ba / // gnyis pa bar chad 'byung ba'i
NK045(bi)002:1260: rgyu mtshan rin chen rin thang med pa nas spro
NK045(bi)002:1261: bar 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1262: gsum pa mi tshugs pa'i rgyu ni /
NK045(bi)002:1263: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sogs nas dgongs pa mdzad ces pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1264: sher phyin gyi dgongs don rnyed nas de dag la
NK045(bi)002:1265: sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs 'jug pa chos nyid yin
NK045(bi)002:1266: pas bdud kyi glags mi rnyed do //
NK045(bi)002:1267: des na sher phyin gyi don ma rnyed tshun chad
NK045(bi)002:1268: du sher phyin mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir bdud
NK045(bi)002:1269: kyi las 'byung ba yin no zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:1270: shes par bya ba mtshan nyid la spyir shes mtshan sogs bzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:1271: shes mtshan la'ang gzhi shes lam shes rnam mkhyen gyi shes mtshan gsum du yod pa'i /
NK045(bi)002:1272: dang po gzhi shes kyi shes mtshan ni rgyas par bcu drug tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1273: gzhi shes kyi yum la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'byung bar shes pa sogs te /
NK045(bi)002:1274: de yang mkhyen pa gsum pos kyang rang yul de
NK045(bi)002:1275: dag thams cad skye med mnyam par shes pa la
NK045(bi)002:1277: gzhi shes ni gzhi phung khams skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1279: rnam mkhyen gyis shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad skye med du gzigs pa'i ldog cha nas bstan pas /
