NK045(bi)002:1280: gzhi shes las sems chags bcas sogs gzhi yi chos dang /
NK045(bi)002:1281: lam shes lam rnam thar sgo gsum sogs lam gyi chos dang /
NK045(bi)002:1282: rnam mkhyen las mkhyen pa de'i thun mong min pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1283: yul gnas dang gus par bya ba sogs 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:1284: mi slob pa'i mkhyen tshul ston cing /
NK045(bi)002:1285: yul de dang de rnams shes pa'i sgo nas gzhi shes pa la sogs par mtshon te /
NK045(bi)002:1286: sngon po shes pa la sngo 'dzin shes pa zhes
NK045(bi)002:1287: yul sngon pos mtshon nas yul can ston pa bzhin
NK045(bi)002:1288: no // de bzhin du byed mtshan kyang shes par
NK045(bi)002:1289: bya ste yul can de byed las des mtshon nas
NK045(bi)002:1290: shes par bya ba gdung 'degs kyi don byed pa
NK045(bi)002:1291: las ka ba nyid du mtshon pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:1292: khyad mtshan kyang rtag pa las log pas mi rtag par mtshon pa ltar /
NK045(bi)002:1293: lam gzhan las khyad par 'phags chos de nyid kyis de mtshon pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1294: ngo bo nyid mtshan ni gzhan snga ma gsum po la ltos nas mtshon bya'ang yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1295: rang gi don ldog lta bu yin pas mtshan nyid
NK045(bi)002:1296: kyang yin te lto ldir ba las bum par mtshon
NK045(bi)002:1297: pa bzhin no // des na chos gang zhig tha
NK045(bi)002:1298: snyad shes brjod kyi yul du bum pa sogs su
NK045(bi)002:1299: bzhag pa'i mtshon bya de 'jog byed don gyi ldog
NK045(bi)002:1300: pa ni mtshan nyid ces yongs su grags pa yin
NK045(bi)002:1301: pa bzhin no // la / 'jog byed de ni dbyibs dang kha dog reg bya sogs ngo bo'am /
NK045(bi)002:1302: de'i yon tan nam byed las lta bu ci rigs
NK045(bi)002:1303: pa las der bzhag pa'am btags pa yin pa bzhin
NK045(bi)002:1304: du 'dir yang de ltar mtshan nyid bzhi'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)002:1305: mtshon bya mkhyen gsum shes par byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1306: de la gzhi shes lta bu'i shes par bya ba
NK045(bi)002:1307: mang yang gal che ba bsdus te bcu drug tu
NK045(bi)002:1308: bstan pas gzhan yang shes par bya dgos pas /
NK045(bi)002:1309: thog mar gzhi shes kyi shes mtshan ni /
NK045(bi)002:1310: gang dag 'das dang sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1311: rkang pa dang po gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
NK045(bi)002:1312: 'byung ba shes pa bstan 1te gang las na yum
NK045(bi)002:1314: 'jig rten te phung po lnga tha snyad du ma
NK045(bi)002:1315: nor bar shes shing don dam par 'jig pa med
NK045(bi)002:1317: gang gis ston na rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'dis ston /
NK045(bi)002:1318: sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa zhes pas
NK045(bi)002:1319: spyi 3dang bye brag tu sems nang du bsdus pa
NK045(bi)002:1321: chags sdang rmongs gsum bcas pa dang 6 /
NK045(bi)002:1322: chags sogs dang bral ba'i sogs sems dang 7 /
NK045(bi)002:1323: g.yo bkram 'du ba bcum pa'i sems su gyur pa
NK045(bi)002:1324: rnams ji bzhin mkhyen pa ni tha snyad du mkhyen
NK045(bi)002:1325: pa dang 8 / de'i shugs kyis spyod mkhan sems
NK045(bi)002:1326: de yang yul kun la khyad par byed pas chen
NK045(bi)002:1328: 'jug yul nges pa med pa'i tshad med pa 10 /
NK045(bi)002:1329: dape'am ngo bos dbang po la bstan du med pa 11rnams kyang gzung ngo //
NK045(bi)002:1330: don dam par 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang sogs kyis /
NK045(bi)002:1331: bsdus g.yeng gi sems kyang de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bos mi zad pa dang 12 /
NK045(bi)002:1332: sems chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos tshad med pa'i rgya chen por gyur pa dang 13 /
NK045(bi)002:1333: sems la ngo bo med pas spyan lngas kyang bltar med pa dang 14 /
NK045(bi)002:1334: tha snyad du g.yo ba la sogs pa'i sems kyang
NK045(bi)002:1335: de bzhin nyid las ma 'das pa'i ngo bor shes
NK045(bi)002:1337: de ltar tha snyad mkhyen tshul dang don dam mkhyen
NK045(bi)002:1338: tshul de gzhi thams cad bden gnyis ro mnyam du
NK045(bi)002:1339: mkhyen pa'i gzhi shes pa'i sher phyin gyi mkhyen pa
NK045(bi)002:1341: des na tha snyad du thub pas de bzhin nyid
NK045(bi)002:1342: mngon sum rtogs nas gzhan la bstan par 16shes pa'ang
NK045(bi)002:1344: mtshan nyid 'di dag gdul bya nye ba'i bsam ngo
NK045(bi)002:1345: la dgongs pa'i phyir grangs nges med par gzhung kha
NK045(bi)002:1347: gdul bya nye ba'i bsam ngor bcu drug po 'di tsam du bstan kyang /
NK045(bi)002:1348: 'di las bsdus na sems can gyi phung lnga dang
NK045(bi)002:1349: khyad par du sems kyi spyod pa rnams ma 'dres
NK045(bi)002:1350: par tha snyad du gzigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1351: don dam rang bzhin med par gzigs pa tsam la'ang 'du zhing /
NK045(bi)002:1352: rgyas par phye na tshad med pa snyed du 'gyur yang /
NK045(bi)002:1353: 'dir bcu drug tu bstan pa de dag 'jig rten
NK045(bi)002:1354: gyi phung lnga spyi dang khyad par sems kyi spyod
NK045(bi)002:1355: pa bye brag chags bcas la sogs par shes pa
NK045(bi)002:1356: 'di dag gdul bya'i don sgrub pa la shes par
NK045(bi)002:1357: bya ba gal che bas 'dis shes par bya ba
NK045(bi)002:1358: gzhan kun don gyis bsdus pas na /
NK045(bi)002:1359: bcu drug tu gsungs pa la rgyu mtshan med pa
NK045(bi)002:1360: ma yin pa'i go tshul 'di lta bu skabs gzhan
NK045(bi)002:1362: lam shes kyi shes mtshan rgyas par bcu drug tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1363: stong nyid dang mtshan med dang smon med dang skye
NK045(bi)002:1364: med dang 'gag med dang kun nyon med pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1366: blang dor gyi dngos por med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1367: mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:1368: gnas pa'i rten med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1369: de bzhin nyid nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:1370: chos nyid rnam par 'khrugs pa med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1372: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1373: rab tu dbye ba med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1374: mtshan nyid med pa ste ldog cha bcu drug nas
NK045(bi)002:1375: bstan pa'i don de bzhin nyid de lam shes kyis
NK045(bi)002:1376: shes pa yin par gsungs la /
NK045(bi)002:1378: mkhas pa 'jig rten sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis /
NK045(bi)002:1379: sangs rgyas rnams byon yang rung ma byon yang rung
NK045(bi)002:1380: chos rnams kyi gshis sam chos nyid 'di ni sus
NK045(bi)002:1381: kyang bsgyur du mi btub pas 'khrugs pa med pa
NK045(bi)002:1382: dang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1383: nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bo yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1384: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de lta bu'i chos
NK045(bi)002:1385: nyid byar med dam bcos min gyi don rig pa
NK045(bi)002:1386: na / dgag bya rgyu 'bras ngo bor grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1387: skye ba la sogs pa bcu gsum pos khyad par
NK045(bi)002:1388: byar med pa'i don la mnyam par bzhag pas chos
NK045(bi)002:1389: kun gyi de bzhin nyid dang dgongs pa ro mnyam
NK045(bi)002:1390: du gyur pa la de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa
NK045(bi)002:1391: zhes mtshan gsol ba yin no //
NK045(bi)002:1393: rnam mkhyen gyi shes mtshan kyang rgyas par bcu drug tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1394: sangs rgyas des nyid kyi thun mong min pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:1395: 'bras yum rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sher phyin
NK045(bi)002:1396: la brten nas srid zhi mnyam pa nyid du gnas
NK045(bi)002:1397: pa dang / yum de la gus par bya ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1398: bka' bzhin bsgrub pas bla ma nyid du byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1399: yon tan brjod pa sogs kyis mnyes par sgrub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1400: me tog gtor ba dang sgrub pa sogs kyi sgo nas mchod pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1401: don dam par de ltar byed pa med par mkhyen pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1402: rnam mkhyen des yul bden gnyis kyis bsdus pa kun
NK045(bi)002:1403: la thogs pa med par 'jug par mkhyen pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1404: / 'jig rten pas ma mthong ba'i chos nyid zab
NK045(bi)002:1405: mo ston par mdzad pa'am yang na gzugs sogs mtha'
NK045(bi)002:1406: gang du ma mthong ba de nyid don dam mthong
NK045(bi)002:1407: ba zhes ston par mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1408: 'jig rten te phung po lnga nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam par ston par mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1409: de yang gdul bya 'khor du 'dus pa la brjod cing thos par mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1410: thos pa'i don bsam pas shes nas rgyud smin par mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1411: bsam pas nges pa rnyed pa'i don bsgoms nas mngon sum rtogs te rgyud grol bar mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1412: chos nyid kyi ngo bo 'jig rten pa'i rtog dpyod
NK045(bi)002:1413: kyi yul las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab par
NK045(bi)002:1415: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das
NK045(bi)002:1416: pa zhi ba nyid du ston par mdzad pa'am yang
NK045(bi)002:1417: na chos nyid de la yul can gyi spros pa
NK045(bi)002:1418: zhi ba nyid du ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1419: zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phung po
NK045(bi)002:1420: lnga 'gog pa'i tshul ston pa dang de la pha
NK045(bi)002:1421: rol tshu rol dang blang dor gyi 'du shes 'gog
NK045(bi)002:1422: pa ste / don gnyis phun tshogs kyi 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:1423: bcu drug po de rnam mkhyen nyid las 'byung ste
NK045(bi)002:1424: pa ste / / rnam mkhyen dang ldan pas de ltar mkhyen par gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:1425: de skyed pa'i nus pa rnam mkhyen gyi sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:1426: la yod pas sbyor ba'i shes mtshan du'ang 'gro zhing
NK045(bi)002:1427: / rnam mkhyen gyi shes mtshan 'di mi ldan rnam
NK045(bi)002:1428: gcod kyi tshul gyis rnam mkhyen gyi sbyor ba la
NK045(bi)002:1429: bsgrubs pas de rnam mkhyen skyed byed du mtshon kyang
NK045(bi)002:1430: / / de kho nas skyed do zhes gzhan ldan rnam gcod du ma byas pas /
NK045(bi)002:1431: lam shes la khyad mtshan bshad pas 'bras bu rnam
NK045(bi)002:1432: mkhyen la shugs kyis rtogs pa dang gzhi shes la'ang
NK045(bi)002:1433: nyan rang gi de las 'phags par don gyis shes
NK045(bi)002:1435: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal sogs nas
NK045(bi)002:1436: chos kyang rab tu ston zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan
NK045(bi)002:1437: te / sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa 'bras dus kyi
NK045(bi)002:1438: sher phyin yon tan mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas dga'
NK045(bi)002:1439: ba'i tshal lta bu la brten nas bde bar gnas
NK045(bi)002:1441: de'i shugs la gus par bya ba /
NK045(bi)002:1442: bla mar bya ba mnyes par bya ba /
NK045(bi)002:1444: don dam par de rnams bya ba med pa rnams 'phang /
NK045(bi)002:1445: rkang pa phyi ma gsum gyis bstan bya de kho
NK045(bi)002:1446: na nyid zhi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:1447: gdul bya rnams la brjod pa dang shes pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1448: mngon sum du bya ba'i tshul gyis bstan nas 'khor
NK045(bi)002:1450: ston pa po de dag nam yang sems can dang
NK045(bi)002:1451: 'khor ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:1453: dper na seng ge sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis lta
NK045(bi)002:1454: ba'i ri sul la brten pa'i mu stegs ri dwags
NK045(bi)002:1455: kyi tshogs skrag par mdzad pa stong nyid seng ge'i
NK045(bi)002:1456: nga ro ni mi yi seng ge sangs rgyas kyis
NK045(bi)002:1457: 'jig rten 'dir bsgrags par mdzad do zhes pas stong
NK045(bi)002:1458: nyid ston par mdzad pa bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1459: dper na nam mkhar gnas pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig
NK045(bi)002:1460: gis srid pa'i chu klung skems zhes pas 'jig rten
NK045(bi)002:1461: 'gog pa dang / chos kyang rab tu ston zhes
NK045(bi)002:1462: pas kun tu 'jug mkhyen gyi sgo nas chos ston
NK045(bi)002:1463: 'gog pa dang / pa bstan te / des ma mthong ston pa'ang bsdus so //
NK045(bi)002:1464: khyad mtshan la rgyas par bcu drug las 'dir dang
NK045(bi)002:1465: po bzhi dngos su bstan pas phyi ma gsum gsum
NK045(bi)002:1467: dang po sdug bsngal chos bzod kyi ye shes mtshon pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1468: gzugs rnams mi mthong sogs don dang dpe'i tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1469: sdug bden gyi mtshan gzhi gzugs sogs don dam par
NK045(bi)002:1470: mi mthong bas nam mkha' ltar bsam gyis mi khyab
NK045(bi)002:1471: pa'o // de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo
NK045(bi)002:1472: bo de dpe gang dang yang mi mnyam pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1473: pa'o // / tshad mas gzhal ba las 'das pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1474: grangs kyis bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das par don gyis shes so //
NK045(bi)002:1475: kun 'byung bden pa mthong ba'i ye shes bzhi las /
NK045(bi)002:1477: shes myur gnyis dngos su bstan pas gzhan gnyis shugs
NK045(bi)002:1478: las shes te bshad ma thag pa'i lam de lta
NK045(bi)002:1479: bu ni phra zhing mdzangs pa'i blo ldan mkhas pa
NK045(bi)002:1480: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rig par bya ba
NK045(bi)002:1481: dang / nyan thos sogs kyi spyod yul du ma
NK045(bi)002:1482: gyur pa'i thun mong min pa'i ye shes yin par
NK045(bi)002:1484: de la 'phags pa kun gyi spangs rtogs sdud par
NK045(bi)002:1485: ston pa'i mdo la sdud byed kyi ngos nas bstan
NK045(bi)002:1486: pa dang / ji ltar sdud tshul bstan pa gnyis las dang po /
NK045(bi)002:1488: rgyal po btang snyoms sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang /
NK045(bi)002:1489: gnyis pa rgyal po'i dpes bstan pa /
NK045(bi)002:1490: rgyal po grong du sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1491: theg chen gyi rtogs rigs su gnas pa'i sher phyin
NK045(bi)002:1492: dang ma bral bas don ji lta ba bzhin rtogs
NK045(bi)002:1493: pa la mngon shes myur bas byang chub mngon du
NK045(bi)002:1494: byed pa'i mdo la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:1495: dang po gang la bde gshegs sogs tshigs bcad gcig /
NK045(bi)002:1496: gnyis pa la dpe don gyi sgo nas tshigs bcad gsum gsum ste /
NK045(bi)002:1497: dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sogs so //
NK045(bi)002:1498: 'gog bden mthong ba'i ye shes bzhi las /
NK045(bi)002:1499: 'dir lam sgrub pa dang 'bras bu 'grub pa gnyis bstan pas /
NK045(bi)002:1500: lam des dmigs yul de bzhin nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:1501: de yang bri gang med pas khyad par du byas
NK045(bi)002:1502: pa yin par don gyis shes te gong du bsam
NK045(bi)002:1503: gyis mi khyab par bstan pa sogs dang gnad gcig
NK045(bi)002:1504: go // de la dang po la dpe don gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1505: dper na la las rdza so ma btang sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:1506: de yang thabs shes khyad par can zung du 'brel
NK045(bi)002:1507: ba'i lam ni mi gnas pa'i myang 'das sgrub par
NK045(bi)002:1508: byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni de lta ma yin
NK045(bi)002:1509: no des bstan par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:1510: gnyis pa 'bras bu byang chub chen po yang dag
NK045(bi)002:1511: par 'grub pa ni dpe don gnyis kyis bstan te
NK045(bi)002:1512: / dper na bcos legs sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:1513: de yang mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i sher phyin
NK045(bi)002:1514: dang ma bral ba'i mthus mthar thug gi 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:1515: thob pa'i bar du chud mi za bar /
NK045(bi)002:1516: 'bras bu'i sar nges par 'byin par byas nas ji ltar thugs bskyed pa ltar 'grub ces so //
NK045(bi)002:1517: lam bden rtogs pa'i ye shes bzhi ka 'dir yang gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1518: de yang dpe'i sgo nas spyir bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1519: lo brgya nyi shu lon sogs sho lo ka gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1520: lam las mi nyams pa phyi nang gi yongs 'dzin la rag las pa'i dape'o //
NK045(bi)002:1521: don ni byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i sogs nas
NK045(bi)002:1522: de skad bstan par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan
NK045(bi)002:1523: te / byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi
NK045(bi)002:1524: sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi rkang pa dang po gsum
NK045(bi)002:1526: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla med byang chub la dmigs pa po rten gyi gang zag bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1527: de rjes rkang pa lngas phyi nang gi yongs 'dzin bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1528: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs nas bsngo bar gyis zhes
NK045(bi)002:1529: pa'i bar gyis lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dag tshang
NK045(bi)002:1530: bar bstan / de rjes rkang pa gnyis kyis lam
NK045(bi)002:1531: la mchog 'dzin dang mngon zhen gyis ro myang med
NK045(bi)002:1532: bar bstan / pa bstan to // mdo rgyas bsdus
NK045(bi)002:1533: kyi dpe ston pa'i skabs 'ga' zhig phan tshun bsnol
NK045(bi)002:1534: na'ang don mi 'gal bar shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:1535: de yang khyad mtshan bcu drug po 'di dag ni
NK045(bi)002:1536: yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pas khyad
NK045(bi)002:1537: par du byas pa de bzhin nyid la yang dag
NK045(bi)002:1538: par dmigs pa'i yul can yin pas theg gsum gyi
NK045(bi)002:1539: spangs rtogs kun sdud pa sogs dman lam las ches
NK045(bi)002:1541: byed mtshan la rgyas par bcu gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:1542: gzhi shes kyi byed pa gsum ni /
NK045(bi)002:1543: gnas skabs mngon mtho'i bde ba byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1544: mthar thug nges legs kyi phan pa byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1545: myang 'das la 'god pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal mtha'
NK045(bi)002:1546: dag las gtan du skyob pa ste phan bde skyob
NK045(bi)002:1548: gzhi phung sogs ldan pa'i sems can la byed las de dag 'jug pa'i ldog cha nas so //
NK045(bi)002:1549: lam shes sbyor ba'i byed mtshan bdun ni /
NK045(bi)002:1550: skye 'gag med par rtogs pa'i lam gyis gnas kyi
NK045(bi)002:1551: bya ba byed de dngos por 'dzin pa'i rgyus sdug
NK045(bi)002:1552: bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas
NK045(bi)002:1554: mtshan ma'i rtog pas zin cing mnar ba rnams la
NK045(bi)002:1555: blang dor med par rtogs pa'i lam gyis dpung gnyen
NK045(bi)002:1556: byed pa dang / rtag chad srid zhi'i mtha' 'gog
NK045(bi)002:1557: pas chu bo'i dbus kyi gling lta bu'i bya ba
NK045(bi)002:1558: byed pa dang / byed pa dang / gnas skabs
NK045(bi)002:1559: dang mthar thug gi don gnyis grub pa'i skam sar
NK045(bi)002:1560: yongs su 'dren par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1561: dmigs pa med pas gzhan don rtsol med lhun gyis grub par byed do //
NK045(bi)002:1562: yang gzhan don du theg gsum gyis nges par 'byung
NK045(bi)002:1563: yang rang don du de'i 'bras bu mngon suma mi
NK045(bi)002:1564: byed pa dang bdun yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1565: rnam mkhyen gyi byed mtshan gcig ni rten gyi mdzad pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:1566: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sku
NK045(bi)002:1567: thob nas de nyid phyogs dus kyi 'gro ba ma
NK045(bi)002:1568: lus pa'i gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don kun
NK045(bi)002:1569: yid bzhin rjes su 'jo ba'i rten du gyur pa
NK045(bi)002:1570: ste / de yang chos thams cad rnam mkhyen gyi
NK045(bi)002:1571: ngang tshul las mi 'da' bar mngon par byang chub
NK045(bi)002:1572: pa'i bdag nyid du gzigs pa las nam yang mi
NK045(bi)002:1573: g.yo bzhin du 'bad rtsol med par dus kun tu
NK045(bi)002:1574: ste / rtag pa dang / phyogs thams cad du
NK045(bi)002:1575: khyab pa'i phrin las kyi 'jug pas 'gro ba rnams
NK045(bi)002:1576: gnas skabs lam gyi rten dang lam la 'god cing
NK045(bi)002:1577: ste / rtag pa dang / / mthar thug mi
NK045(bi)002:1578: gnas pa'i myang 'das byang chub chen po'i tshul la
NK045(bi)002:1580: skabs 'dir byed mtshan ston pa'i mdo ni de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:1581: 'gro ba rnams gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan
NK045(bi)002:1582: bde la 'god pa'i sgo nas skyob pa ni gzhi
NK045(bi)002:1584: phan bde gnyis logs su ma bshad kyang der 'adu'o //
NK045(bi)002:1585: dpung gnyen la sogs pa rang tshig rang rang gis gsal la /
NK045(bi)002:1586: 'bras bu mngon du mi byed pa don 'dod pa zhes gzhan don 'dod pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1587: de yang gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba zhes pas gzhan phan lhur byed pa bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1588: mi 'khrugs zhes pas spros pa'am 'bad rtsol gyis mi g.yo bar bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1589: de la snang byed dam gsal byed ni gang zag gi bdag med ston pa /
NK045(bi)002:1590: sgron ma chos bdag med ston pa /
NK045(bi)002:1591: chos mchog smra ba yang dag rig pa bzhi /
NK045(bi)002:1592: mi 'khrugs pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi'am spobs pa'i gter brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1593: phan dang mi phan shes pa'i blo gros kyang mdo 'dir gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1594: 'di rnams sbyor ba bsgoms pa las 'byung bar byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1595: ngo bo nyid mtshan la rgyas par bcu drug ste /
NK045(bi)002:1597: chags sogs nyon mongs pas dben pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1598: nyon mongs de'i rtags sgo gsum gyi gnas ngan len gyis dben pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1599: nyon mongs de'i rgyu ni mtshan ma ste gtsang ba de rtag bdag gi rtog pas dben pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1600: mi mthun phyogs nyon mongs dang gnyen po nyon mongs
NK045(bi)002:1601: med pa la der zhen gyis dben pa ste de
NK045(bi)002:1602: yang snga ma gsum nyon sgrib kyis dben pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1603: / phyi ma gcig shes sgrib kyis dben pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1604: lam shes kyi lnga ste don dam par sems can
NK045(bi)002:1605: ma dmigs kyang kun rdzob tu de bsgral ba'i go
NK045(bi)002:1606: bgo bas bya dka' ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1607: lam dman par mi ltung bar theg chen lam du nges pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1608: ched du bya ba chen po gsum don du gnyer ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:1609: yul sgom pa'i 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1610: yul can gzugs nas rnam mkhyen bar la mngon par zhen pa mtha' dag bkag pa dang lnga'o //
NK045(bi)002:1611: rnam mkhyen gyi bdun te mkhyen gsum gyi yul mtha' dag gi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1612: dngos dngos med kyi 'dzin pa kun spangs pas 'jig rten kun dang mi mthun pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1613: shes bya'i chos kun la ye shes kyi gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1614: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor rtogs bya'i gzhi med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1615: de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bos gong nas gong du 'bras bur 'gro ba med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1616: rgyu med pas rang gi ngo bos skye ba med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1617: mtha' bzhir dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid tsam du'ang mi dmigs pa dang bdun no //
NK045(bi)002:1618: mdo 'dir ni gzhi shes kyi bzhi po logs su ma bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1619: lam shes kyi mi dmigs pa dang mngon zhen bkag par /
NK045(bi)002:1620: phyi ma gnyis 'du la snga ma gnyis de'i yon tan yin par don gyis 'dir 'dus pas so //
NK045(bi)002:1622: grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1623: de la rkang pa dang pos bya dka' ba /
NK045(bi)002:1625: gsum pas mngon zhen bkag pa /
NK045(bi)002:1626: bzhi pas mi ldog pa zhes pas mthar 'bras chen
NK045(bi)002:1627: po gsum ldan rnam mkhyen las mi ldog pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1628: / g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can zhes
NK045(bi)002:1629: pas gnas skabs rang lam las g.yo ba med cing
NK045(bi)002:1630: sdig grogs sogs rkyen gyis kyang mi 'khrugs pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:1632: tshigs bcad phyi mas de'i rgyu mtshan gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:1633: ci phyir mi g.yo zhe na de dag 'di 'dra'i sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bshad cing /
NK045(bi)002:1634: ci phyir mi ldog pa shes rab pha rol phyin
NK045(bi)002:1635: pa thos nas sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bshad par
NK045(bi)002:1636: mdzad do // rnam mkhyen gyi ngo bo nyid mtshan ni /
NK045(bi)002:1637: 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis /
NK045(bi)002:1638: zab ste zhes pas de bzhin nyid du'ang mi dmigs par bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1639: mthong bar dka' zhes pas gzhi med bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1640: sus kyang rtogs pa med ces pas lam 'gro med /
NK045(bi)002:1641: thob pa med ces pas 'bras bu skye med bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1642: tshul de lta bu gzhan gyis rtogs dka' ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)002:1643: chos ston pa la thugs khral chung ngu'i tshul mdzad
NK045(bi)002:1644: ces so // mi mthun pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1645: sems can rnams ni sogs sho lo ka gcig /
NK045(bi)002:1646: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1647: nam mkha'i khams ni sogs dpe don gyi tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1648: de ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gzigs
NK045(bi)002:1649: pas chos can ji snyed pa kun la gzigs pa
NK045(bi)002:1650: thogs med du 'jug pa ni don gyis shes te
NK045(bi)002:1651: / bden gnyis dbyer med du rtogs pa'i ye shes mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:1652: mdo rgyas par 'gro ba med par bstan pa'i skabs
NK045(bi)002:1653: 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos so rab tu g.yos
NK045(bi)002:1654: so sogs rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang mtshan ma
NK045(bi)002:1655: chen po bco brgyad byung ste /
NK045(bi)002:1662: sgra rjes su sgrogs pa drug yin la /
NK045(bi)002:1663: de dag la rim pa bzhin g.yo ba 'gul ba
NK045(bi)002:1664: ldeg pa chem pa 'khrugs pa 'ur ba zhes bya
NK045(bi)002:1665: la / de re re bzhin chung 'bring chen pos
NK045(bi)002:1666: dbye bas bco brgyad la ltas sam mtshan ma bco
NK045(bi)002:1667: la / brgyad ces bya'o // rgyud la bskyed bya thar pa cha mthun ni /
NK045(bi)002:1668: mtshan ma med pa'i sgo nas lam dang 'bras bu'i
NK045(bi)002:1669: bar gyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa la mkhas
NK045(bi)002:1670: pa thar pa cha mthun nam tshogs lam gyi gnas
NK045(bi)002:1671: skabs yin la / de yang sangs rgyas dang byang
NK045(bi)002:1672: sems kyi zag med kyi phung po la bden par
NK045(bi)002:1673: ma zhen pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pa'i dad pa sogs
NK045(bi)002:1674: khyad par can gyi dbang po lnga'i bdag nyid can
NK045(bi)002:1675: skabs yin la / yin la / mdo rgyas par ni /
NK045(bi)002:1677: sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs
NK045(bi)002:1678: pa mtshan ma med par yid la byed kyang mtshan
NK045(bi)002:1679: mar yid la mi byed de 'di ma snad ma
NK045(bi)002:1680: smas par sangs rgya'o zhes snad pa nyan rang gi
NK045(bi)002:1682: smas pa byang sems kyi lam las cung zad nyams pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1683: de bzhin du brtson 'grus ni sbyin sogs la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1684: dran pa ni sher phyin dang thabs mkhas ma bral
NK045(bi)002:1685: ba'i bsam pa can byang chub la the tshom med
NK045(bi)002:1687: ting 'dzin ni gang gis 'tshang rgya ba gang sangs rgyas pa'i gzugs sam sogs kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:1689: byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rtogs par yang
NK045(bi)002:1690: bya ba dang chos de dag ma mchis shing sogs
NK045(bi)002:1692: bde gshegs byang chub sogs sho lo ka gsum gyis te /
NK045(bi)002:1693: bya la gshog pa zung du ma ldan na 'phur
NK045(bi)002:1694: bar brtsams kyang nyams nyes par 'gyur la gshog pa
NK045(bi)002:1695: zung du ldan na gang 'dod du 'phur nus pa
NK045(bi)002:1696: bzhin / thabs sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dad sogs
NK045(bi)002:1697: bzhi dang shes rab phar phyin zung du ldan na
NK045(bi)002:1698: bde bar gshegs pa'i byang chub thob la /
NK045(bi)002:1699: thabs shes dang bral na mi thob par bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1700: de'i phyir dad sogs lnga po 'di ci tsam rno
NK045(bi)002:1701: ba bzhin bla med byang chub kyi don rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:1703: de nas sbyor ba khyad par can rgyud la skyes pa'i sgom rim nges 'byed bzhi bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)002:1704: skabs 'dir drod sogs bzhi'i dmigs yul ni sems can yin par bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:1705: sngar ni mnyam bzhag gi rtogs pa gtso bor byas
NK045(bi)002:1706: pas drod sogs kyi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
NK045(bi)002:1708: 'dir rjes thob gtso bor byas nas snying rje'i yul sems can dmigs par bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:1709: de yang mnyam bzhag tu stong pa nyid la goms
NK045(bi)002:1710: pa'i lag rjes su rjes thob na snying rje'i shugs
NK045(bi)002:1711: dang gzhan phan gyi 'jug pa cher 'phel ba ni
NK045(bi)002:1712: 'di ltar / drod chung ngu'i skabs su sems can
NK045(bi)002:1713: rnams la chags sdang gis ris su ma bcad par
NK045(bi)002:1715: da lta phan pa bsgrub pa byamsa pa'i semsa gnyis 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)002:1717: ma 'ongs pa'i phan pa sgrub 'dod phan pa'i sems dang /
NK045(bi)002:1718: rang rgyud kyi nga rgyal bcom pas gzhan bde la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
NK045(bi)002:1719: gzhan la tho mi brtsams pas rnam para 'tshe ba med pa'i sems gsum 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)002:1720: drod chen po'i rjes thob tu skyes pa dang bud
NK045(bi)002:1721: med rang las rgan pa la pha da nga ma'i
NK045(bi)002:1722: sems dang / mnyam pa la spun zla dang sring mo'i sems dang /
NK045(bi)002:1723: gzhon pa la bu dang bu mo'i sems dang /
NK045(bi)002:1724: phan 'dogs pa'i bshes dang yid brtan pa'i grogs kyi sems dang /
NK045(bi)002:1725: pha rus gcig pa'i gnyen dang ma'i rus gcig pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1726: snag gi gnyen tshan gyi sems te zung lnga 'byung
NK045(bi)002:1727: ngo // rtse mo chung ngu'i dmigs pa yul sems
NK045(bi)002:1728: can la dmigs nas de'i ched du bdag nyid sdig
NK045(bi)002:1729: pa las ldog cing gzhan de la 'god lus pa
NK045(bi)002:1730: dang basngagasa ngag pa dang mthun yid par byed pa
NK045(bi)002:1731: ngo // dang / 'bring gi skabs su rang sbyin
NK045(bi)002:1732: sogs la gnas nas gzhan de la 'god pa sogs
NK045(bi)002:1733: ngo // dang / dang / chen po rang stong
NK045(bi)002:1734: rten 'brel zab mo'i don la gnas nas gzhan 'god
NK045(bi)002:1735: ngo // dang / dang / pa sogs so //
NK045(bi)002:1736: bzod chung rang bden bzhi shes spang mngon byed brten
NK045(bi)002:1737: pa la gnas nas gzhan de la 'god basngagasa mthun
NK045(bi)002:1739: 'bring por rang rgyun zhugs sogs kyi 'bras bu sgrub
NK045(bi)002:1740: tshul shes kyang mngon du mi byed pa la gnas
NK045(bi)002:1741: nas gzhan de'i rigs can de la 'god sogs dang
NK045(bi)002:1742: / chen po rang byang sems kyi mthong lam bskyed
NK045(bi)002:1743: pa'i rgyud dam tshul la gnas nas gzhan de la
NK045(bi)002:1744: / 'god sogs so // chos mchog chung ngu rang
NK045(bi)002:1745: sems can smin par 'dod pa dang zhing sbyong ba
NK045(bi)002:1746: la gnas nas gzhan de la 'god sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:1747: 'bring po rang byang sems kyi mngon shes bskyed pa la gnas nas gzhan de la 'god sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:1748: chen po rang rnam mkhyen bskyed pa dang bag chags
NK045(bi)002:1749: kyi mtshams sbyor spong ba la gnas nas gzhan yang
NK045(bi)002:1752: yid kyis mthun par byed pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:1753: shes rab dang snying rje khyad par gong du 'phel
NK045(bi)002:1754: ba las de ltar rlabs che chung du snang ba
NK045(bi)002:1755: ni gtso che ba'i sgo nas bzhag pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1756: de ltar rgyas par bstan pa dag skabs 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:1757: sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis te /
NK045(bi)002:1758: sems snyoms pa dang pha ma'i 'du shes sogs dngos
NK045(bi)002:1759: su bstan pas ma bshad pa gzhan don gyis 'phang
NK045(bi)002:1760: la / sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod ces pas /
NK045(bi)002:1761: rang dge bcu dang lam la gnas nas gzhan 'god par don gyis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:1762: da ni sbyor ba sgom pa'i gang zag gi dbang
NK045(bi)002:1763: du byas te phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags thob pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1765: rtags can gyi gang zag ni sbyor lam bzhi dang mthong lam sgom lam gang rung la gnas pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:1766: de yang spyir dbang rnon tshogs lam nas lam ma
NK045(bi)002:1767: gol bar 'gro ba yod pas de dus nas kyang
NK045(bi)002:1768: phyir mi ldog pa yod la /
NK045(bi)002:1769: khyad par theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rtse mo'am
NK045(bi)002:1770: bzod pa thob nas phyir mi ldog nges kyang 'dir
NK045(bi)002:1771: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags las phyir mi ldog par
NK045(bi)002:1772: nges nus pa las bzhag ste /
NK045(bi)002:1773: rang dang gzhan gyis rtags kyi sgo nas nges ma
NK045(bi)002:1774: nus na don la phyir mi ldog kyang phyir mi
NK045(bi)002:1775: ldog par 'jog byed ma rnyed pas de'i ming mi
NK045(bi)002:1776: thob bo // des na dbang rnon drod nas dang /
NK045(bi)002:1778: dbang po ji ltar rtul yang sa brgyad pa nas rtags thob nges pas na /
NK045(bi)002:1779: drod nas sa brgyad pa'i bar gyi rtags de dag bshad do //
NK045(bi)002:1780: de ltar yang mdo las rnam pa dang rtags dang
NK045(bi)002:1781: mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)002:1782: dpa' phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o zhes gsungs
NK045(bi)002:1783: pas / rnam pa ni me'i tsha ba dang dma'
NK045(bi)002:1784: 'bar ba lta bu ste byang sems de'i rgyud kyi
NK045(bi)002:1785: yon tan khyad par can mthong ba'o //
NK045(bi)002:1786: rtags ni 'bras bu ste du ba las mer shes
NK045(bi)002:1787: pa ltar de'i rgyud la yon tan khyad par can
NK045(bi)002:1788: yod pa'i 'bras bu bden pa'i tshigs grub pa la
NK045(bi)002:1790: mtshan ma ni rgyu las rjes su dpag ste ma
NK045(bi)002:1791: 'ongs pa na yon tan khyad par can thob pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1793: dper na bud shing dang me lcags me rdo skyes
NK045(bi)002:1794: bu'i rtsol ba rnams tshogs pa las me 'byung nges
NK045(bi)002:1795: so snyam du shes pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:1796: rgyu la gegs byed pa srid pas na rgyu tsam
NK045(bi)002:1797: gyis 'bras bu mi dpog snyam na spyir bden yang
NK045(bi)002:1798: / phyi nang gi yongs su 'dzin pa khyad par
NK045(bi)002:1799: can gyis zin pa'i byang sems kyis spyod pa phul
NK045(bi)002:1800: du byung ba ni stobs dang ldan pas gegs gang
NK045(bi)002:1801: gis kyang bardzi mi nus pas rang 'bras thob par
NK045(bi)002:1802: nus te dpung mang gi mgron po gang 'dod pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1803: gnas su bde bar phyin nges pa dang 'khor sgyur
NK045(bi)002:1804: dang sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gnas skabs bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:1805: des na rgyu'i tshogs pa tshang bas rang 'bras phyi ma phyi ma bskyed par nges shing /
NK045(bi)002:1806: des bar chad kyi go skabs mi 'jug par mthar 'bras kyi rgyu tshogs pa tshang bar byed do //
NK045(bi)002:1807: des na rgyu mtshan gyi bstan bcos las lag par
NK045(bi)002:1808: 'khor lo'i ri mo gsal ba las rgyal por 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:1810: rgyu'i bye brag khyad par can las ma 'ongs 'byung
NK045(bi)002:1811: 'gyur gyi mtshan ma gsal ba la mtshan ma zhes
NK045(bi)002:1812: bshad do // de yang lam gyi gnas skabs kyi
NK045(bi)002:1813: rtags gos la sogs pa gtsang ba lta bu de
NK045(bi)002:1814: dag byang chub sems dpa'i nang gi bsam pa khyad
NK045(bi)002:1815: par can rang don zhi ba don gnyer gyi blo
NK045(bi)002:1816: mngon gyur log pa'i snying rje dang /
NK045(bi)002:1817: sbyor ba thabs shes khyad par can gyi rtog pa
NK045(bi)002:1818: brtan po dang 'brel ba yin pa las rtags su
NK045(bi)002:1820: de yang rtags mang du yod kyang mdor bsdus te
NK045(bi)002:1821: yum gzhan du sbyor lam phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags
NK045(bi)002:1822: nyi shu / mthong lam gyi rtags bcu drug /
NK045(bi)002:1823: sgom lam pa'i zab mo brgyad ldan gyi chos nyid rtogs pa rnams su yod pa las /
NK045(bi)002:1824: gzugs sogs la bden zhen mngon gyur pa ldog pa
NK045(bi)002:1825: skyabs gsum la the tshom mngon gyur ba mi skye
NK045(bi)002:1826: ba sogs drod la gnas pa phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1827: rtags bcu gcig / lus la srin bu'i rigs brgyad
NK045(bi)002:1828: khri mi 'byung ba sogs drug rtse mo pa'i rtags
NK045(bi)002:1829: rtags bcu gcig / dang / lam las gzhan gyis drangs mi btub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1830: lam gzhan bcos ma ston pa'i bdud la bdud du shes pa gnyis bzod pa /
NK045(bi)002:1831: kun spyod thams cad du sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod
NK045(bi)002:1832: pa la gnas pa chos mchog pa'i rtags te nyi
NK045(bi)002:1834: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes pa nas dring mi 'jog
NK045(bi)002:1835: pa'i bar gyis sbyor lam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1836: rtags gsungs te / gzugs la sogs par bden zhen
NK045(bi)002:1837: mngon gyur pa las ldog pas tha dad pa'i 'du
NK045(bi)002:1839: de yang rang rgyud na zab mo'i chos de lta
NK045(bi)002:1840: bu yod pa ni chos nyid zab mo dang mi
NK045(bi)002:1841: 'gal bar rigs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ba
NK045(bi)002:1843: skyabs gsum la the tshom med par yid ches pas
NK045(bi)002:1844: bstan pa 'di las gzhan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram
NK045(bi)002:1845: ze la lam ston pa'i skyabs su mi brten pa
NK045(bi)002:1846: 2 / mi dge mngon gyur spangs pas dus kun tu ngan song spang ba 3 /
NK045(bi)002:1847: rang dge bcu la gnas shing gzhan der 'god par brtson pa 4 /
NK045(bi)002:1848: gzhan la zang zing med par chos ston pa sogs gzhan don du sbyin sogs la 'jug pa 5 /
NK045(bi)002:1849: zab mo'i don la som nyi med pas chos la gcig tu dga' ba 6 /
NK045(bi)002:1850: des ma rig pa dang lta ba'i bag la nyal
NK045(bi)002:1851: kun mgo smad pa'i sgo nas 'joms pa shugs la
NK045(bi)002:1852: bstan 7 / rtag tu tshig 'jam por smra ba
NK045(bi)002:1853: sogs byams pa'i lus ngag yid kyi las gsum dang
NK045(bi)002:1855: dang 'dug par dran pa dang shes bzhin rab tu
NK045(bi)002:1856: ldan pa ste ji ltar na gnya' shing gang tsam
NK045(bi)002:1857: lta ba sogs kyis mtshon pa'o 9 //
NK045(bi)002:1858: des sgrib pa rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs pa shugs la bstan to 10 /
NK045(bi)002:1859: phyi nang gi kun spyod gtsang mar byas shing gtsang ma'i gos sogs 'chang ba'o 11 //
NK045(bi)002:1860: rtse mo pa phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags lus la
NK045(bi)002:1861: srin bu mi 'byung ba dang sems la gya gyu
NK045(bi)002:1862: med pa ni / sgo gsum dben zhing dag ces
NK045(bi)002:1863: pas te sems gya gyus dben zhing lus ngag rnam
NK045(bi)002:1865: rnyed pa mi 'dod par sbyangs yon len pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1866: khyu mchog ces pas rang rgyud ser sna dang 'chal tshul sogs kyi dri ma med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1867: gzhan don du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kyang 'tshol ba
NK045(bi)002:1868: ste dang du len pa gnyis kyi sgo nas skyes
NK045(bi)002:1869: bu rnams kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1870: rtag tu chos sher phyin 'dod cing de dang ma
NK045(bi)002:1871: bral bar 'jug pas spyod lam thams cad du chos
NK045(bi)002:1872: nyid dang ldan par 'gro ba drug go //
NK045(bi)002:1874: bdud kyi yul las 'das pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1875: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i blo gros kyi
NK045(bi)002:1876: mthus gzhan gyis bkri bar mi btub pa gnyis so
NK045(bi)002:1877: // chos mchog gi rtags sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod
NK045(bi)002:1878: pa ni dngos su ma gsungs te gong gi yon
NK045(bi)002:1879: tan rnams 'phel ba chos mchog la gnas pa ni
NK045(bi)002:1880: spyod lam thams cad sangs rgyas dgyes pa ste ma
NK045(bi)002:1881: dag pa rdul tsam med par don gnyis sgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1882: spyod pa rmad du byung ba can zhig go //
NK045(bi)002:1883: zhes mchog tu 'phang bar shes par bya la /
NK045(bi)002:1884: yang na bdud kyi yul las 'das pas bzod pa'i rtags gnyis ka bsdus la /
NK045(bi)002:1885: gzhan dring mi 'jog par chos nyid zab mo la
NK045(bi)002:1886: rang byan tshud pa chos mchog pa phyir mi ldog
NK045(bi)002:1887: pa'i rtags su bshad kyang don gyis mi 'gal lo
NK045(bi)002:1888: // mthong lam la shes bzod kyi ye shes skad
NK045(bi)002:1889: cig ma bcu drug ni mthong lam pa phyir mi
NK045(bi)002:1890: ldog pa'i rtags su gsungs pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:1891: mthong lam gyi ye shes rang nyid min te gzhan
NK045(bi)002:1892: la rtags su snang du mi rung ba'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)002:1893: // 'o na gang zhe na rgyu mnyam bzhag gi
NK045(bi)002:1894: ye shes las 'bras bu rjes thob na 'byung ba'i
NK045(bi)002:1895: rtags khyad par can rnams so //
NK045(bi)002:1896: de la ye shes bcu drug gis ming gis btags
NK045(bi)002:1897: pa ni rgyu ming 'bras bu la btags pa yin
NK045(bi)002:1898: la / de ltar btags pa'i dgos pa ni gdul
NK045(bi)002:1899: bya 'dul ba'i dbang ma gtogs par byang sems rnams
NK045(bi)002:1900: kyi rjes thob ni mnyam bzhag dang rnam pa cha
NK045(bi)002:1902: de ltar na mnyam bzhag tu chos nyid mngon sum mthong ba'i stobs las /
NK045(bi)002:1903: rjes thob tu rtags bcu drug tu gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:1904: de'ang yum gzhan dang skabs 'di'i rtags mi 'dra ba
NK045(bi)002:1905: 'ga' yod kyang don bcu drug tu 'dra bas lugs
NK045(bi)002:1906: de gnyis gang yin yang phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags
NK045(bi)002:1907: yin par khyad med pas phan tshun bstun mi dgos
NK045(bi)002:1908: zhes 'grel pa 'ga' na gsungs pa de ltar yin
NK045(bi)002:1909: la / 'on kyang go rim mi 'dra ba ma
NK045(bi)002:1910: gtogs phal cher don la khyad med par mthong zhing
NK045(bi)002:1911: la / / go rim ni gang ltar sbyar kyang 'gal ba med de /
NK045(bi)002:1912: bcu drug po mthong lam gyi rjes las thob pa'i 'bras bur khyad med la /
NK045(bi)002:1913: so sor sbyar ba ni ldog chas phye ba'i shes
NK045(bi)002:1914: bzod kyi ye shes bcu drug mtshon par byed pa
NK045(bi)002:1915: tsam las rgyu so sos 'bras bu so sor bskyed
NK045(bi)002:1916: pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:1917: de yang bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan sogs nas /
NK045(bi)002:1918: rnal 'byor rab tu brtson zhes pa'i bar gyis gsungs la /
NK045(bi)002:1919: bsam gtan gzhi la bsam gtan byas kyang der skye ba'i yan lag tu mi byed pa /
NK045(bi)002:1920: bsam gtan la sogs pa'i yan lag yongs su zad pa zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:1921: des mtshon nas gzugs med dang 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug
NK045(bi)002:1922: thob kyang der skye ba dang 'jug pa mngon du
NK045(bi)002:1924: grags pa sogs tshe 'di'i don dang rang zhi ba
NK045(bi)002:1925: don gnyer gyi 'dod pa med par bla med la
NK045(bi)002:1927: sems khro ba sogs kyis kun nas dkris pa med
NK045(bi)002:1928: pas sems dge ba la bkol du btub pas yang
NK045(bi)002:1929: ba dang des mtshon nas lus yang ba dang 3
NK045(bi)002:1930: / khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun
NK045(bi)002:1931: la ma chags pas 'dod yon la spyod pa na'ang
NK045(bi)002:1932: de la ma zhen zhing sems can 'dul ba'i thabs
NK045(bi)002:1933: mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang 4 /
NK045(bi)002:1934: 'tsho ba'i phyir yang ba srog gcod dang kha gsags
NK045(bi)002:1935: la sogs pas 'tsho ba mi sgrub pa 'tsho ba
NK045(bi)002:1937: ser sna dang tshul 'chal khong khro sogs la sbyor
NK045(bi)002:1938: ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa bkag pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1939: rtags su drag shul spyod pa'i sngags sogs gzhan la
NK045(bi)002:1940: gnod pa mi byed pa dang 6 /
NK045(bi)002:1941: rtag tu tshangs par spyod pas bud med dang 'phrad
NK045(bi)002:1942: pa'am sbyor ba'i sngags sogs mi byed pa dang 7
NK045(bi)002:1943: / mngon par shes pa thob kyang rang bsgrags pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1944: phyir 'dod pa'i las can pho mor 'gyur ba sogs
NK045(bi)002:1946: chos rdul tsam ma dmigs pas rab tu dben pa sher phyin la brtson pa dang 9 /
NK045(bi)002:1947: rtag tu 'thab rtsod dang bral la byams pa'i sems
NK045(bi)002:1948: brtan pas theg pa dman pa las log pa dang
NK045(bi)002:1949: 10 / kun mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'dod pa dang 11 /
NK045(bi)002:1950: de thob pa'i rgyu bstan pa la rtag tu gzhol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang 12 /
NK045(bi)002:1951: dge rtsa khyad par can gyi stobs thob pas chos
NK045(bi)002:1952: mi dar ba mtha' 'khob kla klo'i yul rnam par
NK045(bi)002:1954: rang gis te mkhyen gsum gyi gnas la yid ches
NK045(bi)002:1955: pa'i nges pa nyid thob nas dogs med rtag tu
NK045(bi)002:1957: chos kyi phyir srog 'dor ba la mi nus pa med pa dang 15 /
NK045(bi)002:1958: rtag tu rnal 'byor zab mo la brtson pas tha
NK045(bi)002:1959: mal gzugs su mngon zhen gyi 'du shes ldog pa
NK045(bi)002:1961: de yang mdo gzhan du phung khams rten 'brel la
NK045(bi)002:1962: sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bas gnas pa bkag
NK045(bi)002:1963: pa dang / rkun po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang
NK045(bi)002:1964: rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas pa dang zhes
NK045(bi)002:1965: pa dang / pa / dge ba'i nor 'phrog pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1966: rkun po ste bar chad kyi phyogs la rkun po'i
NK045(bi)002:1968: de bzhin du dmag gi sgras sbyin pa sogs tshogs kyi dpung la mang nyung du zhen pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1972: rgyal blon gyi sgras bdag dang bdag gi ba /
NK045(bi)002:1973: g.yul 'gyed pa'i gtam zhes pas spang gnyen sprad pa bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:1974: 'di rnams la gtam zhes pas ming tsam las don
NK045(bi)002:1975: ma grub pa la der zhen mi bya ba'i slad
NK045(bi)002:1976: du bstan to zhes bshad la /
NK045(bi)002:1977: mngon zhen med pa'i gnad kyis dngos bstan grong sogs
NK045(bi)002:1978: dang mtshon don dbang po sogs kyi mngon 'dod zhig
NK045(bi)002:1979: pas de gtam du yang yang smra zhing lus kyis
NK045(bi)002:1981: mi byed pa yang don gyis bstan tam snyam ste /
NK045(bi)002:1982: gtam zhe 'dod kyi rjes su byed pas nang gi rnam pa mtshon pa'i rtags yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:1983: sbyor ba dang rjes sbyor ni yul de la mngon zhen gyi sbyor ba la gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:1984: de la rgyun du zhen nas rjes su sbyor bas
NK045(bi)002:1985: gnas pa yin la de dag med par bstan pa'o
NK045(bi)002:1986: // de rnams 'dir ma gsungs la 'dir ni de'i
NK045(bi)002:1987: dod du drag shul spyod sngags mi byed pa sogs
NK045(bi)002:1988: gzhan gsungs pa rnams ni dbye bsdu'i khyad par ji
NK045(bi)002:1989: ltar byas kyang don la rtags su 'dra bar shes
NK045(bi)002:1990: // par bya'o // de nas sgom lam gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)002:1991: rtags can sgom lam dang de'i rtags gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:1992: dang po la rgyas par sgom lam gyi ngo bo /
NK045(bi)002:1994: rab dbye gsum gyis gsungs pa'i dang po skabs 'dir
NK045(bi)002:1995: gzugs dang tshor dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan
NK045(bi)002:1996: te / gzugs sogs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:1997: tshul gyis gting ngam gnas mi rnyed pas zab pa
NK045(bi)002:1999: de'i phyir de la dmigs pa'i blo skyed pa'i mtshan ma med cing /
NK045(bi)002:2000: des na de la brten pa'i yul can skye ba
NK045(bi)002:2001: rab tu zhi ba rnam thar gsum ldan gyi rang
NK045(bi)002:2002: bzhin du gnas pa de ni sgro skur dang bral
NK045(bi)002:2003: ba'i de kho nyid yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2004: de la rjes su son pa'i sgom lam gyi ye shes kyang de ltar zab pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:2005: de yang 'dir zab mor 'jog pa nges tshig gi sgo nas bshad de /
NK045(bi)002:2006: nges 'byed yan lag gi skabs nas de kho na
NK045(bi)002:2007: nyid la sgro 'dogs bcad de yang nas yang du
NK045(bi)002:2008: sems pa dang / mthong lam du de kho na nyid mngon sum 'jal ba yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2009: sgom lam rtogs zin yang yang goms pas sngar las
NK045(bi)002:2010: je bas je zab tu song nas ches nges par
NK045(bi)002:2012: 'di'i rtogs pa la zab par bzhag ste mthong zin goms pa'i lam yin pas so zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:2013: de dag mdo 'dir ma bstan te dbye ba bstan pa'i don gyis bstan par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:2014: sgom lam gyi dbye ba la dngos dang rtsod spong gnyis las dang po /
NK045(bi)002:2015: sgom lam de mthong lam ltar skad cig ma ma
NK045(bi)002:2016: yin zhing rgyun chags pa yin pas spang bya che
NK045(bi)002:2017: 'bring chung gsum la nang gses gsum du phye ba
NK045(bi)002:2018: dgu'i gnyen po rim bzhin skye ba yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:2019: mdo rgyas pa na spang bya rnam rtog chen po'i
NK045(bi)002:2020: chen po'i dbang du byas te sher phyin dang bral
NK045(bi)002:2021: bar bskal pa gang g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK045(bi)002:2022: du sbyin pa byin pa bas zhes de dang de'i
NK045(bi)002:2023: gnyen po chung ngu'i chung ngu'i dbang du byas te
NK045(bi)002:2024: sher phyin nyan pa phan yon che bas bstan la
NK045(bi)002:2025: / de bzhin du 'bring po sogs gong 'phel du
NK045(bi)002:2026: glag ste gsungs nas mthar rnam rtog chung ngu'i chung
NK045(bi)002:2027: ngu grangs yod pa gzhal du yod pa tshad yod
NK045(bi)002:2028: / pa zhes dang / de'i gnyen po chen po'i
NK045(bi)002:2029: chen po grangs med gzhal med tshad med pas bstan
NK045(bi)002:2030: / pa zhes dang / la / de yang sgom
NK045(bi)002:2031: lam dgu po re re'i dbang du byas te 'bras
NK045(bi)002:2032: bu bsod nams grangs med gzhal med tshad med par
NK045(bi)002:2033: / pa zhes dang / la / gsungs te / mdo ni /
NK045(bi)002:2034: ji ltar bdag gis ston pas gsungs pa'i don 'tshal
NK045(bi)002:2035: ba ltar na chos kun sangs rgyas pa'i dbang du
NK045(bi)002:2036: byas nas brjod du med pa sogs te /
NK045(bi)002:2037: zhib par mdo rgyas pa rnams su shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:2038: 'dir gsum du bsdus te bstan pa'i dang po sgom lam chung ngu ni /
NK045(bi)002:2039: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab sogs don dang dpe'i sho lo ka gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2040: nyin gcig gi rnam rtog skyes pa grangs mang po
NK045(bi)002:2041: de snyed kyi bskal pa'i tshogs sher phyin nyin gcig
NK045(bi)002:2042: la bsgoms pas 'dums na yun ring por sgom pa
NK045(bi)002:2045: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang /
NK045(bi)002:2046: chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis so //
NK045(bi)002:2047: rtsod spang la grangs la rtsod spang dang /
NK045(bi)002:2048: byed las la rtsod spang gnyis las /
NK045(bi)002:2049: dang po sgom lam re rer yang 'bras bu bsod
NK045(bi)002:2050: nams tshad med par gsungs na de'i rgyu sgom lam
NK045(bi)002:2051: yang grangs dgur ma nges te /
NK045(bi)002:2052: 'bras bu'i yon tan spang bya spangs pa'i rtogs pa las skye ba yin na /
NK045(bi)002:2053: spang bya yang tshad med dgos pas spang bya dgur grangs ma nges la /
NK045(bi)002:2054: de ma nges na gnyen po'i rtogs pa yang dgur
NK045(bi)002:2055: ma nges pa dang yang 'bras bu tshad med pa
NK045(bi)002:2056: skyed na rgyu yang tshad med yin dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)002:2057: rgyu thug bcas sam grangs kyi tshad bzung ste dgur
NK045(bi)002:2058: 'jog pa mi 'thad do zhes rtsod pa la sgom
NK045(bi)002:2059: lam re rer yang 'bras bu grangs med gzhal med
NK045(bi)002:2060: la sogs par bstan pa rnams ni /
NK045(bi)002:2061: dam pa'i don du bden par grub pa'i rgyu gcig las /
NK045(bi)002:2062: bden par grub pa'i 'bras bu grangs med par 'byung
NK045(bi)002:2063: ngo zhes mang nyung gi grangs kyis dbye bar bzod
NK045(bi)002:2064: pa'am nus pa ma yin te /
NK045(bi)002:2065: don dam par rgyu 'bras gnyis char ma grub pas mang nyung du yod pa ma yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2066: rgyu 'bras bden par grub pa zhig na tshad yod
NK045(bi)002:2067: kyi rgyu las tshad med kyi 'bras bu 'byung bar
NK045(bi)002:2068: mi 'thad par rtogs su chug na'ang 'dir de ltar
NK045(bi)002:2069: mi 'dod do // 'o na ci zhe na kun
NK045(bi)002:2070: rdzob tha snyad tsam du sgom lam re re la'ang
NK045(bi)002:2071: 'bras bu bsod nams mtha' yas pa 'byung ba ni
NK045(bi)002:2072: mi 'dod do // / thugsa brtse ba'i rgyu mathun
NK045(bi)002:2073: mdo las bstan pa de dag de ltar du yin
NK045(bi)002:2074: par nges pa thub pa sangs rgyas kyi bzheda pa
NK045(bi)002:2075: mi 'dod do // / ste / don la de
NK045(bi)002:2076: ltar yin par gzigs nas bstan pa yin gyi dgongs
NK045(bi)002:2078: de yang rgyu gcig las 'bras bu du ma skye
NK045(bi)002:2079: ba tsam ni sa bon gcig las 'bru du mar
NK045(bi)002:2080: yang nas yang du 'phel ba sogs kyi grub la
NK045(bi)002:2081: / kun rdzob tu phyogs dus kyi mu mtha' yas
NK045(bi)002:2082: pa'i sems can la dmigs nas de'i don du yon
NK045(bi)002:2083: tan mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur bsngo
NK045(bi)002:2084: / ba dang / de yang mngon par ma zhen pa'i thabs mkhas kyis yongs su zin pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2085: bden gnyis ro mnyam chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor
NK045(bi)002:2086: gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa'i sgom pa skad cig
NK045(bi)002:2087: ma gcig gi bsod nams kyang tshad gzung du med
NK045(bi)002:2088: par rigs pas grub pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2089: de ston byed kyi mdo ni /
NK045(bi)002:2090: bsod nams de yang sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis so //
NK045(bi)002:2091: gnyis pa byed pa la rtsod spang la /
NK045(bi)002:2092: don dam par nyams 'phel mi rung bas sgom lam gyi spang thob mi srid par rtsod pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2093: kun rdzob tu'ang skad cig mar dpyad nas rnam mkhyen thob par mi rung bar rtsod pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2094: dang po dngos po rnams su brjod du med pa'i stong pa nyid yin na /
NK045(bi)002:2095: de la mi mthun phyogs nyams pa dang gnyen po 'phel ba mi rung la /
NK045(bi)002:2096: de lta na sgom pa'i lam zhes bya bas spang
NK045(bi)002:2097: bya dgu lta bu ci zhig nyams shing 'bras bu
NK045(bi)002:2098: ye shes chung ngu'i chung ngu sogs ci zhig thob
NK045(bi)002:2099: ste spang thob mi srid do snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:2100: zad mi skye shes pa'i byang chub ni sgrib pa
NK045(bi)002:2101: zad cing slar mi skye ba tsam gyis rab tu
NK045(bi)002:2102: phye ba las dngos po med kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2103: 'bras bu de thob nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las
NK045(bi)002:2104: gtan du thar pa'i sgo nas thar pa don gnyer
NK045(bi)002:2106: ji ltar de bzhin du sgom lam 'di yang ni
NK045(bi)002:2107: spang bya spangs ba dang rtogs pa thob pa'i sgo
NK045(bi)002:2108: nas rang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed de /
NK045(bi)002:2109: byang chub kyang de bzhin nyid stong pa'i mtshan nyid can la /
NK045(bi)002:2110: sgom lam de yang stong pa de bzhin nyid de'i mtshan nyid can yin par bzhed pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:2111: dngos smra bas rtsod pa ni don med do zhes lan 'debs pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2112: 'di la bla na med pa'i byang chub zag med ye shes kyi ngo bo de /
NK045(bi)002:2113: don dam par 'phel 'grib med kyang tha snyad du
NK045(bi)002:2114: gdul bya'i don byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du
NK045(bi)002:2116: bla med byang chub don dam par 'phel 'grib med
NK045(bi)002:2117: pa'i dpe dngos por smra ba lam grub pas mi
NK045(bi)002:2120: zad dang mi skye don du ni /
NK045(bi)002:2121: gcig pas de phyir bzod par gyis /
NK045(bi)002:2123: stong pa nyid yin phan chad rgyu 'bras spang thob 'jog mi shes pa'i dngos smra ba la /
NK045(bi)002:2124: kho rang gi mthar 'bras so sor brtags 'gog gi
NK045(bi)002:2125: rang bzhin can gyi byang chub la dper byas nas
NK045(bi)002:2126: / sngar yod zad pas stong yang rung /
NK045(bi)002:2127: ngo bo nyid kyis stong yang rung ste stong par
NK045(bi)002:2128: don du gcig pas theg chen gyi stong pa la
NK045(bi)002:2129: mi skrag par bzod par gyis zhes gsungs pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2130: gnad gcig tu kho bos mthong ngo //
NK045(bi)002:2131: mdo 'dir tshul de dag ston pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2132: sangs rgyas kyis bshad sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2133: chos thams cad chos dbyings brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su dag par gnas pa de ni /
NK045(bi)002:2134: chos brjod cing bstan pas 'phel bar mi 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:2135: ma bstan pas 'grib par mi 'gyur zhing /
NK045(bi)002:2136: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rtog
NK045(bi)002:2137: pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa tsam las yang dag par
NK045(bi)002:2138: grub pa med pas na ming gis brjod pa tsam
NK045(bi)002:2139: du zad par shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:2140: des na lam phar phyin rnams kyang ming gis brjod
NK045(bi)002:2141: pa tsam du zad pas na de bsgoms pas chos
NK045(bi)002:2142: dbyings 'phel ba dang nyon mongs zad pa med la
NK045(bi)002:2143: / ma bsgoms pas chos dbyings 'grib pa dang nyon mongs 'phel ba'ang don dam par med kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2144: tha snyad kun rdzob tu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK045(bi)002:2145: rnams byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo zhing mtshan
NK045(bi)002:2146: mar zhen pa'i rlom pa med pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)002:2147: dpa' rnams ni / rten 'brel bslu med kyi dbang
NK045(bi)002:2148: gis lam las nyams pa med par bla na med
NK045(bi)002:2150: 'di ltar 'khor bar snang ba nyid kyang don la grub pa'i dbang gis ma yin te /
NK045(bi)002:2151: rang gi kun tu rtog pa'i dbang gis snang la /
NK045(bi)002:2152: 'khor ba spangs nas ldog pa'am rtog pa tsam du zad do //
NK045(bi)002:2153: des na de bzhin nyid bri gang blang dor dang
NK045(bi)002:2154: bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)002:2155: kyis kun tu rtog pa dang de'i dbang gis byung
NK045(bi)002:2156: ba'i sgrib pa gnyis po rim bzhin spangs pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2157: / rtogs pa'i ye shes rim bzhin thob pa yod pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2158: de bzhin nyid kyi ngos nas ma yin kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2159: de bzhin nyid las gol ba'i rang gi rtog pa zad tshul las de ltar snang ba yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2160: des na chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi don ji
NK045(bi)002:2161: lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa na srid zhi'i mthar
NK045(bi)002:2162: mi gnas pa'i myang 'das grub pa yin par shes
NK045(bi)002:2163: par bya'o // gnyis pa tha snyad du rnam mkhyen mi thob par rtsod pa spang ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2164: 'di ltar sems ni skad cig gis skye zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2165: de'i skad cig kun gcig car du 'byung mi shes pas rim can du 'byung dgos la /
NK045(bi)002:2166: de lta na sems dang po bskyed pa'i skad cig snga ma des ni byang chub mi thob la /
NK045(bi)002:2167: snga ma snga ma sngon du ma song ba'i phyi
NK045(bi)002:2168: ma'i skad cig re res kyang thob mi nus te
NK045(bi)002:2169: / snga phyir phye ba'i skad cig re re la
NK045(bi)002:2170: nus pa ma tshang zhing phyi ma'i dus na snga
NK045(bi)002:2171: ma 'gags nas med pas byang chub thob pa mi
NK045(bi)002:2173: mar me skad cig gis skye 'gag byed kyang skad
NK045(bi)002:2174: cig du ma rgyun mthud pas snum zad cing sdong
NK045(bi)002:2175: bu sreg par nus pa ltar /
NK045(bi)002:2176: snga phyi'i sems lhan cig tu tshogs pa med kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2177: sems bskyed snga ma snga ma la brten nas phyi
NK045(bi)002:2178: ma phyi ma nus pa 'phel te rtogs bya de
NK045(bi)002:2179: bzhin nyid la gsal ba rab kyi mthar thug pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2180: ye shes 'byung zhing spang bya 'gag pa 'thad par
NK045(bi)002:2181: bstan to // mdo 'dir de ston pa la dpe gsum ste /
NK045(bi)002:2182: spang bya spong bar 'thad pa'i dpe mar mes bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2183: 'bru mar snying po sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2184: rtogs bya rtogs par 'thad pa sa bon kyi dpes bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2185: sa bon las ni sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2187: chu yi thigs pas sogs tshigs bcad gcig go //
NK045(bi)002:2188: da ni rtags zab pa brgyad ni tha snyad du
NK045(bi)002:2189: rten 'brel mi bslu ba'i dbang gis skye ba dang
NK045(bi)002:2190: / don dam par mi skye ba gnyis mi 'gal
NK045(bi)002:2191: bar go yul tsam min par gzhi gcig gi steng
NK045(bi)002:2192: na phan tshun spongs mi dgos par mnyam par rtogs
NK045(bi)002:2193: pa'i zung 'jug gi rtogs pa khyad par can ni
NK045(bi)002:2195: de bzhin du dngos po rnams byung tsam nas rang
NK045(bi)002:2196: grub pa'i dus skad cig gnyis par mi sdod par
NK045(bi)002:2197: 'gag pa dang / don dam par rang bzhin med
NK045(bi)002:2198: pa'i mi 'gag pa gnyis 'gal med ro gcig tu
NK045(bi)002:2199: rtogs pa 'gag pa la zab pa ste 'di gnyis
NK045(bi)002:2200: ni gzhi rtogs tshul gyi dbang du byas pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:2201: slob lam du shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid goms
NK045(bi)002:2202: kyang snying rjes dus ma yin par mngon du mi
NK045(bi)002:2203: byed pa de bzhin nyid la zab pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2204: 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su sems sems
NK045(bi)002:2205: byung mtha' dag 'gog pa'i 'gog pa yang dag pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2206: mtha' la shin tu goms pas na ro mnyam par
NK045(bi)002:2207: gyur nas ldang dka' ba'i tshul du mnyam par 'jog
NK045(bi)002:2208: nus pa sa brgyad pa nas thob na'ang /
NK045(bi)002:2209: da rung shes bya'i sgrib pa phra mo dang bcas
NK045(bi)002:2210: pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid la gzigs pa shin tu
NK045(bi)002:2211: rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas lta bu ma yin
NK045(bi)002:2212: pas de bzhin nyid la mnyam par bzhag bzhin du
NK045(bi)002:2213: shes bya mtha' dag gzigs pa'i ye shes ma thob
NK045(bi)002:2214: pas / de dag gi ji lta ba gzigs pa la'ang da rung skyed 'dod du yod pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:2215: de bzhin gshegs pas 'gog pa las spong ba'i tshul
NK045(bi)002:2216: gyis rdzogs smin sbyangs pa mthar phyin pa'i stobs las
NK045(bi)002:2217: skyes pa'i ting 'dzin khyad par can bskyed nas /
NK045(bi)002:2218: shes bya'i sgrib pa shin tu phra mo yang sbyangs te sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar mdzad kyi /
NK045(bi)002:2219: rang gi mnyam bzhag de kho na'i ngang du gnas
NK045(bi)002:2220: pa kho nar mi mdzad pa'i cha nas de ltar
NK045(bi)002:2221: gsungs pa'o // chos thams cad spros pa dang bral
NK045(bi)002:2222: bas sbyin sogs sgrub tu med kyang kun rdzob tu
NK045(bi)002:2223: sbyin sogs phar phyin sgrub pa'i tshul ma nor bar
NK045(bi)002:2225: de gnyis 'gal med zung gcig tu chud pa'i rtogs pa shes bya la zab pa /
NK045(bi)002:2226: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma grub pas don
NK045(bi)002:2227: dam par dngos dngos med sogs dmigs pas mthong bar
NK045(bi)002:2228: bya ba rdul tsam med pa de ni de kho
NK045(bi)002:2229: na nyid mthong ngo zhes ma mthong ba nyid mthong
NK045(bi)002:2230: ba'i dam par bstan pa la mthong ba gang yang
NK045(bi)002:2231: med pa dang de nyid mthong ba 'gal ba lta
NK045(bi)002:2232: bu'i rtog pa dang bral te /
NK045(bi)002:2233: dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi
NK045(bi)002:2234: mthong ba rang gsal ba shes pa la zab pa
NK045(bi)002:2235: / de bzhin du don dam par chos gang la'ang
NK045(bi)002:2236: spyod pa med pa'i phyir mi spyod pa spyod pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2237: dam par gsungs pa thugs su chud pa'i rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:2238: khyad par can spyod pa la zab pa /
NK045(bi)002:2239: lam thams cad sgrub pa mi 'dor bas 'bras bu mngon du byed kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2240: gnas lugs la bsgrub bya sgrub byed gnyis su med
NK045(bi)002:2241: par ye nas mnyam pa'i chos nyid la gnas par
NK045(bi)002:2242: thugs su chud pa gnyis med la zab pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2243: lnga ni spyod pa nyams su len tshul la zab
NK045(bi)002:2244: pa yin te / de la'ang gzhi'i dbang du byas
NK045(bi)002:2245: te de bzhin nyid thams cad la khyad med par
NK045(bi)002:2246: yod kyang rdzogs smin sbyangs pa mthar phyin nas sgrib
NK045(bi)002:2247: gnyis ma bral ba'i dus min du mngon du mi
NK045(bi)002:2249: lam la yul shes bya dang /
NK045(bi)002:2251: nyams len spyod pa gsum dang /
NK045(bi)002:2252: 'bras bu gnyis med de sgrub byed bsgrub bya gnyis su med par gzigs pa'i cha nas so //
NK045(bi)002:2253: kun rdzob tu tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
NK045(bi)002:2254: de'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par mi rlom pa ni thabs mkhas pa la zab pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2255: yang dag par na thob bya nyid ma dmigs pa
NK045(bi)002:2256: dang rang byung gi rnam pa'am rang byung ye shes
NK045(bi)002:2257: kyi sku 'dus ma byas pa rgyus sgrub par mi
NK045(bi)002:2259: zab mo brgyad po de ni stong pa dang rten
NK045(bi)002:2260: 'byung 'gal bar 'dzin pa'i blo ngor phan tshun gcig
NK045(bi)002:2261: gis gcig bsal ba'i tshul gyis zung 'jug ro mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2263: de ltar mi 'gal bar mnyam pa'i tshul du rtogs
NK045(bi)002:2264: pa'i zab mo brgyad dang ldan pa'i ye shes sa
NK045(bi)002:2266: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus ngag gi tha
NK045(bi)002:2267: snyad ni gzhan ngor phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags yin
NK045(bi)002:2268: par gzhung rnams las gsungs shing /
NK045(bi)002:2269: rtags 'di rnams gzhan ngo kho nar ma zad rang nyid kyi yid ches pa'ang yod par mngon no //
NK045(bi)002:2270: de lta bu'i zab mo brgyad bsdus nas ston pa'i mdo ni /
NK045(bi)002:2271: stong pa mtshan med sogs sho lo ka gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:2272: skye bar zab pa la sogs pa brgyad po de
NK045(bi)002:2273: dag kyang snang stong ro mnyam chen por rtogs pa
NK045(bi)002:2275: chos thams cad 'dir ltar snang bzhin du ye nas
NK045(bi)002:2276: skye 'gag med pa rnam thar gsum ldan gyi ngang
NK045(bi)002:2277: tshul du gnas pa'i chos la spyod pa'i tshe na
NK045(bi)002:2278: / 'bras bu zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i myang 'das dngos med la'ang mi reg cing /
NK045(bi)002:2279: chos gang la'ang mtshan mar mi zhen te mtha' bral
NK045(bi)002:2280: nyid kyi ye shes zab mo la gnas pa zhes
NK045(bi)002:2281: bya ste mnyan pa'i dpes bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2282: de la yul gyi cha nas phye na zab mo brgyad du 'gyur te sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:2283: 'grel pa 'ga' zhig na 'di dang 'og gi sho
NK045(bi)002:2284: lo ka gnyis ka srid zhi mnyam nyid du sbyar
NK045(bi)002:2285: nas zab mo brgyad logs su ma bstan par bzhed
NK045(bi)002:2286: pa'ang yod do // da ni gtso bor dgas pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2287: sbyor ba khyad par can 'bras bu sku gsum thob
NK045(bi)002:2288: pa la gtso che ba'i cha nas rgyu nyid du
NK045(bi)002:2289: so sor bzhag pa gsum gyi dang po srid zhi
NK045(bi)002:2290: pa'ang yod do // mnyam nyid ni / 'khor 'das
NK045(bi)002:2291: kyi chos rnams snang yang rang bzhin med pa rmi
NK045(bi)002:2292: lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir chos thams cad so so
NK045(bi)002:2293: rang gis rig par bya ba snang stong mnyam pa
NK045(bi)002:2294: nyid brjod du med pa'i dbyings su tshul gcig pa
NK045(bi)002:2295: las tha dad cung zad kyang med pas na /
NK045(bi)002:2296: srid dang zhi bar blang dor tha dad pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:2297: du rnam par mi rtog pa ni srid zhi mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2299: de ston byed kyi mdo ni /
NK045(bi)002:2300: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:2301: gong du bshad ma thag pa de ltar zab mo
NK045(bi)002:2302: rnam thar gsum ldan srid zhi'i mthar mi gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2303: mnyam pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)002:2304: de dag gi bdag stobs bcu mnga' bas lung bstan
NK045(bi)002:2305: te byang chub thob snyam pa'i rlom pa'ang med de
NK045(bi)002:2306: / 'khor ba nyid rang bzhin gyis myang 'das su shes pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2307: mnyam pa nyid 'di la bsal bya dang thob bya
NK045(bi)002:2308: ci yang med ces bsal bzhag med pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)002:2309: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la skrag pa med par mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2310: pa nyid khong du chud ces so //
NK045(bi)002:2311: mdo rgyas pa rnams su chos rnams rmi lam dang
NK045(bi)002:2312: 'dra ba de ltar na las dge sdig gis phan
NK045(bi)002:2313: gnod med pa la sogs pa'i klan ka spong ba'i
NK045(bi)002:2315: don dam par chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la skye
NK045(bi)002:2316: 'gag dang bri gang kun byang med pa yin yang
NK045(bi)002:2317: de ltar ma rtog pa'i 'ching ba kun ldan gyi
NK045(bi)002:2318: gang zag la rang gi rtog pa'i dbang gis skye
NK045(bi)002:2319: 'gag dang kun byang 'ching grol yod pas /
NK045(bi)002:2320: las dge sdig bsags pa dang de'i rang 'bras 'byin pa yod do //
NK045(bi)002:2321: gzhan yang chos rnams rmi lam dang 'dra na nyin
NK045(bi)002:2322: bar gyi las bsags pa'ang rmi lam gyi las ltar
NK045(bi)002:2323: las lam ma rdzogs par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:2324: yang na rmi lam du srog bcad pa sogs rmis
NK045(bi)002:2325: pa na'ang nyin bar ltar las lam rdzogs par 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:2326: ro zhe na / de ni chos rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)002:2327: bo la grub ma grub kyi bden rdzun yod pas
NK045(bi)002:2328: ro zhe na / ma yin la / rang gi
NK045(bi)002:2329: rtog pa mngon zhen che chung gi dbang las te
NK045(bi)002:2330: ro zhe na / ma yin la / / rmi
NK045(bi)002:2331: lam gyi snang ba ni sad pa'i tshe rdzun par
NK045(bi)002:2332: shes nus pas der gter rnyed par rmis pa lta
NK045(bi)002:2333: ro zhe na / ma yin la / / bu
NK045(bi)002:2334: la'ang / gter dngos su rnyed par 'dzin mkhan su
NK045(bi)002:2336: gal te rmi lam gyi snang ba la'ang nyin snang
NK045(bi)002:2337: dang khyad med par mngon zhen gyi gsos 'debs mkhan
NK045(bi)002:2338: zhig brgya la yod na des las lam gyi dngos
NK045(bi)002:2339: gzhi rdzogs par yang cis mi 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)002:2340: mi 'gyur na nyin snang la'ang mi 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)002:2341: yang sad rmi gnyis kar las dang sems pa dben
NK045(bi)002:2342: par mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir mngon zhen gyi khyad
NK045(bi)002:2343: par sgrub mi nus snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:2344: de dang mi 'gal te tshul de dag don dam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:2345: yang sh+aa ri'i bus rab 'byor la rmi lam du
NK045(bi)002:2346: rnam thar gsum bsgoms na sher phyin 'phel lam zhes
NK045(bi)002:2347: dris pas / nyin par bsgoms pas 'phel na mtshan mo cis mi 'phel zhes gsungs pas /
NK045(bi)002:2348: blo yul la ma 'khrul bar zhugs na nyin mtshan
NK045(bi)002:2349: gyi khyad par ci la yod ces pa'i don to
NK045(bi)002:2350: // de ltar na rmi lam du sbyin sogs tshogs
NK045(bi)002:2351: bsags na des tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ram zhes dris
NK045(bi)002:2352: pa na rab 'byor gyis don gyi lan sngar btab
NK045(bi)002:2354: dgos pa'i dbang gis byams pa la zhal 'phang ste /
NK045(bi)002:2355: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di skye ba gcig
NK045(bi)002:2356: gis thogs pa yin pas 'di la dris shig ces
NK045(bi)002:2357: gsungs pa na de ltar dris pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2358: byams pas ci byams pa zhes pa'i ming gis lan
NK045(bi)002:2359: ldon nam zhes sogs gsungs nas don la srid zhi
NK045(bi)002:2360: ma grub pas ha cang thal ba med par bstan
NK045(bi)002:2361: la / dri ba de'i lan dngos su rdzogs par
NK045(bi)002:2362: ma mdzad pa ni gdul bya'i rgyud kyi log rtog
NK045(bi)002:2363: mtha' med pa ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsal
NK045(bi)002:2364: la / bar bstan to // de la sngar lan
NK045(bi)002:2365: btab pa don gyis 'di'i lan du 'gyur tshul ni
NK045(bi)002:2366: la / bar bstan to // / rmi lam du
NK045(bi)002:2367: sbyin pa byin pas nyin par gyi sbyin pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2368: 'dra bar tshogs rdzogs dgos na rmi lam gyi sbyin
NK045(bi)002:2369: yul la sogs pa de dag sad pa'i dus ltar
NK045(bi)002:2370: rjes kyi mngon zhen gyi yul du'ang 'grub dgos na
NK045(bi)002:2372: 'o na byang chub sems dpa' nyin snang thams cad
NK045(bi)002:2373: kyang rmi lam dang 'dra bar mngon zhen med par
NK045(bi)002:2374: rtogs pas las gang yang mig sog gam zhe na
NK045(bi)002:2375: / des zag bcas kyi las gang yang mi gsog
NK045(bi)002:2376: ste mngon zhen med pas zag bcas la 'dun pa
NK045(bi)002:2378: zag med kyi las kyang mi gsog par thal zhe na /
NK045(bi)002:2379: byang chub sems dpa' la mngon zhen med kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2380: mngon zhen can gyi sems can gzhan la phan gdags
NK045(bi)002:2381: pa med par mi 'gyur bas rgyu 'bras bslu med
NK045(bi)002:2382: kyi dbang gis byang sems de'i tshogs rdzogs pa med
NK045(bi)002:2384: gnyis pa zhing dag sbyor ni /
NK045(bi)002:2385: snod bcud kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa dag par
NK045(bi)002:2386: sgrub pa'i smon lam dang smon lam bzhin du 'grub
NK045(bi)002:2387: pa'i tshogs rdzogs par mdzad pa ni zhing dag sbyor
NK045(bi)002:2388: te / skabs 'dir 'jig rten dgon pa'i lam dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2389: gsum pa thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba la ngo bo dang dbye ba gnyis las /
NK045(bi)002:2390: dang po byang chub sems dpa' des rnam thar dang
NK045(bi)002:2391: byang phyogs sogs kyi chos rdzogs par byed pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2392: / sems can la phan pa du ma sgrub par byed pa'i 'jug yul de dang de dag la /
NK045(bi)002:2393: dus dang dus min shes pa dang sgrub tshul mi
NK045(bi)002:2394: 'dra ba du ma'i sgo nas sbyor ba'i thabs mkhas
NK045(bi)002:2396: de la dbye na tshad med kyang don gyi gtso bo rnam pa bcur yod do //
NK045(bi)002:2398: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis te /
NK045(bi)002:2399: stong nyid snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i sgo nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rdzogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2400: sems can gzhan smin par byed tshul phan tshun gcig
NK045(bi)002:2401: gis gcig gom bkag par grogs su 'gro ba'i thabs
NK045(bi)002:2402: la mkhas pa khyad par can dang ldan zhes pa'o
NK045(bi)002:2403: // de la dbye ba bcu las /
NK045(bi)002:2405: dgra bdud bzhi dang sa gnyis las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2406: dper na skyes bu mkhas pa sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2407: gnyis pa gdul bya'i don du sngon gyi smon lam
NK045(bi)002:2408: btab pa ji lta ba bzhin du de'i shugs 'byin
NK045(bi)002:2409: pa ni / mkha' la rlung brten sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:2410: gsum pa bden gnyis zung du chud pas mtha' gang la'ang mi gnas pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2411: gang gi tshe na sogs sho lo ka gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:2412: bzhi pa yang dag mtha' shes kyang mngon du mi
NK045(bi)002:2413: byed pas nyan rang dang thun mong min pa ni
NK045(bi)002:2414: / dper na 'phong bslab sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2415: lnga pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas bdag dang chos su mi dmigs pa /
NK045(bi)002:2416: dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2417: drug pa srid zhir mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2418: dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2419: snang stong zung 'jug thabs shes gnyis med du rtogs
NK045(bi)002:2420: pa'i blos srid zhi'i chos thams cad stong pa mtshan
NK045(bi)002:2421: med smon med kyi rnam par gzigs pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:2422: de lta na ci yang ma mthong ba tsam gyis
NK045(bi)002:2423: dngos med kyi myang 'das mngon du byas par 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:2424: ro snyam na ma yin te /
NK045(bi)002:2425: mtshan mar mi 'dzin bzhin du chos kun mthong ba
NK045(bi)002:2426: yin gyi dngos po med pa tsam blos mngon du
NK045(bi)002:2427: byas pa ni dngos med kyi mtshan mar 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:2429: bdun pa bsam gtan sogs lam dang 'bras bu'i chos
NK045(bi)002:2430: la ro myong ba med pas ma chags pa ni
NK045(bi)002:2431: / dper na rin chen 'dod pa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2432: brgyad pa thabs mkhas kyi yul du gyur pa'i shes
NK045(bi)002:2433: bya kun la 'jug pas tshad med pa shes pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2434: sbyor ba ni / dper na don gnyer tshong pa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2435: dgu pa 'bras bu'i re 'dod zad pa'i smon pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2436: gang tshe 'gro la sogs sho lo ka gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2437: dngos po med tsam gyis rab tu phye ba'i myang 'das dang /
NK045(bi)002:2438: 'dus byas 'khor ba gnyis kar mi gnas te srid zhir smon pa zad pas so //
NK045(bi)002:2439: 'o na srid zhis ma bsdus pa'i phyir srid par snang bar yang mi 'gyur snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:2440: rang gi ngo bos srid zhir mi gnas kyang srid
NK045(bi)002:2441: pa 'dir mi snang bar mi 'gyur te sprul pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2442: dpes bstan to // bcu pa phyir mi ldog pa
NK045(bi)002:2443: de yi rtags 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i thabs mkhas
NK045(bi)002:2444: dpes bstan to // sbyor ba ni / gal te spyod pa dang ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:2445: theg pa chen po'i lam mam spyod pa ji ltar yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2446: byang sems de zab cing rgya che ba'i gnas la
NK045(bi)002:2447: dbang po rno'am rtul shes pa'i slad du zab cing
NK045(bi)002:2448: rgya che ba'i chos kyi tshul las brtsams te dris
NK045(bi)002:2449: pa na / zab mo stong pa nyid kyi chos
NK045(bi)002:2450: phyin ci ma log par ston par mi nus shing
NK045(bi)002:2451: pa na / / phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis
NK045(bi)002:2452: ni de dag gi nyams 'og tu chud pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:2453: zab mo thun mong min pa rnams ni mi shes
NK045(bi)002:2455: chos zab mo mi shes pa'i phyir de 'dra'i phyir
NK045(bi)002:2456: mi ldog pa mi srid pas na de dag phyir
NK045(bi)002:2457: mi ldog par lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o
NK045(bi)002:2458: zhes gsungs te / chos gang zhig rang gi nyams
NK045(bi)002:2459: 'og tu chud pa ni gzhan la ston kyang shes
NK045(bi)002:2460: zhes gsungs te / pa'i phyir na / ston du
NK045(bi)002:2461: mi rung ba'i dgos pa ma mthong bzhin du mi
NK045(bi)002:2462: ston na lung ma bstan pa'am /
NK045(bi)002:2463: de ltar min yang theg pa mchog gi lam la
NK045(bi)002:2464: gnas pa'i gang zag khyad par can du shes byed
NK045(bi)002:2465: med do // de las ldog ste rtags 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2466: bstan ma thag pa'i don zab mo rnams ston nus
NK045(bi)002:2467: na gang zag de phyir mi ldog par mtshon pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2469: rtags 'chad pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:2471: rtags kyis mtshon pa drod kyi rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:2472: rnam 'phel gyis mtshon pa rtse mo'i rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:2473: rang don rtogs pa brtan pa dang gzhan don snying rje brtan pas mtshon pa bzod pa'i rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:2474: bsod nams tshad med pa'i sgo nas mtshon pa skye
NK045(bi)002:2475: med kyi don la sems kun tu gnas pa'i ting
NK045(bi)002:2477: spang bya 'jug ldog rdzas btags kyi rtog pa bzhi
NK045(bi)002:2478: kun btags kyi cha spong ba sogs kyis mtshon pa
NK045(bi)002:2480: lhan skyes kyi rtog pa bzhi spangs pa sogs kyi sgo nas mtshon pa sgom lam rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:2481: slob lam mthar thug pa phan yon tshad med pa can gyi bar chad med pa'i rtse mo /
NK045(bi)002:2482: bar chad med rtse de la log sgrub bsal ba ste /
NK045(bi)002:2483: de ltar brgyad ni rtse mo mtshon byed chos brgyad do //
NK045(bi)002:2485: rmi lam du'ang chos thams cad rmi lam ltar lta
NK045(bi)002:2486: ba sogs rtags bcu gnyis su mdo rgyas par gsungs
NK045(bi)002:2487: pa las / 'dir dgra bcom sa dang sogs nas /
NK045(bi)002:2488: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2489: de yang nyin bar gyi dus su stong nyid la
NK045(bi)002:2490: dmigs pa'i zhi lhag goms pas rmi lam du yang
NK045(bi)002:2491: chos kun rmi lam 1ltar blta ba mi 'bral ba
NK045(bi)002:2492: dang / rmi lam na yang nyan rang la dga' ba'i sems mi skye ba gnyis ni 2 /
NK045(bi)002:2493: dgra bcom sa dang sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2494: rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor du mas bskor nas chos ston par mthong ba dang 3 /
NK045(bi)002:2495: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par rol pa mthong ba gnyis sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhes pas bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2496: rmi lam du sdug bsngal gyis non pa'i sems can
NK045(bi)002:2497: la rmi lam lta bu'i chos ston pa'i sems skye
NK045(bi)002:2498: ba 'gro la chos kyang ston zhes pas bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2499: sad rmir dmyal sogs mthong ba sngon du 'gro bas
NK045(bi)002:2500: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song spang
NK045(bi)002:2502: rmi lam na ni sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2503: sad pa na bdag byang chub tu lung bstan na
NK045(bi)002:2504: mes tshig pa 'di zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod
NK045(bi)002:2505: pas sems med kyi gnod pa mes tshig pa zhi
NK045(bi)002:2506: ste bden tshig gi byin rlabs grub pa ni bden
NK045(bi)002:2507: pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes rkang pa gcig gis
NK045(bi)002:2508: bstan / de bzhin du 'byung po'i gnod pa zhi
NK045(bi)002:2509: ba'i bden tshig grub pa ni sems yod kyi gnod
NK045(bi)002:2510: pa zhi ba'i dbang du byas pa yin la des
NK045(bi)002:2511: mtshon nas bden tshig grub tshul gzhan yang shes par
NK045(bi)002:2513: de ni mi yi 'jig rten sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2514: bdud las shes nas bdud dang sdig grogs zil gyis mnan nas bshes gnyen bsten pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2515: ci ste de ni nas byang chub myur du rtogs zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2516: byin rlabs grub pa sogs yon tan gyi 'byor pa'i gzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:2517: ming gi gzhi dang dben pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i bdud rnams ngo shes par bya ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2518: tshigs bcad dang po dang de rjes kyi gnyis dang de rjes kyi lngas rim bzhin bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2519: de ltar shes nas bdud las de las ldog byed bshes gnyen bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2520: de lta bas na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2521: rtags bcu pa re ba rdzogs par 'dod pas mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2522: rjes kyi rnam pa kun tu sher phyin la brten
NK045(bi)002:2523: pa ni / rgyal ba 'das dang sogs sho lo ka gcig gis so //
NK045(bi)002:2524: bcu gcig pa gzugs sogs kyi rang bzhin shes pas mngon zhen med pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2525: ji ltar shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig /
NK045(bi)002:2526: bcu gnyis pa yum la tshul bzhin spyod pas byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2527: sems can yongs su rtogs pa sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2528: bsal bzhag med par rtogs nas byang chub chen po la nye ba zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:2529: sbyor lam rtse mo'i mngon rtogs la gnas pa'i byang chen sher phyin la bslabs pa'i phan yon ni /
NK045(bi)002:2530: 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo ji snyed kyis sangs
NK045(bi)002:2531: rgyas mchod pa'i dge ba la sogs pa rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:2532: mang po la dper mdzad nas /
NK045(bi)002:2533: de las rnam par 'phel ba sogs phan yon gyi sgo nas bstan te mdo las /
NK045(bi)002:2534: gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed
NK045(bi)002:2535: pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi
NK045(bi)002:2536: lus thob par gyur te sangs rgyas par gyur la
NK045(bi)002:2537: / de na nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la /
NK045(bi)002:2538: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rim gror byas /
NK045(bi)002:2539: bkur stir byas pa sogs kyi bsod nams las rigs
NK045(bi)002:2540: kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sher phyin 'di
NK045(bi)002:2541: gzhan la ston pa nas yid la byed pas rnam
NK045(bi)002:2542: par spyod na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo
NK045(bi)002:2543: // zhes sogs kyis bstan pa ltar rnam 'phel bcu
NK045(bi)002:2544: drug ste 'dzam gling la sogs pa stong gsum gyi
NK045(bi)002:2545: sems can ji snyed pa'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs
NK045(bi)002:2546: rgyas mchod cing dge rtsa bla med byang chub tu
NK045(bi)002:2547: bsngosa pa las rtse mo pa rang nyid yum la
NK045(bi)002:2548: gnas shing gzhan la ston pa bsod nams che ba
NK045(bi)002:2549: // dang 1 / bsod nams de las khyad par
NK045(bi)002:2550: 'phags pa sher phyin nan tan du yid la byed
NK045(bi)002:2551: pas 2sbyin gnas dam par gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2552: de las bsod nams rnam par 'phel ba mi skye
NK045(bi)002:2553: ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas 3'gro ba yongs
NK045(bi)002:2555: de las khyad par du rtse sbyor gyi stobs kyis
NK045(bi)002:2556: byang chub bya 'bras bu dang chub byed rgyu'i chos
NK045(bi)002:2557: rnams mi dmigs bzhin du cher brtson pas 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:2558: dang 4 / 'dzam gling gi sems can dge bcu
NK045(bi)002:2559: bsam gzugs snyoms 'jug thob pa'i bsod nams las rtse
NK045(bi)002:2561: rtse mo'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i drung du lha
NK045(bi)002:2562: rnams bsrung ba'i phyir 'ong zhing byang chub la bskul
NK045(bi)002:2563: ba dang 6 / rtse mo bas sher phyin bsgoms
NK045(bi)002:2564: pa'i mthus bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2565: ba dang 6 / 7 / rtse sher gyi mthus
NK045(bi)002:2566: byang sems gzhan la ston pa dang 'dra bar gus
NK045(bi)002:2567: pas gnas pa 8dang brgyad la phyi gtso bor gyur
NK045(bi)002:2568: pa brgyad ces bya ste dpe gzhan dang gang zag
NK045(bi)002:2569: gzhan la brten nas gtso cher mtshon par byas pa'i
