NK045(bi)002:2570: ba dang 6 / 7 / phyir ro // nang gtso bor gyur pa brgyad ni /
NK045(bi)002:2571: rtse sher de'i mthus gzugs med nyan rang sogs kyi
NK045(bi)002:2572: yid byed dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas bslab
NK045(bi)002:2573: pa yongs su dag pa dang 9 /
NK045(bi)002:2574: rtse sher de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi rigs khyad par
NK045(bi)002:2575: mdo rgyas par gser 'byung ba'i sa nyung ba'i dpes
NK045(bi)002:2577: can du nges pa thob pa dang 10 /
NK045(bi)002:2578: 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyu sems bskyed sogs
NK045(bi)002:2579: kyi mdo rgyas par 'khor bsgyur nyung ba'i dpes bstan
NK045(bi)002:2580: mchan / nus pa lhag par 'phel ba dang 11 /
NK045(bi)002:2581: rtse sher de'i mthus phar phyin gyi mi mthun phyogs kyi sems mi skye ba dang 12 /
NK045(bi)002:2582: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen bar la bden 'dzin kun btags mngon gyur pa'i sems mi skye ba dang 13 /
NK045(bi)002:2583: sher phyin gyi nang du phar phyin kun bsdus nas nyams su len tshul shes pa dang 14 /
NK045(bi)002:2584: sgom byung gi stobs kyis theg pa gsum gyi rtogs
NK045(bi)002:2585: rigs phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2586: 15 / de'i mthus rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye ba dang 16brgyad do //
NK045(bi)002:2587: 'dir rtags dang rnam 'phel la sogs pa 'di dag
NK045(bi)002:2588: dang por thob pa'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa yin gyi
NK045(bi)002:2589: gong mar med pa min la /
NK045(bi)002:2590: zhing dag sbyor sogs cha 'dra snga nas yod kyang
NK045(bi)002:2591: yongs su dag pa khyad par can dag sa nas
NK045(bi)002:2592: thob pas der bzhag pa sogs kyi tshul 'di 'dra
NK045(bi)002:2593: gong 'og kun tu sbyar te shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:2594: de la rnam 'phel dang po ni /
NK045(bi)002:2595: 'dzam bu'i gling na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan /
NK045(bi)002:2596: gnyis pa shes rab pha rol phyin mchog sogs tshigs bcad gcig /
NK045(bi)002:2598: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig /
NK045(bi)002:2600: mi zhig sngon chad sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2602: nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2604: dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig sogs tshigs bcad gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2606: de'i tshe na bdud ni sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2607: dang po gnyis kyis dngos dang /
NK045(bi)002:2608: de rjes gsum gyis zhar byung du glags rnyed tshul dang /
NK045(bi)002:2609: tha ma gcig gi de'i gnyen po bstan pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2610: de yang bdud kyi glags rnyed pa'i byang sems la brgyad stong pa las bcu dang /
NK045(bi)002:2611: nyi khri las bcu gnyis gsungs pa'i tha ma de 'dir bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2612: bdun pa 'di'i shugs la brgyad pa bstan te byang
NK045(bi)002:2613: chub sems dpa' mi mthun par rtsod pa'i nyes pa
NK045(bi)002:2614: bstan zhing de'i gnyen po bstan pa'i don gyis byang
NK045(bi)002:2615: sems gzhan la gus par bya ba bstan pa yin
NK045(bi)002:2617: gang zhig slob tshe sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis so //
NK045(bi)002:2618: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis rnam 'phel gsum bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2619: de ni sangs rgyas chos brnyes bya phyir zhes pas bcu pa rigs nges par thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2620: de ni bslab lhag zhes pas bcu gcig pa sems bskyed sogs kyi nus pa lhag pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2621: bslab la mkhas te dmigs pa med ces pas bcu
NK045(bi)002:2622: gsum pa bden 'dzin mngon gyur pa'i sems mi skye
NK045(bi)002:2623: ba bstan / mkhas pa 'od byed sogs tshigs bcad
NK045(bi)002:2624: gcig gis bcu gnyis pa phar phyin gyi mi mthun
NK045(bi)002:2625: phyogs kyis sems mi skye ba bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2626: dge ba ma yin pa ser sna sogs kyi sems mi skye zhes pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:2628: shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan rnam 'phel bco lnga pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2629: byang chub sems mkhas sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:2630: bcu drug pa dngos su med kyang gong ma rnams kyi shugs las don gyis shes so //
NK045(bi)002:2631: rnam 'phel bco lnga pa 'di yi shes zhabs kyis
NK045(bi)002:2632: bzod pa'i rtse mo don gnyis brtan pa la sbyar
NK045(bi)002:2633: bar mdzad do // brtan pas mtshon pa bzod pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2634: mkhyen gsum gyi rtogs pa rdzogs par bzod cing khong
NK045(bi)002:2635: du chud pa rang don rtogs pa brtan pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2636: / sems can mtha' dag gi don sgrub pa bsam
NK045(bi)002:2637: sbyor gyis yongs su mi gtong ba gzhan don snying
NK045(bi)002:2639: brtan pa de gnyis kyis bzod pa mtshon pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2640: gling bzhi pa 1stong gsum 2'jig rten dang /
NK045(bi)002:2641: stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten 3dang /
NK045(bi)002:2642: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 4'jig rten gyis sogs srung la gzhal rung gis /
NK045(bi)002:2646: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang sems 4bzhi'i sems
NK045(bi)002:2647: bskyed pa'i dge rtsa la yi rang ba tshad gzhal
NK045(bi)002:2648: du med pa dpe don rim bzhin sbyar te gsungs
NK045(bi)002:2649: pas bsod nams mang po yod pa nyid kyi sgo
NK045(bi)002:2650: nas / sems gnyis med la kun tu gnas pa
NK045(bi)002:2651: chos mchog pa'i ting 'dzin bskrags par mdzad pa ste
NK045(bi)002:2652: nas / / de yang yul de bzhi'i dge rtsa
NK045(bi)002:2653: la chos mchog pas yi rang mdzad pa'i dge ba
NK045(bi)002:2654: de ltar tshad med pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2655: sems de bzhin nyid la kun tu gnas pa'i ting
NK045(bi)002:2656: 'dzin khyad par can yod pa'i dbang gis gzhan gyi
NK045(bi)002:2657: yi rang las 'phags pa'i yon tan des /
NK045(bi)002:2658: rang gi rten ting 'dzin mtshon par yang gzhan las bshad la /
NK045(bi)002:2659: yang na chos mchog pa'i dge rtsa la yi rang ba skabs 'di'i bshad bya yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:2660: de'i thugs bskyed la gzhan gyis yi rang ba tsam
NK045(bi)002:2661: la'ang phan yon de lta bu skyed nus pa'i yon
NK045(bi)002:2662: tan dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin khyad par can no
NK045(bi)002:2663: zhes chos mchog gi rtse mo mtshon pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:2664: skabs 'dir ni bzod pa dang chos mchog stabs gcig tu byas te /
NK045(bi)002:2665: mi ldog byang chub mchog la sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2666: mi ldog par byang chub mchog la zhugs pa bzod
NK045(bi)002:2667: pa dang chos mchog la gnas pa'i sems bskyed la
NK045(bi)002:2668: yi rang byas na phan yon tshad med 'byung ste
NK045(bi)002:2669: / de'i dge ba ni byang chub kyi rgyur nges pa yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:2670: de la yi rang byas pas sems can thams cad
NK045(bi)002:2671: kyi dge ba la'ang yi rang byas par 'gyur te
NK045(bi)002:2672: / de sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad la phan bde byed pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:2673: 'di'i dge rtsa ni gzhan nyan rang sogs dang mi
NK045(bi)002:2674: mnyam ste thams cad kyi don du 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)002:2675: ro zhes pa'o // de dag mi ldog pa ni
NK045(bi)002:2676: brtan pa dang sems kun tu gnas pa'i stobs kyis
NK045(bi)002:2678: da ni mthong lam rtse sbyor bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)002:2681: dang po spang bya'i rtog pa rigs bsdus te gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa po gnyis /
NK045(bi)002:2682: dang po la skabs 'dir theg chen gyi lam 'bras
NK045(bi)002:2683: bu dang bcas pa la 'jug yul du gzung ba'i
NK045(bi)002:2684: rtogs pa dang / nyan rang gi lam 'bras ldog bya'i yul du gzung ba ste gnyis dang /
NK045(bi)002:2685: so skye'i gang zag la dmigs nas rdzas su 'dzin pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2686: 'phags pa'i gang zag nyan rang rnams la dmigs nas
NK045(bi)002:2687: btags par 'dzin pa ste gnyis su phye bas spyir
NK045(bi)002:2688: bzhi yod la / de la 'jug ldog gi yul de dag don dam par ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:2689: de dag la bden grub tu bzung nas 'jug ldog
NK045(bi)002:2690: tu sems pa'i rtog pa ni mnyam rjes gnyis kar
NK045(bi)002:2692: bden par ma zhen pa'i 'jug ldog tu 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:2693: ni rjes thob gnyis su snang ba can gyi ngos
NK045(bi)002:2695: der 'dzin pa tsam gyi mtshan ma'i rtog pa dag
NK045(bi)002:2696: kyang mnyam bzhag gnyis med kyi ye shes la mi
NK045(bi)002:2697: snang bas na / yang dag pa'i don du de
NK045(bi)002:2698: ltar gzung ba'i yul tsam du'ang ma grub par shes
NK045(bi)002:2699: par bya ba gal che la /
NK045(bi)002:2700: de bzhin du rdzas btags kyang shes par bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:2701: so skye'i chos la rdzas 'dzin du bstan pas btags
NK045(bi)002:2702: 'dzin du'ang 'dzin tshul yod pa shugs la bstan cing
NK045(bi)002:2703: / 'phags pa'i chos las btags 'dzin bstan pas de
NK045(bi)002:2704: la yang so skye rnams kyis rdzas su 'dzin par
NK045(bi)002:2705: byed pas don la rdzas btags su 'dzin pa de
NK045(bi)002:2706: dag spang tshul gzung rtog la bshad pa bzhin du
NK045(bi)002:2707: / shes par bya'o // de re re yang nang
NK045(bi)002:2708: gi dbye bas yul la brten nas 'dzin stangs kyi
NK045(bi)002:2709: rnam pas phye ba dgu dgu ste sum cu rtsa
NK045(bi)002:2710: drug tu yod pa rnams ni /
NK045(bi)002:2711: dang po 'jug pa gzung rtog la /
NK045(bi)002:2712: mdo las rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems sgyu
NK045(bi)002:2713: ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par
NK045(bi)002:2715: zhes pa nas shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi dpes /
NK045(bi)002:2716: bya ba'i 'bras bu la mi rtog pa'i bar gyis gsungs pa la sogs pa rnams te /
NK045(bi)002:2717: gong 'og tu bstan pa'i mthong sgom gyis spang bya'i rtog pa 'di rnams kyis mtshon nas /
NK045(bi)002:2718: blang dor dgag sgrub kyi rtog pa mtha' yas pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2719: tshul gyis mngon zhen dang dmigs pa mtha' dag spangs
NK045(bi)002:2720: dgos par bstan pa shes par bya zhing /
NK045(bi)002:2721: de ltar bstan pa'i shugs la kun byang gi mtshan nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:2722: theg pa che chung gi khyad par la sogs pa dag kyang shes par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:2723: de ltar shes nas kyang mngon par zhen pa med
NK045(bi)002:2724: pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa 'di sher phyin gyi bstan
NK045(bi)002:2725: don yin no // rtog pa de dag rgyas par
NK045(bi)002:2726: bstan bcos dang mdo rgyas pa rnams sbyar te shes
NK045(bi)002:2728: 'dir ni 'jug ldog gi gzung rtog spong ba'i don du /
NK045(bi)002:2729: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2730: de bzhin nyid kyi ngos na 'jug ldog gi yul gang yang ma dmigs pas na /
NK045(bi)002:2731: 'jug ldog gam nye ring blang dor gyi shes rab
NK045(bi)002:2732: gnyis 'dzin can gyis byang chub tshol bar mi byed
NK045(bi)002:2733: par chos thams cad gnyis su med par mnyam pa
NK045(bi)002:2734: chen po'i tshul gyis sher phyin la spyad par bya
NK045(bi)002:2735: ste / dper na nam mkha' nyid yod pa min pas na /
NK045(bi)002:2736: dngos po gang dang yang nam mkha' de 'gal ba med pas gang dang yang ring ba med la /
NK045(bi)002:2737: chos gang gis kyang nam mkha' de thob pa med pas nye ba med pa bzhin du /
NK045(bi)002:2738: sher phyin la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jug yul la nye ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:2739: ldog yul la ring ba'i 'du shes sogs mtshan ma'i
NK045(bi)002:2740: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar spyod ces
NK045(bi)002:2741: so // longs spyod pa po'i skyes bu rdzas btags kyi mngon zhen spang ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2742: skye bo'i dbus na sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2743: bya ba'i las sam yul la mi rtog pa sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dpe /
NK045(bi)002:2744: byed pa por mi rtog pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i dpe /
NK045(bi)002:2745: bya ba'i 'bras bu la mi rtog pa shing mkhan gyis gzugs byas pa'i dpes bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2746: de ltar gzung 'dzin gyi spros pa zhi ba'i ye
NK045(bi)002:2747: shes rnam par mi rtog pa yongs su smin par
NK045(bi)002:2748: gyur pa na yul gang la'ang yul 'di la bdag
NK045(bi)002:2749: gis longs spyod do snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa
NK045(bi)002:2750: med bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las kyis 'jug
NK045(bi)002:2752: de ltar nam gyur pa'i 'phags pa gzhan gyis btags
NK045(bi)002:2753: pa tsam gyi bdag gis yul la longs spyod par
NK045(bi)002:2755: so skye rnams kyis rdzas su yod pa'i bdag des
NK045(bi)002:2756: yul la longs spyod par 'dzin zhing bden zhen gyis
NK045(bi)002:2758: de ltar rtog pa spangs nas mi rtog par gnas pa de'i phan yon ni /
NK045(bi)002:2759: de ltar spyod mkhas sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2760: dam pas basngagasa pa dang bdud kyis mi tshugs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2761: yon tan gnyis gsungs pa'i phyi ma la dngos dang
NK045(bi)002:2762: de'i rgyu mtshan bcas pas bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2763: gnyen po mthong lam la rgyu 'bras ngo bo nyid gsum gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2764: dang po rgyas par mthar thug gi byang chub gyi
NK045(bi)002:2765: rtogs pa la lam ston pa dang sgom du bcug
NK045(bi)002:2766: pa sogs kyi sgo nas 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2767: de'i rgyu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)002:2768: gzhan la yongs su gtong ba ste ster ba dang
NK045(bi)002:2769: / mthong lam de thob pa'i rgyu chos nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2770: mdor na rjes thob tu gzhan rgyud la rtogs pa dang lung gi chos snang bar byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2771: mnyam bzhag tu rang gi sher phyin sgom pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2772: gsum po de mthong lam thob pa'i rgyu yin la
NK045(bi)002:2773: / de re re yang bsod nams tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
NK045(bi)002:2774: de lta bu'i rgyu ni skabs 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:2775: de bzhin gshegs yum sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:2776: chos bstan pa de'i sgo nas pha rol la rtogs pa bskyed par yang grub la /
NK045(bi)002:2777: bsam pa thag pas sgrub par mngon brtson gyis ngang gis mnyam par bzhag pa bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:2778: gong du rnam par mi rtog pa'i phan yon bstan
NK045(bi)002:2779: pas 'di dag gi phan yon yang don gyis mngon
NK045(bi)002:2780: no // gnyis pa mthong lam gyi 'bras bu ni
NK045(bi)002:2781: mthar thug gi zad mi skye shes pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)002:2782: no // yin la / de yang chos kyi dbyings
NK045(bi)002:2783: kyi ngo bo la dri ma ye nas zad pa
NK045(bi)002:2784: no // yin la / dang / slar mi skye ba yin par rig par bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:2785: de ltar gdod nas dag pa'i chos nyid gnas lugs kyi dbang du byas na /
NK045(bi)002:2786: dgag bya gang yang dgag mi dgos pa'am 'gog tu med pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pas na /
NK045(bi)002:2787: mthong lam gyis spang bya rnam par rtog pa'i rigs sngar yod ci zhig zad cing /
NK045(bi)002:2788: skye med kyi rnam pa sngar med ci zhig 'thob ste thob tu med do //
NK045(bi)002:2789: de'i rgyu mtshan yang chos rnams yin lugs sam gshis la dri ma med pa zhig yin na /
NK045(bi)002:2790: phyin ci ma log pa'i blos de mthong du rung gi /
NK045(bi)002:2791: gal te dri ma dang bcas pa zhig ni /
NK045(bi)002:2792: de dri ma med par mthong du mi rung ste yul gyi rang bzhin de ltar yin pas so //
NK045(bi)002:2793: gal te yul gyi rang bzhin dri ma can yin yang /
NK045(bi)002:2794: blos dri ma med par mthong na ni /
NK045(bi)002:2795: dri ma med par mthong ba'i blo yul gyi gnas
NK045(bi)002:2796: tshul la phyin ci log tu zhugs pa'i log shes
NK045(bi)002:2797: su 'gyur bas des rang rgyud ldan gyi gang zag
NK045(bi)002:2798: de dag par yang mi 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:2799: dri ma can du mthong ba'i blo ni yang dag pa'i shes par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)002:2800: des na gzhan dngos smra ba rnams kyi /
NK045(bi)002:2801: dri ma sngar yod zad pa dang phyis mi skye ba la zad mi skye zhes 'dod kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2802: dri ma sngar bden par yod pa zhig na 'gog
NK045(bi)002:2803: pa med pa'i rang bzhin du nges pas de dag
NK045(bi)002:2804: gi lugs rigs pa dang 'gal la /
NK045(bi)002:2805: gzhan yang de dag gi chos rnams kyang don dam par yod la /
NK045(bi)002:2806: shes bya thams cad pa yang ston pa sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)002:2807: ni sgrib pa zad do zhes shes sgrib spangs par
NK045(bi)002:2808: 'dod pa de la rje btsun byams pa kho bos
NK045(bi)002:2809: mtshar du brtsis pa ste khas blangs nang 'gal du
NK045(bi)002:2810: mthong bzhis bstan bcos las gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:2811: chos thams cad don dam par 'grub pa zhig na
NK045(bi)002:2812: de 'khor gsum du ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes
NK045(bi)002:2813: sgrib ci ltar 'dzad par bya zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:2814: des na theg pa chen po rang gi lugs la ni /
NK045(bi)002:2815: dngos po'i gshis sam rang bzhin 'di la sgrib pa
NK045(bi)002:2816: gnyis po sngar yod bsal bar bya ba ci yang
NK045(bi)002:2817: med la / stong pa sogs yon tan gyi cha
NK045(bi)002:2818: sngar med gsar du bzhag par bya ba cung zad
NK045(bi)002:2819: med la / kyang med de / dngos po'i rang
NK045(bi)002:2820: bzhin byar med la bsal bzhag gi bcos su mi
NK045(bi)002:2821: med la / kyang med de / btub pas so
NK045(bi)002:2822: // des na sgro skur dang bral ba'i chos nyid
NK045(bi)002:2823: mnyam pa chen po bsal bzhag med pa'i don la
NK045(bi)002:2824: med la / kyang med de / btub pas so // / de dang rjes su mthun par /
NK045(bi)002:2825: dgag bsgrub kyi bslad pa dang bral ba'i blos yang
NK045(bi)002:2826: dag par blta bar byas te mnyam par bzhag na
NK045(bi)002:2827: / goms pa'i mthus gnas lugs mtha' gang du'ang mi
NK045(bi)002:2828: gnas pa yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi
NK045(bi)002:2829: don mthong nas rang rgyud mtshan ma'i rtog pas 'ching
NK045(bi)002:2830: ba las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)002:2831: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor zab mo'i gnad
NK045(bi)002:2832: mthar thug pa'ang 'doms par mdzad do //
NK045(bi)002:2833: de ltar chos nyid bsal bzhag med pa'i don las
NK045(bi)002:2834: phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i rang rgyud kyi rtog
NK045(bi)002:2835: pa ldog pa la spang bya spangs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2836: chos nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i blo skyes pa
NK045(bi)002:2837: la rtogs pa skyes zhes snang tshul tsam du brjod
NK045(bi)002:2838: par zad kyi / gnas lugs la spang ba dang skye ba gnyis ka ma grub bo //
NK045(bi)002:2840: des pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs rig bya zhes pas bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2841: mthong lam rtse mo rang gi ngo bo la mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2842: gzhag dngos dang de nyid rjes su sgom tshul gnyis
NK045(bi)002:2843: las / dang po mdo rgyas pa rnams su /
NK045(bi)002:2844: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa byin cing zhes sogs kyis /
NK045(bi)002:2845: sngar go sgrub skabs su bshad pa ltar sbyin sogs
NK045(bi)002:2846: re rer ni phan tshun bsdus pa gang yin pa
NK045(bi)002:2848: chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i shes
NK045(bi)002:2849: rab bya ba rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma gcig pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2850: bzod pa yis bsdus pa de ni /
NK045(bi)002:2851: rtse sbyor bstan pa'i skabs 'dir mthong ba'i lam du bzhed de /
NK045(bi)002:2852: de las ldog chas dbye ba so drug tshang ba'i
NK045(bi)002:2853: thabs kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab rmad
NK045(bi)002:2854: du byung ba yin pas sam /
NK045(bi)002:2855: yang na sbyin sogs thabs kyi rnam pa ma lus
NK045(bi)002:2856: pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gzigs pa'i ye
NK045(bi)002:2858: snang stong mnyam pa nyid brjod du med pa'i don
NK045(bi)002:2859: la gnyis snang nub pa'i tshul gyis mnyam par bzhag
NK045(bi)002:2862: mthong lam bzod pa'i rjes de nas mthong spang las grol ba'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:2863: bag tsha ba med pa seng ge rnam par bsgyings
NK045(bi)002:2864: pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
NK045(bi)002:2865: nas rten 'brel lugs 'byung ldog la rtogs par byed
NK045(bi)002:2867: mthong lam thob nas slar yang chos nyid la mnyam
NK045(bi)002:2868: par 'jog pa'i ting 'dzin de'i ming la de ltar
NK045(bi)002:2869: gsungs shing / 'phags pa'i ting 'dzin gzhan sgom lam
NK045(bi)002:2870: gyi sbyor ba la'ang seng ge rnam bsgyings zhes grags
NK045(bi)002:2871: gsungs shing / so // yang gzhung 'ga' zhig gi
NK045(bi)002:2872: lugs ltar na mthong lam bar chad med pa'i rjes
NK045(bi)002:2873: su byung ba rnam grol lam de la seng ge
NK045(bi)002:2874: rnam bsgyings zhes ngos 'dzin par mdzad nas /
NK045(bi)002:2875: de'i rjes thob tu rten 'brel lugs 'byung ldog la rtog par byed ces gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:2876: de la mthong lam gyi ngo bo la bzod pas
NK045(bi)002:2877: bsdus pa zhes gsungs pas de'i rnam grol lam la
NK045(bi)002:2878: seng ge rnam bsgyings thob bo snyam du dgongs pa'o
NK045(bi)002:2879: // de la bar chad med kho na mthong lam rtse mor bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2880: mthong lam gyi ngo bo dngos de yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2881: rnam grol lam de'i rgyun nam 'bras bu yin pa don gyis bstan par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:2882: mdo 'dir ni mthong lam mnyam bzhag ston pa /
NK045(bi)002:2883: chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:2884: mthong lam pas de bzhin nyid mngon sum rtogs par bzhag pa'ang /
NK045(bi)002:2885: chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma yin te /
NK045(bi)002:2886: de lta na yul yul can du snang bar thal
NK045(bi)002:2887: ba'i phyir gnyis snang nub pa'i mnyam bzhag tu mi
NK045(bi)002:2888: rung ngo // des na snang stong zung du 'jug
NK045(bi)002:2889: pa'i chos nyid bsal bzhag med pa'i rang gshis su
NK045(bi)002:2890: son pa'i ye shes de ni bar snang gi sprin
NK045(bi)002:2891: bzhin dmigs pa'i rten gang la'ang mi rten par gnas
NK045(bi)002:2892: rung ngo // so // 'o na des mthong spang spong ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:2893: yon tan brgya phrag bcu gnyis sogs ji ltar skyed ce na /
NK045(bi)002:2894: chos nyid kyi don mthong bas /
NK045(bi)002:2895: chos nyid la phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i rtog pa rnams spong ba na /
NK045(bi)002:2896: rnam par mi rtog kyang yon tan gyi 'bras bu rtsol med du byed pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:2897: rig sngags 'chang ba gnas khyim la sogs pa med pa dag nam mkha' la rgyu ba na /
NK045(bi)002:2898: gnas 'dod pa'i tshe nam mkha' de nyid du dus
NK045(bi)002:2899: min par yang me tog la sogs pas brgyan pa'i
NK045(bi)002:2900: skyed mos tshal la sogs pas mdzes pa'i gzhal med
NK045(bi)002:2901: khang gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa bzhin te
NK045(bi)002:2902: / dngos por ma zhen pa'i sgyu ma'i rnam thar
NK045(bi)002:2903: las yon tan 'dod dgur 'jo ba yin no zhes
NK045(bi)002:2905: de ltar spyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:2906: rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul de lta bu la
NK045(bi)002:2907: spyod pa'i byang sems kun rdzob la mkhas shing de
NK045(bi)002:2908: kho na nyid la ye shes gsal ba de ni
NK045(bi)002:2909: / mnyam bzhag tu de kho na nyid la dngos
NK045(bi)002:2910: su 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings
NK045(bi)002:2911: pa lta bu 'jig rten pa'i yid byed kyis ma
NK045(bi)002:2912: bslad pas rtsal rdzogs pa la mnyam par bzhag pas
NK045(bi)002:2913: / / rang don du rtogs par byed pa lam gyi chos dang /
NK045(bi)002:2914: thob par bya ba 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi chos
NK045(bi)002:2915: rnams su'ang mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid la gnas
NK045(bi)002:2916: nas / rjes thob tu gzhan sdug bsngal las dgrol ba'i chos 'chad par byed pa na'ang /
NK045(bi)002:2917: 'chad par byed pa bdag dang yul chos 'dod mkhan
NK045(bi)002:2918: du lta ba'am bden par zhen pa med pa'i sgo
NK045(bi)002:2919: nas 'jug ste / chos nyid mnyam pa'i don la kun byang ma grub kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2920: rang gi rtog pa'i dbang gis kun byang du 'gyur tshul ni /
NK045(bi)002:2921: bdag tu rtog pa'i ma rig pa las rten 'brel
NK045(bi)002:2922: lugs 'byung gi tshul gyis 'khor ba 'grub pa dang
NK045(bi)002:2923: / bdag med par rtogs pas ma rig pa ldog
NK045(bi)002:2924: pas rten 'brel lugs ldog gi tshul gyis rnam byang
NK045(bi)002:2926: de ltar rten 'brel gyi tshul la mkhas par byas
NK045(bi)002:2927: te gzhan la chos ston pa 'di ni gzhan de
NK045(bi)002:2928: kho na nyid ma rtogs pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i
NK045(bi)002:2929: sdug bsngal zhi bar 'dod pa dang rnam byang gi
NK045(bi)002:2930: yon tan thob par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)002:2931: rnams kyi gnas pa yin zhes so //
NK045(bi)002:2932: de nas sgom lam rtse sbyor la rten sgom lam /
NK045(bi)002:2934: brten pa yon tan gsum gyis bstan pa'i dang po /
NK045(bi)002:2935: sbyor ba seng ge rnam bsgyings kyi ting 'dzin ni
NK045(bi)002:2936: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgu la lugs 'byung
NK045(bi)002:2937: ldog tu rim bzhin 'jug pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2938: dngos gzhi thod rgal gyi ting 'dzin rtsal sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2939: gnyis pa spang bya rtog pa ni 'jug ldog gi gzung ba gnyis dang /
NK045(bi)002:2940: rdzas brtags kyi 'dzin pa gnyis te bzhi la nang
NK045(bi)002:2941: sel dgu rer phye ba'i so drug po lhan skyes
NK045(bi)002:2942: kyi cha spong ba yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2943: de yang 'jug bya theg chen gyi lung rtogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:2944: ldog bya theg dman gyi lam dang /
NK045(bi)002:2945: rdzas btags ni gnyis kar yang skye 'phags gnyis ka'i
NK045(bi)002:2946: chos la dmigs nas der zhen byed tshul las dgu
NK045(bi)002:2947: rer gsungs so // gsum pa yon tan ni /
NK045(bi)002:2948: yams nad lta bu zug rngu bskyed pa'i rtog pa
NK045(bi)002:2949: gong bshad lta bu rnams sgom lam gyis je zad
NK045(bi)002:2950: du song nas / slar mi skye bar dbugs phyin pa na /
NK045(bi)002:2951: rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba'i phan bde sgrub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2952: rang rgyud la theg gsum gyis bsdus pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad /
NK045(bi)002:2953: rgya mtsho la chu bo bzhin du 'bras bu mchog
NK045(bi)002:2954: gi mdzes pa'i byang sems dag sa pa'am sa bcu
NK045(bi)002:2955: yang de la 'du bar byed ces so //
NK045(bi)002:2957: rten sgom lam gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK045(bi)002:2958: dgra bcom rnam thar sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis te /
NK045(bi)002:2959: sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i dgra bcom pa'i rnam par thar pa mnga' ba /
NK045(bi)002:2960: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa /
NK045(bi)002:2961: sgom lam pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgu la rtsal sbyong zhing /
NK045(bi)002:2962: der ma zhen pa'i gnas pa 'di ni /
NK045(bi)002:2963: gzhan nyan rang gi ting 'dzin gyi gnas pa sdug bsngal zhi ba'i ting 'dzin /
NK045(bi)002:2964: nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba /
NK045(bi)002:2965: zag med kyi bde ba dang ldan pa kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2966: 'di ni gzung rtog zhi zhing 'dzin rtog rab tu
NK045(bi)002:2967: zhi ba gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes bla med
NK045(bi)002:2968: byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan pa yin no
NK045(bi)002:2969: // de'i dpe ni nyan rang rnams gzung 'dzin mtshan
NK045(bi)002:2970: ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'gog pa sogs la 'jug
NK045(bi)002:2971: // mi nus pas / ting 'dzin der zhen pas mtshan ma'i 'ching ba ma spangs la /
NK045(bi)002:2972: 'dir 'dab chags dang nya'i dpes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs thob kyang /
NK045(bi)002:2973: de'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed ces so //
NK045(bi)002:2974: spang bya ni mthong lam gyis spang bya de'i lhan
NK045(bi)002:2975: skyes dang sa bon gyi cha zad par byed pa
NK045(bi)002:2976: yin pas ngo bo'i cha nas logs su ma gsungs
NK045(bi)002:2978: sems can kun gyi yon tan sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:2979: de nas bar chad med pa'i rtse mo'i sbyor ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:2980: mdo rgyas par stong gsum gyi skye bo ji snyed
NK045(bi)002:2981: pa thams cad nyan rang gi rtogs pa phun tshogs
NK045(bi)002:2983: byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa sa dang po la bkod pa'i dge ba dper mdzad nas /
NK045(bi)002:2984: de las ches bsod nams mang por gyur pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:2985: kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa dang chos
NK045(bi)002:2986: gzhan gyis bar chod pa med pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:2987: rgyun mtha'i bar chad med lam gyi ting nge 'dzin brten la /
NK045(bi)002:2988: de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar chad med lam yin no //
NK045(bi)002:2989: de la 'di yi dmigs pa ni chos thams cad
NK045(bi)002:2990: spros pa kun gyi dngos por med pa'i de bzhin
NK045(bi)002:2991: nyid mthar thug pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:2992: bdag po'i rkyen ni sa bcu pa man chad kyi
NK045(bi)002:2993: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i dran pa yin par
NK045(bi)002:2994: bzhed la / rnam pa ni spros pa mtha' dag zhi ba'i rang bzhin can no //
NK045(bi)002:2996: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:2998: rnam pa ni zhi ba dang mtshan nyid med pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:3000: skabs 'dir bar chad med pa'i rtse mo ston pa'i mdo'i /
NK045(bi)002:3001: bslab pa 'di ni sogs tshigs su bcad pa bdun gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:3002: de la yon tan bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3003: yon tan tshad med pa can gyi bar chad med
NK045(bi)002:3004: rtse dngos bshad pa gnyis kyi dang po sho lo
NK045(bi)002:3006: de yang dang po gnyis kyis mdor bstan /
NK045(bi)002:3007: lhag ma bzhis rgyas par bshad pa'i dang po /
NK045(bi)002:3008: rgyun mtha'i bar chad med pa'i rtse mo'i bslab pa 'di ni /
NK045(bi)002:3009: bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog yin te bslab pa mthar thug pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:3010: de'i phyir bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)002:3011: phyin par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi bar chad med
NK045(bi)002:3012: lam gyi ngo bor gyur pa'i sher phyin gyi bslab
NK045(bi)002:3013: pa 'di la slob par bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3014: 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ma thag tu 'byung bas na /
NK045(bi)002:3015: 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)002:3016: chos kyi sgo mo mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i chos
NK045(bi)002:3017: kyi gter mchog tu gyur pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3018: stobs sogs kyi yon tan rin po che tshad med
NK045(bi)002:3019: pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas chos kyi mdzod dam
NK045(bi)002:3020: pa'ang yin zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin te dngos rgyu nus pa thogs med yin pa'am /
NK045(bi)002:3021: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi rigs sam gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'ang yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3022: 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i gnas skabs bde ba dang
NK045(bi)002:3023: mthar thug phan pa'am skyid pa'i mdzod mi zad pa'ang
NK045(bi)002:3025: gnyis pa rgyas bshad la de bzhin nyid mthar thug
NK045(bi)002:3026: la sgrib pa phra mos kyang ma bsgrib par gnyis
NK045(bi)002:3027: med mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas sangs rgyas thob
NK045(bi)002:3028: pas na / de 'dra'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)002:3029: 'byung ba'i yum du gyur pa de nam yang mi
NK045(bi)002:3030: zad par sangs rgyas du ma 'byung ba'i dpe /
NK045(bi)002:3031: phyi'i rten 'brel gyi dpes bshad pa la dpe dang don gyi tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)002:3032: shing dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:3033: nang gi rten 'brel 'byung ldog gi dpes bshad pa /
NK045(bi)002:3034: sems can tha ma 'bring dang mchog sogs tshigs bcad gnyis so //
NK045(bi)002:3035: gnyis pa yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa bar chad med rtse'i ngo bo ni /
NK045(bi)002:3036: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:3037: rgyun mtha' pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang gis lam
NK045(bi)002:3038: snga ma rnams su yang dag pa'i don la dran
NK045(bi)002:3039: pas yang yang goms par byas pa yongs su rdzogs
NK045(bi)002:3040: pa'i skabs 'dir / rten cing 'brel 'byung gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad la /
NK045(bi)002:3041: gdod nas skye 'gag med par mnyam pa nyid du
NK045(bi)002:3042: gnas pa khong du chud pa'i shes rab mthar thug
NK045(bi)002:3043: pa 'di shes pa'am mngon du skyed nas /
NK045(bi)002:3044: spros pa'i mtshan ma shin tu phra ba'ang nye bar zhi ba'i ye shes des /
NK045(bi)002:3045: dper na nyi ma sprin gyi sgrib pa med pas
NK045(bi)002:3046: byed pa 'od zer 'phro bas mun pa bsal ba
NK045(bi)002:3047: ltar / thog med nas gnas pa'i ma rig pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3048: thibs bo sa bon phra ba dang bcas pa drung
NK045(bi)002:3049: ltar / nas bcom te / rang byung ye shes
NK045(bi)002:3050: kyi sku can sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes
NK045(bi)002:3051: ltar / nas bcom te / / zad mi skye
NK045(bi)002:3052: shes pa'i ye shes mthar thug pa'i bar chad med
NK045(bi)002:3053: ltar / nas bcom te / / lam bstan pa'o
NK045(bi)002:3054: // da ni bar chad med pa'i rtse mo 'di
NK045(bi)002:3055: la ni dngos por rab tu smra ba rnams brgyud
NK045(bi)002:3056: ltar / nas bcom te / / lam bstan pa'o
NK045(bi)002:3057: // mar rgol te / 'di shin tu zab pas
NK045(bi)002:3058: rtogs par ches dka' ba'i don gyis so //
NK045(bi)002:3059: de la rgol ba'i log sgrub bsal bar bstan pa la mdo rgyas par bcu drug tu gsungs te /
NK045(bi)002:3060: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis chos
NK045(bi)002:3061: kun dmigs na dmigs bya 'dus byas sogs grub par
NK045(bi)002:3062: 'gyur la / de dag gi rang bzhin du dmigs
NK045(bi)002:3063: par bya ba rdul tsam med na chos kun gzigs
NK045(bi)002:3064: pa mi srid pas dmigs pa mi 'thad par rgol
NK045(bi)002:3065: 'gyur la / ba dang 1 / chos kun la
NK045(bi)002:3066: dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin med na spros bral
NK045(bi)002:3067: lam de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo ngos bzung
NK045(bi)002:3069: de lta na de sus kyang sher par byar mi
NK045(bi)002:3070: rung bas de'i rnam pa'am ngo bo ngos bzung ba
NK045(bi)002:3072: 'bras bu rnam mkhyen yang mi 'thad de /
NK045(bi)002:3073: des dngos dngos med du mi dmigs pas na ci
NK045(bi)002:3074: yang mi mkhyen pas rnam mkhyen gyi ye shes mi
NK045(bi)002:3076: kun rdzob med pa'i phyir don dam pa'ang med par
NK045(bi)002:3077: thal te de don dam ni kun rdzob la ma
NK045(bi)002:3078: ltos par mi srid pa'i phyir dam pa'i don zhes
NK045(bi)002:3080: kun rdzob kyang mi 'thad de de dag mi dmigs
NK045(bi)002:3081: pa'i phyir ro snyam du kun rdzob mi 'thad par
NK045(bi)002:3082: rtsod pa ste bden gnyis la rtsod pa dang 4
NK045(bi)002:3083: / sbyor ba phar phyin drug gi nyams len yang
NK045(bi)002:3084: mi 'thad de sbyin sogs med pa'i phyir ro snyam
NK045(bi)002:3085: du sbyor ba mi 'thad par rtsod pa dang 5
NK045(bi)002:3086: / / sbyor ba'i rten dkon mchog med de /
NK045(bi)002:3087: de yang thob pa po dang rtogs bya med pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3088: sangs rgyas dkon mchog med par rtsod pa dang 6
NK045(bi)002:3089: / 'gog lam ming tsam yin pas chos dkon mchog mi srid par rtsod pa dang 7 /
NK045(bi)002:3090: dge 'dun gyi gdags gzhi gzugs sogs med pas dge 'dun dkon mchog med par rgol ba dang 8 /
NK045(bi)002:3091: spyod pa'i khyad par thabs mkhas pa'ang med de sbyin
NK045(bi)002:3092: sogs 'khor gsum dag pa'i shes rab kyis zin pa
NK045(bi)002:3093: med pas so snyam du thabs mkhas pa mi 'thad
NK045(bi)002:3095: dngos dngos med kyi ngo bor rtog pa bkag pas
NK045(bi)002:3096: de las gzhan du rtogs tshul med snyam du thub
NK045(bi)002:3097: pas de bzhin nyid mngon par rtogs pa mi 'thad
NK045(bi)002:3099: mi rtag sogs su 'dzin pa phyin ci ma log
NK045(bi)002:3100: par mi 'thad pas gtsang bde sogs su 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)002:3101: phyin ci log yin par mi 'thad par rgol ba
NK045(bi)002:3102: dang 11 / lam bsgoms kyang 'bras bu mngon du
NK045(bi)002:3103: mi byed pas lam gyi ngo bo mi 'thad par
NK045(bi)002:3105: spang bya med pas mi mthun phyogs mi 'thad par rtsod pa dang 13 /
NK045(bi)002:3106: blang bya med pas gnyen po mi 'thad par rtsod pa dang 14 /
NK045(bi)002:3107: mtshan gzhi med pas rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid mi 'thad par rtsod pa dang 15 /
NK045(bi)002:3108: bsgom bya rang spyi'i mtshan nyid med na mos spyod
NK045(bi)002:3109: dang 'phags sar de bzhin nyid spyi dang rang gi
NK045(bi)002:3110: mtshan nyid kyis sgom pa 16mi 'thad par rgol ba
NK045(bi)002:3111: ste de ltar phyin ci log tu rtogs nas brgal
NK045(bi)002:3113: de la bden gnyis 'gal bar 'dzin pa'i gang zag gis /
NK045(bi)002:3114: don dam rang bzhin med pa la brten nas kun rdzob sun phyung ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3115: kun rdzob la brten nas don dam mi 'thad par
NK045(bi)002:3116: rtsod pa dag ni rang gi phyin ci log tu
NK045(bi)002:3117: rtog pa tsam du zad de /
NK045(bi)002:3118: don dam par med pas kun rdzob tu med par thal zhe na /
NK045(bi)002:3120: kun rdzob tu med pa'i phyir zhe na rtags ma grub cing /
NK045(bi)002:3121: don dam par med par thal zhe na 'dod lan thebs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3122: de bzhin du kun rdzob tu yod pas don dam
NK045(bi)002:3123: par yod par thal zhe na khyab pa ma nges
NK045(bi)002:3124: pa sogs bden gnyis rnam par phye zhing stong rten
NK045(bi)002:3125: 'byung 'gal med kyi tshul las brtsams te log rtog
NK045(bi)002:3127: yang dag pa mthar thug gi don du na kun
NK045(bi)002:3128: rdzob las logs shig tu don dam nye bar mi
NK045(bi)002:3129: dmigs pas / dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa 'gal
NK045(bi)002:3130: ba med par zung 'jug mnyam pa chen po'i rjes
NK045(bi)002:3132: rtogs par dka' ba bar chad med rtse'i dmigs rnam
NK045(bi)002:3133: la pha rol gyi log par rtog pa bsal nas
NK045(bi)002:3134: dmigs pa sogs 'thad par bsgrubs shing yid ches pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3135: sgo nas zab mo'i don la phyin ci ma log
NK045(bi)002:3137: de la mdo 'dir ni sbyor ba phar phyin lnga
NK045(bi)002:3138: la log par sgrub pa bsal ba kho na bstan
NK045(bi)002:3139: pas / des thabs mkhas la log sgrub kyang dngos su bsal la /
NK045(bi)002:3140: gzhan thams cad kyang don gyis sel bas na /
NK045(bi)002:3141: mthu chen ldan pa bsam gtan bzhis kyang sogs nas brtsams te /
NK045(bi)002:3142: sprin mang 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:3143: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:3145: mthu chen ldan pa sogs kyis bsam gtan /
NK045(bi)002:3146: sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sogs kyis brtson 'grus /
NK045(bi)002:3147: gal te gzhan las sogs kyis bzod pa /
NK045(bi)002:3148: tshul khrims kyis ni sogs kyis tshul khrims /
NK045(bi)002:3149: sems can dag la sogs kyis sbyin pa bstan to //
NK045(bi)002:3150: de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i sher phyin la
NK045(bi)002:3151: gnas pas sbyin sogs phar phyin gzhan gyi sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:3152: la 'jug pa mi 'thad pa min par ma zad
NK045(bi)002:3154: theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan ni sgo tshad med
NK045(bi)002:3155: pa dang ro myang ba med pa dang stobs phul
NK045(bi)002:3157: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyang tshad gzung du med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3158: bzod pa yang dpag par dka' ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3159: tshul khrims shin tu skyon med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3160: sbyin pa mur thug pa med pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:3161: de ltar phar phyin re re'i yon tan yang phyogs
NK045(bi)002:3162: dus kyi mu dang mnyam par tshad dpag par dka'
NK045(bi)002:3163: ba dang / skyon gyi dri mas yongs su dag
NK045(bi)002:3164: pa gzhan gang dang yang mi mnyam pa'i mtshungs pa
NK045(bi)002:3165: med pa zhig thob pa de ni shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)002:3166: pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i mthus byed
NK045(bi)002:3168: 'di ltar chos rnams rang bzhin med par ma shes
NK045(bi)002:3169: nas gang zag gi bdag tu 'dzin pa yod na
NK045(bi)002:3170: / de'i dbang gis ser sna sogs phar phyin gyi mi mthun phyogs yod par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)002:3171: de ltar na kun 'dzin gyi chags pa dang bral
NK045(bi)002:3172: ba'i yongs su gtong ba sogs la 'jug mi nus
NK045(bi)002:3173: so // gal te gang zag gi bdag tu ma bzung yang /
NK045(bi)002:3174: dngos dngos med du dmigs pa dang ma bral na
NK045(bi)002:3175: srid zhir blang dor du zhen pa'i dbang gis zhi
NK045(bi)002:3177: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyang shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)002:3178: dngos po'i rang bzhin dang mi mthun pa'i ma rig pas bslad pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)002:3179: des na pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan yongs su
NK045(bi)002:3180: rdzogs pa dang dag pa ni sher phyin med na
NK045(bi)002:3181: mi 'byung la / mtha' gang du'ang mi dmigs pa'i sher phyin yod na /
NK045(bi)002:3182: de rgyud ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' de la
NK045(bi)002:3183: ser sna sogs med pas na de dag lus longs
NK045(bi)002:3184: spyod dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun 'dzin gyi chags
NK045(bi)002:3185: pa phra mo'ang med pa'i sbyin sogs la 'jug cing
NK045(bi)002:3186: / de yang lan dang rnam smin la re ba med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3187: 'khor gsum du rtog pa'i dri ma med par 'gyur
NK045(bi)002:3188: ba'i tshul gyis sbyin sogs kun sgrub par byed de
NK045(bi)002:3189: / 'di ltar dngos dngos med srid zhi'i mtha' gang
NK045(bi)002:3190: du'ang mi gnas pa'i sher phyin gyi don mthong ba
NK045(bi)002:3191: des 'khor ba spangs nas zhi ba mngon du byed
NK045(bi)002:3192: pa'i sems nam yang mi skyed la /
NK045(bi)002:3193: rang gis zung 'jug spros pa med pa'i de nyid mthong yang /
NK045(bi)002:3194: gzhan de ltar ma mthong ba'i sems can gyi phan
NK045(bi)002:3195: bde sgrub pa'i ched du sbyin sogs la 'jug pa
NK045(bi)002:3196: yang sems can gyi mtha' dang tshad mnyam par 'jug
NK045(bi)002:3197: pa yin pas tshad thug pa dang bcas pa min
NK045(bi)002:3198: no // des na byang chub sems dpas lam gyi
NK045(bi)002:3199: dus su gzhan don la dmigs nas rdzogs smin sbyangs
NK045(bi)002:3200: gsum mthar phyin par byed pa la skyo ba dang
NK045(bi)002:3201: der zhen med pa'i tshul gyis zhugs nas /
NK045(bi)002:3202: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa lhag med myang 'das kyi
NK045(bi)002:3203: dus su chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyis srid zhi'i
NK045(bi)002:3204: mthar mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi sku thob nas
NK045(bi)002:3205: nam mkha' ji srid du sems can gyi don rtag
NK045(bi)002:3206: khyab lhun grub tu mdzad pa'ang /
NK045(bi)002:3207: snang stong mnyam nyid chen po shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)002:3208: rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3210: gal te dmigs su med pas chos nyid stong pa mthong bas sbyin sogs 'gog pa zhig na /
NK045(bi)002:3211: des mthong ba'i stong nyid de ni sher phyin gyi don ma yin te /
NK045(bi)002:3212: thabs kyi rnam pa dang 'gal ba'i dngos med tsam du zad la /
NK045(bi)002:3213: de lta na ma dmigs par btags kyang /
NK045(bi)002:3214: des dngos por ma dmigs kyang dngos med du dmigs pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:3215: dmigs pa'i mtha' kun dang bral ba'i sher phyin gyi don gtan nas ma yin no //
NK045(bi)002:3216: sher phyin zab mo'i don ni thos bsam gyis sgro 'dogs chod pa'i dus nas kyang /
NK045(bi)002:3217: srid zhi'i mtha' la mngon zhen nyams smad par byed pa zhig yin na /
NK045(bi)002:3218: dngos su rtogs pa'i dus su lta ci smros pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:3219: de yang sbyin pa sna gcig btang ba lta bu
NK045(bi)002:3220: yang sher phyin gyis zin na phar phyin drug ldan
NK045(bi)002:3221: du tshang ste / ser sna sogs phar phyin drug
NK045(bi)002:3222: gi mi mthun phyogs sher phyin gyis bcom pas na
NK045(bi)002:3223: du tshang ste / / thabs kyi cha sbyin pa
NK045(bi)002:3224: gcig pu de yang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i ngo
NK045(bi)002:3226: des na spros bral rtogs pa'i ye shes gcig pu la ldog chas phyin /
NK045(bi)002:3227: gnas pa'i cha bsam gtan yin la de yang gnas
NK045(bi)002:3228: mi gnas kyi mtshan ma yongs su zad pa'i bsam
NK045(bi)002:3229: gtan chen po'o // de bzhin du brtson mi brtson
NK045(bi)002:3230: zhi ba'i lhun gyis grub pa'i brtson pa chen po
NK045(bi)002:3231: gtan chen po'o // / bzod mi bzod kyi mtshan
NK045(bi)002:3232: ma yongs su zhi ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi
NK045(bi)002:3234: 'chal ba dang 'chal min du dmigs pa zad pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3235: 'chal ba'i dri ma yongs su zad pa'i tshul khrims
NK045(bi)002:3236: chen po / chags pa dang ma chags pa mi
NK045(bi)002:3237: dmigs pa'i mtshan ma'i chags pa phra mo dang bral
NK045(bi)002:3238: ba sbyin pa chen po ste /
NK045(bi)002:3239: snang cha sbyin sogs dang stong cha shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)002:3240: ngo bo zung du zhugs pa'i rnam kun mchog ldan
NK045(bi)002:3241: gyi stong nyid du 'gyur bas phar phyin kun sdud
NK045(bi)002:3242: pa yin pas gnad la mkhas par bya ba ni
NK045(bi)002:3243: sher phyin nyams len gyi mdo 'gags yin pas /
NK045(bi)002:3244: mdo 'dir bsam gtan la sogs pa de dag gi rgya che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan nas /
NK045(bi)002:3245: de rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i sher phyin gyis zin
NK045(bi)002:3246: pa'i stobs las 'byung tshul gsungs pa rnams khong du
NK045(bi)002:3248: thabs shes zung 'jug gi sher phyin zab mo'i sbyor ba la mkhas par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:3249: skabs 'dir slob dpon seng ge bzang pos ni /
NK045(bi)002:3250: sems kun tu gnas pa chos mchog gi rjes nas /
NK045(bi)002:3251: ma rig thibs po bcom nas rang byung thob par 'gyur yan chad mthong lam rtse mo dang /
NK045(bi)002:3252: mthu chen ldan pa sogs tshigs bcad gsum bsgom lam rtse mo dang /
NK045(bi)002:3253: dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sogs sho lo ka gnyis bar chad med rtse dang /
NK045(bi)002:3254: bdag nyid chen po sogs sho lo ka lnga bsal bya log sgrub spang ba dang sbyar /
NK045(bi)002:3255: sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sogs tshigs bcad gcig mthar gyis pa /
NK045(bi)002:3256: spyo ba byas sam sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis kyis skad cig ma'i sbyor ba /
NK045(bi)002:3257: bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis chos sku bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3258: de man chad yum yongs su tshol ba chos tshol gyi skabs dang sbyar bar mdzad /
NK045(bi)002:3259: de ltar sbyar tshul de brgyad stong pa dang sbyar na 'grigs par mngon kyang /
NK045(bi)002:3260: chos tshol gyi le'u na ji ltar gsungs pa'i don 'dir tshang zhing sbyar du yod mod kyi /
NK045(bi)002:3261: don gyis thob pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:3262: rtag tu ngu dang chos 'phags kyi dpe las brtsams
NK045(bi)002:3263: te brtson pa sogs kyis phar phyin sgrub tshul dang
NK045(bi)002:3264: sbyar shes par yang bya la 'on kyang skabs brgyad
NK045(bi)002:3265: kyi sbyar tshul ni ye shes zhabs kyis bzhed pa
NK045(bi)002:3266: ltar mdo 'di nyid kyis bab kyis shes pas de
NK045(bi)002:3267: ltar sbyar na bde bar mngon no //
NK045(bi)002:3268: yang ye shes zhabs ltar na /
NK045(bi)002:3269: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing sogs tshigs
NK045(bi)002:3270: bcad gcig mthong lam gyi 'bras bu zad mi skye
NK045(bi)002:3271: shes pa'i ye shes la sbyar /
NK045(bi)002:3272: mthong lam gyi rgyu de yan chad dang /
NK045(bi)002:3273: mthu chen ldan pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig sgom lam rtse mo dang sbyar /
NK045(bi)002:3274: de yang rten par byed pa ma yin pa gzung rtog spong ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3275: gnas par byed pa med pas 'dzin rtog spang bar bzhed /
NK045(bi)002:3276: shes rab mchog thob sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bar chad med rtse dang /
NK045(bi)002:3277: 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung sogs nas bsal bya log rtog spang ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3278: brtson sogs phar phyin gzhan yang de'i mi mthun phyogs spang ba'i sgo nas brjod pa'o zhes bzhed do //
NK045(bi)002:3279: da ni skabs drug pa mthar gyis pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:3280: skad cig gcig la chos kun snang la ma 'dres
NK045(bi)002:3281: pa'i rnam pa skye med du bsgom pa gsal ba
NK045(bi)002:3282: rab kyi mthar thug pa skad cig ma'i sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:3283: grub pa'i ched du bsgom pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:3284: de yang rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i skabs su'ang mkhyen gsum gyi rnam pa cha tshang bar bsgoms kyang /
NK045(bi)002:3285: dkyus thog gcig tu tshang ba'i go rim nges can du sgom pa'i nges pa med de /
NK045(bi)002:3286: mi rtag pa'i rnam pa lta bu sogs gang rung
NK045(bi)002:3287: re re nas rtsal du bton nas sgom pa'ang yod
NK045(bi)002:3288: la / 'dir thams cad dkyus thog gcig gi nyams len gyi nang du tshang bar sgom pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:3289: de yang mthar gyis pa'i skabs na bstan pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:3290: bcu gsum pos zin pa'i sgo nas dkyus gcig la
NK045(bi)002:3291: go rim nges can du bsgom pa yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3292: go rim nges can zhes pa ni nges pa med
NK045(bi)002:3293: na tshang ma tshang gi rnam dbye 'byed dka' ba'i
NK045(bi)002:3294: slad du'o // de yang mdo las /
NK045(bi)002:3295: bcom ldan 'das thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3296: ngo bo nyid la byang chen mthar gyis spyod pa
NK045(bi)002:3297: dang mthar gyis slob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3298: mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi zhes sogs kyis bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:3299: de la lam gyi ngo bo sbyin pa nas shes
NK045(bi)002:3300: rab kyi bar gyi phar phyin drug la sbyor ba
NK045(bi)002:3302: lam khyad par du byed pa'i rten bsam pa phun
NK045(bi)002:3303: sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa rjes su
NK045(bi)002:3304: dran pa drug dang mi 'bral ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3305: lam dag par byed pa chos thams cad dngos po
NK045(bi)002:3306: med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ro gcig pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)002:3307: gyis ni lam la mthar gyis sam rim gyis slob
NK045(bi)002:3308: pa yi bya ba goms par bya ba bzhed de
NK045(bi)002:3309: / de yang sangs rgyas sogs don dam par dran pa med la /
NK045(bi)002:3310: kun rdzob tu dran pa'i tshul gyis 'jug cing /
NK045(bi)002:3311: rjes dran phyi ma gsum ni /
NK045(bi)002:3313: mthun rkyen sbyin pa dbang po lhar skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams dran pa yin par bzhed la /
NK045(bi)002:3314: tshul khrims gtong ba gnyis phyin drug gi skabs na dngos dang /
NK045(bi)002:3315: rjes dran gyi skabs na 'bras bu'i cha nas yid la byed pas mi zlos la /
NK045(bi)002:3316: lha dbang po dang dkon mchog rten gyi cha nas mi zlos zhes mkhas pa dag bzhed /
NK045(bi)002:3317: de la mkhyen gsum gyis rnam pa brgya don gsum
NK045(bi)002:3318: gyis don du gzhi lam 'bras bu'i rnam pa ma
NK045(bi)002:3319: lus pa bsdus pa yin kyang de rnams dkyus thog
NK045(bi)002:3320: gcig tu blo la shar ba tsam zhig gis mthar
NK045(bi)002:3321: gyis bsgom tshul thun mong min pa min te 'on
NK045(bi)002:3322: kyang ring ba'i sbyor ba tsam yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3323: der ma zad gzhi lam rnam pa gsum skye med
NK045(bi)002:3324: du sgom pas kyang don gyis chos kun bsdus kyang
NK045(bi)002:3325: de tsam zhig gi mthar gyis par mi 'gro ba
NK045(bi)002:3326: bzhin no // 'o na gang zhe na /
NK045(bi)002:3327: gnyis su 'dzin pa can gyi ngor chos gcig bsgom
NK045(bi)002:3328: na de nyid las gzhan la 'jug mi shes pa
NK045(bi)002:3329: lta bu de bsal ba'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:3330: sbyin pa lta bu re res kyang phar phyin gzhan bsdus pas na /
NK045(bi)002:3331: thabs shes dbyer med kyi nyams len khyad par can gang la zag med kyi chos kun 'du tshul /
NK045(bi)002:3332: phar phyin kun sdud pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3333: bshad ma thag pa sbyor ba la log sgrub bsal ba'i skabs bzhin shes par byas nas /
NK045(bi)002:3334: rjes thob tu go rim nges pa can nam so
NK045(bi)002:3335: sor dmigs phyed pa'i tshul gyis nyams len sbyin pa
NK045(bi)002:3336: sna gcig la'ang phar phyin kun tshang ba'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)002:3337: mngon zhen med par sgrub cing /
NK045(bi)002:3338: mnyam bzhag tu chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid la goms pa'i mthus /
NK045(bi)002:3339: nyams len gcig gi steng du'ang mkhyen gsum gyis rnam
NK045(bi)002:3340: pa brgya don gsum gyis mtshon pa'i nyams len mtha'
NK045(bi)002:3341: dag rim gyis 'dren zhing 'char thub pa'i gnad khyad
NK045(bi)002:3342: par can la myong ba dang nges pa je bas
NK045(bi)002:3343: je 'phel la song ba ni mthar gyis pa zhes
NK045(bi)002:3344: bya ste / chos gcig gi steng du'ang gzhi lam
NK045(bi)002:3345: 'bras bu'i rtogs bya ji snyed pa la sgro 'dogs
NK045(bi)002:3346: gcod shes pa'i shes rab khyad par can gyis zin
NK045(bi)002:3347: pa'i sgom tshul khyad par can te de yang bsgom
NK045(bi)002:3348: bya lam gyi ngo bo re rer yang phar phyin
NK045(bi)002:3349: drug ldan du gyur pas lam gyi rnam pa mtha'
NK045(bi)002:3350: dag dkyus thog de la tshang ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3351: bsgom pa'i rten dkon mchog gsum dang bsod nams bya
NK045(bi)002:3352: ba'i dngos po gsum las gong nas gong du khyad
NK045(bi)002:3353: par du 'phel ba mi nyams par byed cing /
NK045(bi)002:3354: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams
NK045(bi)002:3355: tha dad du med par rtogs pas gnyis su 'dzin
NK045(bi)002:3357: nyams len sna gcig gis kyang gzhi la sgro 'dogs chod pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3359: 'bras bu dpe byad kyi bar bsdus pa la dmigs
NK045(bi)002:3360: rnam je gsal du song nas mtha' med par 'phel
NK045(bi)002:3361: ba ste / don la shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)002:3362: tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mthus rnam kun
NK045(bi)002:3363: mchog ldan gyi stong nyid la nyams len byed nus
NK045(bi)002:3364: ba ste / tshul yin la / de yang blo
NK045(bi)002:3365: gcig gi steng nas gsal ba rab kyi mthar thug
NK045(bi)002:3366: par sgom nus na grub pa'i tshad de skad cig
NK045(bi)002:3367: ba ste / tshul yin la / ma yin la
NK045(bi)002:3368: / rim gyis 'dren pa ni mthar gyis pa'i skabs
NK045(bi)002:3369: ba ste / tshul yin la / ma yin la
NK045(bi)002:3370: / zhes so // brgyad stong par seng ge'i sgra
NK045(bi)002:3371: sgrogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)002:3372: par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa'i tshig gcig
NK045(bi)002:3373: po 'dis mthar gyis pa bstan par seng ge bzang
NK045(bi)002:3374: ba ste / tshul yin la / ma yin la
NK045(bi)002:3375: / zhes so // pos bzhed / sh+aan ti pas
NK045(bi)002:3376: chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i phyir shes rab
NK045(bi)002:3377: kyi pha rol tu phyin par sogs mdo tshig gsum
NK045(bi)002:3378: gyis mthar gyis pa bstan la /
NK045(bi)002:3379: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:3380: nam mkha' mu med pa'i sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:3381: ri rab sna tshogs pa'i sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:3382: gzugs mu med pa'i sogs tshig bzhis skad cig ma'i sbyor ba bzhi bstan nas /
NK045(bi)002:3383: mdzad pa mdor bsdus par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3384: phyir sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan par bzhed do
NK045(bi)002:3385: // de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i mthar gyis pa ston pa'i mdo ni skabs 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:3386: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:3387: phar phyin drug 'bras bu dang bcas par bstan pa
NK045(bi)002:3388: 'di tsam du lam 'bras kyi yon tan thams cad
NK045(bi)002:3389: 'du bas na / lam ston pa po sangs rgyas dang /
NK045(bi)002:3391: de la 'jug pa dge 'dun yin pa shugs kyis mtshon la /
NK045(bi)002:3392: rjes dran phyi ma gsum dang dngos med ngo bo nyid kyang der 'du ba yin no //
NK045(bi)002:3393: des na phar phyin gcig gi nyams len la'ang phar
NK045(bi)002:3394: phyin gzhan 'dren thub pas mtshon nas gzhi la sgro
NK045(bi)002:3395: 'dogs chod pa / lam nyams su len pa /
NK045(bi)002:3396: 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i dmigs rnam mtha' dag
NK045(bi)002:3397: dkyus gcig gi nyams len der rim gyis 'dren thub
NK045(bi)002:3398: pa la mthar gyis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba
NK045(bi)002:3399: yi / grangs kyi nges pa bzung nas 'di tsam
NK045(bi)002:3400: zhig 'char thub dgos pa yin zhes bsam par mi
NK045(bi)002:3401: yi / bya ste / dang po phyin drug gi
NK045(bi)002:3402: rnam pa tsam nas de goms pa las rnam pa
NK045(bi)002:3404: de nas rnam pa tshad med pa'i chos kyi sgom
NK045(bi)002:3405: lus pa'i dmigs rnam mtha' yas pa 'char ba'i bar
NK045(bi)002:3407: skad cig ma'i skabs su zag med kyi chos kun mngon du byed par gsungs pa'i bar du'o //
NK045(bi)002:3408: de yang chos gcig gi de bzhin nyid chos kun gyi de bzhin nyid yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3409: de bzhin nyid mnyam pa chen pos chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)002:3410: de la dmigs pa'i yul can gyi dri ma dag
NK045(bi)002:3411: pa'i rim pa dang mtshungs par chos gcig mngon du
NK045(bi)002:3412: byas pas chos kun mngon du byed nus pa yin
NK045(bi)002:3413: pa ni / dngos po'i chos nyid rnam kun mchog
NK045(bi)002:3414: ldan gyi stong pa nyid kyi stobs las yin par
NK045(bi)002:3415: shes par bya ba gnad shin tu gal che'o //
NK045(bi)002:3416: da ni skabs bdun pa sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs
NK045(bi)002:3417: pa'i rab kyi mtha' skad cig ma'i sbyor ba bshad
NK045(bi)002:3419: byang chen de ltar yum la spyod pa ni sems
NK045(bi)002:3420: bskyed pa gcig gis phar phyin drug yongs su rdzogs
NK045(bi)002:3421: par byed do zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin du /
NK045(bi)002:3422: ye shes skad cig ma gcig la shes bya'i chos
NK045(bi)002:3423: thams cad snang zhing mnyam par rdzogs par gyur pa
NK045(bi)002:3425: de la ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas rnam pa bzhir bshad de /
NK045(bi)002:3426: rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i skad cig ma dang /
NK045(bi)002:3427: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma dang /
NK045(bi)002:3428: mtshan nyid med pa'i skad cig ma dang /
NK045(bi)002:3429: gnyis su med pa'i skad cig ma zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3430: ngo bo bya ba rdzogs pa'i ye shes skad cig ma gcig las tha dad du med do //
NK045(bi)002:3431: de la bzhed pa 'ga' zhig na rnam smin min
NK045(bi)002:3432: pa ni de snga rang rgyud la smin zin min
NK045(bi)002:3433: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan stobs sogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:3434: rnam smin yin pa rang rgyud la smin zin pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3435: sbyin sogs nas dpe byad rjes mthun pa'i bar la
NK045(bi)002:3436: bshad nas / de gnyis ka yul du byed par bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3437: yang rnam smin min pas bdun man chad du 'bad rtsol gyis sgom pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3438: rnam smin dag sa pa'i ye shes la bshad pa
NK045(bi)002:3439: dang gzhan yang so skye dang 'phags pa sogs kyi
NK045(bi)002:3440: khyad par du bshad pa yod na'ang 'dir de gnyis
NK045(bi)002:3441: ka yul can bar chad med pa'i skad cig ma
NK045(bi)002:3442: rang gi ldog cha nas bshad de /
NK045(bi)002:3443: rnam smin min pa ni sngar slob lam du sbyin
NK045(bi)002:3444: sogs re re'i nang du zag med kyi chos kun
NK045(bi)002:3445: ngo bos 'du tshul shes nas der bsdus te yongs
NK045(bi)002:3446: su rdzogs par goms pa'i 'bad rtsol gyi 'du byed
NK045(bi)002:3447: goms pa mtha' thug pa'i dbang gis /
NK045(bi)002:3448: da lta dngos po la so sor 'dzin pa'i phyin
NK045(bi)002:3449: ci log bral ba'i phyir sbyin sogs re res kyang
NK045(bi)002:3450: / sbyin pa nas dpe byad brgyad cu'i bar gyi
NK045(bi)002:3451: zag med kyi chos kun bsdus pa de'i ngo bo
NK045(bi)002:3452: / mthong ba'i phyir / thub pa'i bar chad med
NK045(bi)002:3453: lam skad cig gcig pa yi rtogs pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)002:3454: rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i skad cig ma
NK045(bi)002:3455: zhes su shes par bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3456: sngar gyi rnam par smin pa min pa bar chad
NK045(bi)002:3457: med lam gyi snga rol rnams su byung ba'i mthar
NK045(bi)002:3458: gyis pa las byung ba shes pa'i ched du rgyu
NK045(bi)002:3460: yang na rnam par smin pa min pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3461: sa bon gyi 'bras bu zhes pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:3462: de dper na zo chun khyud mo de rgyu'i dus
NK045(bi)002:3463: na thag pa sogs re re nas 'dus byas kyang
NK045(bi)002:3464: bzo legs par tshar rjes skyes bu'i rdog thabs gcig
NK045(bi)002:3466: thams cad cig car 'gul zhing chu len pa dang 'khor ba sogs cig car byed pa bzhin du /
NK045(bi)002:3467: sngon 'bad rtsol gyis goms pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3468: mthus da lta 'bad med du chos gcig mngon du
NK045(bi)002:3469: byas pas chos kun mngon du 'gyur ba yin no
NK045(bi)002:3470: // da lta skad cig ma rang gi ngo bo ni rnam par smin pa yin te /
NK045(bi)002:3471: de yang dngos po gcig gi rang bzhin dngos po
NK045(bi)002:3472: kun gyi rang bzhin yin pas zung 'jug gi chos
NK045(bi)002:3473: nyid zab mo la tha dad med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3474: yul can gyi blos kyang de de bzhin du bsgom
NK045(bi)002:3475: zhing sa rnams su 'bad rtsol gyis bsgrub nas skad
NK045(bi)002:3476: cig la mngon du byed par gyur cig snyam pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3477: 'phen pa dang tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i shugs kyis
NK045(bi)002:3478: / ji ltar gnas pa'i zab mo de de bzhin
NK045(bi)002:3479: du mthong nus pa'i mthun rkyen tshang zhing 'gal rkyen
NK045(bi)002:3480: bral ba rgyun mtha'i rdor ting gi skad cig ma'i
NK045(bi)002:3481: skabs 'dir mthar gyis pa'i skabs ltar rim can min
NK045(bi)002:3482: / te / cig car snang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
NK045(bi)002:3483: de'i phyir na rnam par smin pa ni gang tshe rgyun mtha'i bar chad med thob pa na /
NK045(bi)002:3484: rang bzhin nam ngo bos dri ma ye nas med
NK045(bi)002:3485: pa'i zag med kyi chos dkar thams cad kyi rang
NK045(bi)002:3486: bzhin nam de dang 'bral mi rung ba'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)002:3487: de'i ngo bor gyur pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)002:3488: tu phyin pa rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan
NK045(bi)002:3490: rtsol med du thob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par smin
NK045(bi)002:3491: pa'am yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos nyid kyi gnas skabs
NK045(bi)002:3492: las skyes pa bar chad med lam de yi tshe
NK045(bi)002:3493: / de la rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma gcig gi ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:3494: mtshan nyid med pa'i skad cig ma ni /
NK045(bi)002:3495: slob lam du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi
NK045(bi)002:3496: rnam pa mtha' dag tshangs par spyod pa yi sgo
NK045(bi)002:3497: nas / 'khor 'das kyi chos kun rmi lam dang
NK045(bi)002:3498: 'dra bar snang stong zung 'jug tu spyod pa la
NK045(bi)002:3499: nas / gnas nas / goms pa mthar thug pa
NK045(bi)002:3500: na kun byang gi chos rnams skye 'gag dang gcig
NK045(bi)002:3501: tha dad la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:3502: rgyun mtha'i ye shes skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs
NK045(bi)002:3503: pa la de ltar brjod do //
NK045(bi)002:3504: gnyis su med pa'i skad cig ma ni yul rmi lam gyi snang ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3505: de mthong ba'i yul can gyi shes pa nyid brtags
NK045(bi)002:3506: na yul yul can tha dad pa gnyis kyi tshul
NK045(bi)002:3508: sems nyid der snang ba tsam yin pa ltar /
NK045(bi)002:3509: 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams kyang gnas lugs la gzung
NK045(bi)002:3510: 'dzin gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid gcig gi
NK045(bi)002:3511: tshul du gnas pa de nyid /
NK045(bi)002:3512: rgyun mtha'i ye shes skad cig ma gcig gis ji
NK045(bi)002:3513: ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong ba la gnyis su med
NK045(bi)002:3514: pa'i skad cig ma zhes don dang mthun pa'i ming
NK045(bi)002:3515: gis brjod pa'o // de yang gzung 'dzin gnyis snang
NK045(bi)002:3516: gi bag chags kyis bslad pa'i ring la chos thams
NK045(bi)002:3517: cad mnyam pa chen po'i don ji lta ba bzhin
NK045(bi)002:3519: gnyis su snang ba'i ngor chos can tha dad pa dang dus tha dad pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3520: de'i chos nyid tha dad pa'i gnyis chos su snang
NK045(bi)002:3521: bas shes bya mtha' dag gi bden gnyis cig car
NK045(bi)002:3522: gzigs pa mi srid kyang gnyis snang gi bag chags
NK045(bi)002:3523: drung nas 'byin pa rgyun mtha'i ye shes skyes pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3524: tshe mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthar thug pa gzigs
NK045(bi)002:3525: pas na / mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdus pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:3526: shes bya ma lus pa'ang de dang ro mnyam du
NK045(bi)002:3527: gzigs shing de las g.yo ba'ang mi srid par bden
NK045(bi)002:3528: gnyis gcig car du gzigs pa shes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3529: chos nyid kyi gshis la skye 'gag ma grub pas
NK045(bi)002:3530: 'di la snga phyi bar gsum gyi cha sogs mtshan
NK045(bi)002:3531: mas spros pas bzhag tu med de /
NK045(bi)002:3532: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin yin na'ang /
NK045(bi)002:3533: gnyis snang gi bslad pa can gyi gdul bya gang
NK045(bi)002:3534: zhig dus gsum skye 'gag tu snang ba can gyi
NK045(bi)002:3535: ngor / skad cig re re bzhin du'ang gdul bya'i
NK045(bi)002:3536: rgyud dang skye 'gag gi chos de dag mkhyen cing
NK045(bi)002:3537: don mdzad pa'i rang snang gi cha nas rnam mkhyen
NK045(bi)002:3538: skad cig ma ltar du snang ba las gzung mi
NK045(bi)002:3539: shes pas rnam mkhyen ni mi rtag pa'o zhes su'ang
NK045(bi)002:3540: bzhag la de bzhin nyid kyi tshul la nges par
NK045(bi)002:3541: ma skyes pa'i byis pa dang mu stegs rnams dang
NK045(bi)002:3542: rtsod pa na de ltar 'chad par bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:3543: rang gi ngo bo la chos nyid dang gnyis su
NK045(bi)002:3544: dbyer med pa'i rang byung ye shes kyi sku skye
NK045(bi)002:3545: 'gag med pa'i don gyis gzhal nas /
NK045(bi)002:3546: dus gsum kun tu yang chos nyid kyi sku 'pho
NK045(bi)002:3547: 'gyur med pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
NK045(bi)002:3548: shes ni 'dus ma byas rtag pa'o zhes su'ang mdo
NK045(bi)002:3549: las gsungs pa ltar sngags rgyud rnams su'ang de ltar
NK045(bi)002:3550: gsungs pa ni so so rang gis zab mo'i don
NK045(bi)002:3551: khong du chud pa'i rjes kyi nges pa la de
NK045(bi)002:3553: dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin //
NK045(bi)002:3556: brten nas skyes pa'i 'dus byas dngos po rnams dang /
NK045(bi)002:3557: brten nas btags pas 'dus byas su song ba dngos med gnyis ka'ang 'dus byas te /
NK045(bi)002:3558: dngos med rnams kyang dgag bya bcad pa las de grub la /
NK045(bi)002:3559: de la ma ltos par mi grub pas gzhan la
NK045(bi)002:3560: ltos pas res 'ga' ba'am 'dus byas pa lta bu
NK045(bi)002:3561: yin la / dngos dngos med gang gi yang mthar
NK045(bi)002:3562: mi gnas pa'i myang 'das chen po ni chos nyid
NK045(bi)002:3563: bsal bzhag med pa dang ro gcig pas bsam brjod
NK045(bi)002:3565: rgyud las skye ba'am rgyu las btags mi dgos te chos nyid ye nas gnas pa yin pas so //
NK045(bi)002:3566: myang 'das rgyu las skye ba ltar snang ba ni /
NK045(bi)002:3567: rang gi gnyis snang gi rtog pa log pa tsam las der btags pa ste /
NK045(bi)002:3568: don la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3570: zhes sher phyin gyi mdo 'dir yang lan brgya phrag tu gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)002:3571: des na rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa
NK045(bi)002:3572: srid zhi mnyam pa nyid kyi don la glo bur
NK045(bi)002:3573: gyi sgrib pa lam gyis bsal stobs kyis dri ma
NK045(bi)002:3574: mtha' dag log pa'i de bzhin nyid zung 'jug chen
NK045(bi)002:3575: po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi skur brjod
NK045(bi)002:3576: pa yin no // de ltar na zag med kyi
NK045(bi)002:3577: chos kun ngo bo tha dad med par mnyam pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3578: chos nyid kyis bsdus pa ltar de mngon du byed
NK045(bi)002:3579: pa'i lam rnam smin min pa'i gnas skabs mngon du
NK045(bi)002:3580: ma bskyed na de'i 'bras bu rnam smin gyi skad
NK045(bi)002:3582: rnam smin min pa ci tsam goms kyang skad cig
NK045(bi)002:3583: la shes bya mtha' dag mthong ba'i rnam smin min
NK045(bi)002:3584: pa'i ye shes skyed mi nus snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:3585: chos thams cad mtshan nyid kyis tha dad du bden
NK045(bi)002:3586: par grub pa zhig na gcig mngon du byas pas
NK045(bi)002:3587: kun mngon du byed pa mi grub kyang /
NK045(bi)002:3588: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su tshul
NK045(bi)002:3589: gcig pas na mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid
NK045(bi)002:3590: la sgrib pa lam gyis bsal nas dri ma dang
NK045(bi)002:3591: bral ba na de bzhin nyid mthong la /
NK045(bi)002:3592: de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa'i snang ba zhes bya
NK045(bi)002:3593: ba gang yang med de snang stong zung 'jug la
NK045(bi)002:3594: de bzhin nyid ces bya zhing /
NK045(bi)002:3595: de yang mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su tshul gcig
NK045(bi)002:3596: pa so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin
NK045(bi)002:3597: gyi gnyis su snang zhen can gyi ngor snang ba
NK045(bi)002:3598: lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK045(bi)002:3599: de ltar na chos nyid gnyis su med pa mnyam pa chen po'i don la /
NK045(bi)002:3600: gnyis 'dzin gyi bag chags drung nas phyung ba'i ye
NK045(bi)002:3601: shes de ni yul dang yul can du med par
NK045(bi)002:3602: gnyis med ro mnyam chen por gyur pa yin pas
NK045(bi)002:3603: / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3604: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rdul dang skad cig
NK045(bi)002:3605: ma'i cha bsags pa las 'das pa'i mkha' khyab ye
NK045(bi)002:3606: shes kyi sku 'bras bu'i yum rnam pa thams cad
NK045(bi)002:3608: tshul de lta bu'i skad cig ma de brgyad stong par /
NK045(bi)002:3609: mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar rig par
NK045(bi)002:3610: bya'o zhes pa'i mdo tshig gcig po des bstan par
NK045(bi)002:3612: dman pa'i yid byed dang bden 'dzin sogs kyis mi g.yo ba'i don du 'grel lo //
NK045(bi)002:3614: chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de /
NK045(bi)002:3615: zhes pa'i rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)002:3616: gong du ji skad bstan pa'i rgyu lam gyi chos
NK045(bi)002:3617: 'di ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te
NK045(bi)002:3618: goms pa rab kyi mthar thug pa rgyun mtha'i bar
NK045(bi)002:3620: bshad ma thag pa ltar gyi rnam par smin pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3621: ye shes skad cig ma yul chos kyi dbyings dang
NK045(bi)002:3622: gnyis su med pa bskyed nas de'i rnam grol lam
NK045(bi)002:3623: la byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas pa nyid
NK045(bi)002:3625: da ni skabs brgyad pa sbyor gzhi bsgoms pa'i 'bras
NK045(bi)002:3626: bu mthar thug yongs su dag pa chos sku'i rang
NK045(bi)002:3628: snang cha rtogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin stobs la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i chos dang /
NK045(bi)002:3629: stong pa dbyings kyi cha ye nas 'du 'bral med
NK045(bi)002:3630: pa snang stong zung 'jug gi chos nyid glo bur
NK045(bi)002:3631: gyi dri mas dag pa mngon du gyur pa'i bdag
NK045(bi)002:3632: nyid ni chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes
NK045(bi)002:3633: bya ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku mthar thug pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:3634: 'di dbyings stong rkyang gi cha tsam min te /
NK045(bi)002:3635: gzhi dus na'ang stong rkyang gi cha tsam chos nyid mthar thug pa min la /
NK045(bi)002:3636: 'bras dus na'ang de'i cha tsam sangs rgyas min te
NK045(bi)002:3637: med par dgag pa tsam la mkhyen pa sogs sangs
NK045(bi)002:3638: rgyas kyi yon tan rdul tsam med par sngon gyi
NK045(bi)002:3639: mkhas pa rnams kyis gsungs pa ltar don la gnas
NK045(bi)002:3640: shing / sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir des mkhyen par yang mi rung ste /
NK045(bi)002:3642: 'on te sems dang ldan pa'i phyir //
NK045(bi)002:3643: shes na mi shes 'jig par thal //
NK045(bi)002:3645: des na sangs rgyas sku bzhi po gang yang rnam pa thams cad mi mkhyen pa med de /
NK045(bi)002:3646: gal te yod na sangs rgyas kyang min par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)002:3647: de la chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku'am mdo
NK045(bi)002:3648: gzhan las rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi sku
NK045(bi)002:3649: zhes gsungs pa ye shes rnam pa thams cad pa
NK045(bi)002:3650: de nyid kyi mkhyen pa nyid kyi cha la ye
NK045(bi)002:3651: shes chos sku zhes bya ste /
NK045(bi)002:3652: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gcig gi
NK045(bi)002:3653: rang bzhin gyi sku la so sor dbye na byang
NK045(bi)002:3656: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
NK045(bi)002:3657: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgu dang /
NK045(bi)002:3659: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /
NK045(bi)002:3660: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3662: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
NK045(bi)002:3663: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:3664: rnam pa thams cad dag pa bzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:3668: bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /
NK045(bi)002:3669: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
NK045(bi)002:3670: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /
NK045(bi)002:3671: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3674: gzhi lam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
NK045(bi)002:3675: de ltar zag med kyi chos sde tshan nyer gcig
NK045(bi)002:3676: nang gses brgya dang zhe drug po de la chos
NK045(bi)002:3678: de yang byang phyogs la sogs pa de dag ming
NK045(bi)002:3679: mthun yang sems sems byung gi spros pa zhi ba
NK045(bi)002:3680: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gzigs pa la
NK045(bi)002:3681: ldog cha nas bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi byang phyogs
NK045(bi)002:3682: sogs ni slob pa rnams dang thun mong min pa
NK045(bi)002:3683: nyid do // sangs rgyas de yang phyogs dus kyi
NK045(bi)002:3684: gdul bya la gang 'dul gyi sku dang gsung rnam
NK045(bi)002:3685: pa thams cad par lhun gyis grub par 'char ba
NK045(bi)002:3686: nyid do // dang / nam mkhas gar khyab kyi
NK045(bi)002:3687: sems can la mdzad pas khyab pas phyogs thams cad
NK045(bi)002:3689: dus phyi ma'i mu mthar thug gi bar du zad pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes kyang bya'o //
NK045(bi)002:3690: ye shes kyi sku de nyid 'og min du gdul
NK045(bi)002:3691: bya sa bcu'i sems dpa' rnams la mtshan dpe gsal
NK045(bi)002:3692: rdzogs kyi rnam pas theg pa chen po'i chos snang
NK045(bi)002:3693: bar mdzad cing dus rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor lor
NK045(bi)002:3694: bzhugs pa nges pa lnga ldan gyi longs sku dang
NK045(bi)002:3695: / ye shes rnam pa thams cad pa'i sku de
NK045(bi)002:3696: nyid gang la gang 'dul du shar ba'i sku gang
NK045(bi)002:3697: gis srid pa ji srid bar /
NK045(bi)002:3698: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa sna tshogs pa dus
NK045(bi)002:3699: mnyam du rtsol med lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa
NK045(bi)002:3700: de ni gdul bya so so'i ngo skal la snang
NK045(bi)002:3701: ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba ste /
NK045(bi)002:3702: de ltar sku bzhi po ni 'bras bu'o //
NK045(bi)002:3703: yang na chos sku dang chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni gcig tu byas te /
NK045(bi)002:3704: dag pa gnyis ldan rnam grol gyi cha nas dbyings
NK045(bi)002:3705: dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni
NK045(bi)002:3706: chos nyid kyi sku yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3707: de'i mkhyen cha zag med kyi chos sde tshan nyer
NK045(bi)002:3708: gcig gi ldog cha nas chos skur bzhag pa las
NK045(bi)002:3709: don la dag pa gnyis ldan dbyings ye zung 'jug
NK045(bi)002:3710: ye shes kyi sku tsam la khyad par med pas
NK045(bi)002:3711: / chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum dang phrin
NK045(bi)002:3712: las dang bzhi la 'bras bu chos sku mtshon byed
NK045(bi)002:3713: chos bzhir bzhed pa'ang yod la /
NK045(bi)002:3714: phrin las ni chos sku'i phrin las yid par rtogs
NK045(bi)002:3715: pa dang phrin las gnyis ka rang gzhan don gnyis
NK045(bi)002:3716: lhun gyis grub pa sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas
NK045(bi)002:3717: phrin las logs su mi rtsi bar sku bzhi po
NK045(bi)002:3718: nyid chos sku mtshon pa'i chos bzhir 'chad de /
NK045(bi)002:3719: de gnyis don la 'gal ba med pa yin no //
NK045(bi)002:3720: de la ye shes chos kyi sku brnyes nas de'i
NK045(bi)002:3721: byin rlabs las gzugs sku gnyis kyis 'khor ba ji
NK045(bi)002:3722: srid du rgyun mi chad pa'i phrin las mdzad na
NK045(bi)002:3723: / phrin las kyi rnam pa la du yod snyam na /
NK045(bi)002:3724: spyir sems can rnams la phan bde mtha' yas pa
NK045(bi)002:3725: rtag khyab tu mdzad pa'i phrin las tshad med kyang
NK045(bi)002:3726: mdor bsdu na phrin las nyi shu rtsa bdun du
NK045(bi)002:3727: gsungs te / tshogs lam du 'gro ba rnams zhi
NK045(bi)002:3728: ba'i go 'phang thob pa'i rten bde 'gror 'god pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3730: bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3731: kun byang gi blang dor shes pa bden bzhi la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3732: bsam pa sems can rnams kyi don la dmigs nas
NK045(bi)002:3733: de dag gi don ji lta ba bzhin du byed
NK045(bi)002:3734: pa'i sems bskyed pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3735: sbyor ba phar phyin drug nyams su len pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3736: sangs rgyas su bgrod pa'i lam dge bcu dang du
NK045(bi)002:3737: len pa sdom pa'i tshul khrims la 'god pa dang
NK045(bi)002:3738: / sbyor lam du stong pa nyid bsgom byung gis rtogs pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3739: mthong lam du gnyis snang gi spros pa zad pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3740: sgom lam sa gnyis pa dang gsum par brda tsam
NK045(bi)002:3741: khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)002:3742: khrims dang bzod pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3743: sa bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa gsum du chos
NK045(bi)002:3744: kun la bden zhen gyis dmigs pa med pa la
NK045(bi)002:3745: 'god pa dang / sa bdun par thabs mkhas kyis
NK045(bi)002:3746: lus can yongs su smin par byed pa la 'god
NK045(bi)002:3747: 'god pa dang / pa dang / sa brgyad par
NK045(bi)002:3748: bsod nams rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam
NK045(bi)002:3749: gyis mtshon pas lam gsum mngon sum du shes pa
NK045(bi)002:3750: 'god pa dang / pa dang / dang / rnam
NK045(bi)002:3751: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes yongs su smin pas
NK045(bi)002:3752: mngon par zhen pa mtha' dag bzlog pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3753: de'i dbang gis byang chub dam pa rtsol med du thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3754: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la dbang ba dang bzhi la 'god do //
NK045(bi)002:3755: sa dgu par sangs rgyas par skye ba gcig gis thob par nges pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3756: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pas
NK045(bi)002:3757: chos bstan pa sogs kyis sems can gyi don tshad
NK045(bi)002:3758: med 'grub pa gnyis la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3759: sa bcu par dbang phul du byung ba thob pas
NK045(bi)002:3760: sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu byon nas sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)002:3761: bsnyen pa dang mchod cing chos nyan pa sogs yon
NK045(bi)002:3762: tan tshad med pa thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3763: byang chub yan lag gi rtogs pa gong du 'phel ba tshad med pa thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3764: tshogs gnyis kyi las rnams chud mi za bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3765: rgya che ba bden bzhi rdzogs par mngon sum mthong ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3766: phyin ci log bzhi zad par spong ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3767: phyin ci log de'i gzhi mtshan 'dzin med pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)002:3768: chos kun mnyam nyid du rtogs pas dri ma rnam par byang ba mchog tu rdzogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3769: tshogs ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3770: 'dus byas 'khor ba dang 'dus ma byas myang 'das
NK045(bi)002:3771: la tha dad par yongs su mi shes pa'am mi
NK045(bi)002:3772: dmigs pa srid zhi mnyam pa nyid slob lam gyi
NK045(bi)002:3773: ye shes mthar thug pa la 'god pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3774: mthar thug gi 'bras bu yongs su mi gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3775: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa ste de
NK045(bi)002:3777: mdor bsdus na lam gyi rten dang lam dang lam
NK045(bi)002:3778: mthar phyin pa 'bras bu la 'god pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)002:3779: nam mkha' dang sems can gyi mtha' ji srid du
NK045(bi)002:3780: phrin las rgyun mi chad par 'jug pa yin no
NK045(bi)002:3781: // de lta bu'i skabs brgyad pa ston pa'i mdo ni skabs 'dir /
NK045(bi)002:3782: yongs dag zhing dang sogs rkang pa gsum ste /
NK045(bi)002:3783: sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa rdo rje lta
NK045(bi)002:3784: bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom pa'i rnam grol gyi
NK045(bi)002:3785: lam la rnam pa thams cad pa'i ye shes kyi
NK045(bi)002:3786: sku spangs rtogs mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i mchog mi
NK045(bi)002:3787: gnas pa'i myang 'das bla na med pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)002:3789: de'i tshe na sku bzhi phrin las dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:3790: 'di ltar gnas gyur mthar thug thob pas zhing khams
NK045(bi)002:3791: yongs su dag pa 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi
NK045(bi)002:3792: pho brang rgya khyon tshad las 'das par /
NK045(bi)002:3793: ye shes kyi sku mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK045(bi)002:3794: dpe byad brgyad cus mdzes par spras pa longs spyod
NK045(bi)002:3795: rdzogs pa chen po'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'i 'khor
NK045(bi)002:3796: du / sems can rgyud yongs su dag pa sa
NK045(bi)002:3797: bcu'i sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa chen
NK045(bi)002:3798: po'i chos bstan pas yongs su smin par mdzad nas
NK045(bi)002:3800: de'i rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyud de dbyings
NK045(bi)002:3801: dang ye shes gnyis su med pa ngo bo nyid
NK045(bi)002:3802: kyi sku / dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad
NK045(bi)002:3803: dang so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i chos
NK045(bi)002:3804: nyid ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin 'dzin par mdzad
NK045(bi)002:3805: kyi sku / pa yin la / de'i thugs ni
NK045(bi)002:3806: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zag pa
NK045(bi)002:3807: med pa'i chos sde tshan nyer gcig gi rgyud dam
NK045(bi)002:3808: rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid chos kyi sku yongs
NK045(bi)002:3809: kyi sku / pa yin la / su 'dzin la
NK045(bi)002:3810: / de nyid gang la gang 'dul du snang ba
NK045(bi)002:3811: sprul pa'i sku sna tshogs par bstan nas /
NK045(bi)002:3812: phyogs bcur theg pa gsum gyi rigs can dge 'dun gyi rgyud yongs su 'dzin zhing /
NK045(bi)002:3813: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi sku brnyes pa
NK045(bi)002:3814: des nam mkha' dang sems can gyi mtha' ji srid
NK045(bi)002:3815: du phrin las nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi tshul gyis
NK045(bi)002:3816: srid pa dang zhi ba'i phan bde'i chos tshul ma
NK045(bi)002:3817: lus pa kun rnam par rtog med yid bzhin nor
NK045(bi)002:3818: bu'i tshul gyis lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'dzin
NK045(bi)002:3819: pa yin no // de la rgyud ces bya ba
NK045(bi)002:3820: ni mi zad pa dang ji snyed pa'i don te
NK045(bi)002:3821: der gtogs pa thams cad bsdu ba yin la /
NK045(bi)002:3822: rnam par dag pa'i gnas gyur pa mthar thug pa brnyes nas /
NK045(bi)002:3823: snod bcud dag pa gang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
NK045(bi)002:3824: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgrengs shing /
NK045(bi)002:3825: dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3826: 'phags pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che rgya cher bsgrags
NK045(bi)002:3827: pa'i sgo nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs sam gdung
NK045(bi)002:3828: rgyun nam rgyud mi 'chad cing phan bde'i chos kun
NK045(bi)002:3829: mi nub par yongs su 'dzin pa yin no zhes
NK045(bi)002:3830: so // mjug sdud gtad pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:3831: 'gro ba'i nad gso sogs sho lo ka gcig ste /
NK045(bi)002:3832: 'di ye shes zhabs kyis phrin las la sbyar te gsungs so //
NK045(bi)002:3833: de ltar skabs brgyad du bstan pa de dag don drug tu bsdus na /
NK045(bi)002:3834: mkhyen gsum gyi ngo bor gyur pa'i mtshan nyid gtan la dbab bya'am bsgom bya dang /
NK045(bi)002:3835: de'i sbyor ba rnam rdzogs dang /
NK045(bi)002:3836: de rab tu gyur pa rtse mo dang /
NK045(bi)002:3837: de'i go rim mthar gyis pa dang /
NK045(bi)002:3838: de'i mtha' skad cig ma'i sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)002:3839: de rnam par smin pa chos sku'i gnas skabs te drug tu bya zhing /
NK045(bi)002:3840: yang na yul gtan la dbab bya mkhyen pa gsum sbyor ba'i rgyu dang /
NK045(bi)002:3841: rnam rdzogs la sogs pa bzhi po sbyor ba dngos dang /
NK045(bi)002:3842: chos sku phrin las dang bcas pa 'bras bu ste gsum du 'adu'o //
NK045(bi)002:3843: de lta bu'i ching gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung 'chad pa ni /
NK045(bi)002:3844: rgyal tshab sems dpa' chen po'i man ngag dang sbyar
NK045(bi)002:3845: bas na zab cing rgya che ba'i don la khyad
