NK045(bi)002:3846: par can gyi nges pa rnyed pa'i sgo yin pas
NK045(bi)002:3848: sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa /
NK045(bi)002:3855: le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ldan pa can nas
NK045(bi)002:3856: sdud pa'i bar gyi yum drug po kun la sbyar
NK045(bi)002:3857: du yod cing / de dag kun gyi snying po
NK045(bi)002:3858: yon tan rin po che sdud pa 'di dang legs
NK045(bi)002:3859: par sbyar bas gzhan la'ang don gyis shes shing zab
NK045(bi)002:3860: rgyas kyi gnad ma lus pa khong du chub par
NK045(bi)002:3861: 'gyur bas na ci nas kyang gus rtag gi brtson
NK045(bi)002:3863: de bzhin gshegs pas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
NK045(bi)002:3864: ngas khyod la ji snyed bstan pa'i chos kun brjed cing nyams par gyur pa las /
NK045(bi)002:3865: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshig zur tsam nyams pa mi rung bas /
NK045(bi)002:3866: de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing drin
NK045(bi)002:3867: du dran pa'i yid kyis sher phyin 'di ma nyams
NK045(bi)002:3868: par zungs zhes gdams par mdzad pa ltar don che
NK045(bi)002:3869: ba'i phyir ro // 'phags pa'i lung gis zab mo'i don la 'jug /
NK045(bi)002:3870: gnad ldan tshig gis yang dag rtogs pa bskyed //
NK045(bi)002:3871: chos mchog legs par bshad rnams rnyed dka' bas //
NK045(bi)002:3872: 'dam las nor bu bzhin du mkhas pas zungs //
NK045(bi)002:3873: lhag bsam dag pas rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras //
NK045(bi)002:3874: gang nas gshegs pa'i lam bzang mtshon phyir du //
NK045(bi)002:3875: gcig tu 'bad pa'i dge tshogs zla 'od ltar //
NK045(bi)002:3876: mchog tu dag pa gang zhig thob pa des //
NK045(bi)002:3877: phyogs dus mu mtha' srid du rgyal ba'i yum //
NK045(bi)002:3878: mi nyams 'dzin pa'i smon lam mthus grub ste //
NK045(bi)002:3879: lhag pa'i lha mchog byams dang 'jam dbyangs kyi //
NK045(bi)002:3880: dgongs pa ji bzhin bdag gis 'grub gyur cig /
NK045(bi)002:3881: ces pa'ang chos tshul 'di la ring nas mos pa'i
NK045(bi)002:3882: mthu brtan pa 'jam dpal dgyes pas rab byung bco
NK045(bi)002:3883: lnga pa mi zad me khyi khrums zla'i nyer lnga
NK045(bi)002:3884: la grub par bgyis pa 'dis bstan pa rin po
NK045(bi)002:3885: che phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig //
NK045(bi)002:3888: snying rje chen pos snyigs ma lnga bdo'i 'gro //
NK045(bi)002:3889: rjes bzung pad dkar ltar basngagasa rgyal ba de'i //
NK045(bi)002:3890: rin chen chos mdzod yongs kyi snying po ni //
NK045(bi)002:3891: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog 'di lags //
NK045(bi)002:3892: nang gi rnal 'byor zab mo'i stobs kho nas //
NK045(bi)002:3893: chos tshul 'di la yid ches mchog thob pa //
NK045(bi)002:3894: ye shes spyan dang ldan pa'i rig 'dzin ni //
NK045(bi)002:3895: 'gro 'dul dpa' bo rdo rje zhes bya ba //
NK045(bi)002:3896: sna tshogs rang sar grol ba'i sngags 'chang des //
NK045(bi)002:3897: rgyal ba mi yi seng ge'i phrin las rgyun //
NK045(bi)002:3898: dus kyi mthar yang mi nyams 'phel ba'i phyir //
NK045(bi)002:3899: thugs bskyed dag pas bskul zhing spar du bsgrubs //
NK045(bi)002:3900: 'di yi legs byas zla 'od kun+da ltar //
NK045(bi)002:3901: mchog tu dag pa'i bdag nyid gang thob pa //
NK045(bi)002:3902: 'khor gsum dmigs pas ma bslad chos dbyings ngang //
NK045(bi)002:3903: thabs mkhas zab mos yongs su bsngo byas pas //
NK045(bi)002:3904: chos tshul 'di la 'brel thogs gtso byas te //
NK045(bi)002:3905: ma lus 'gro ba kun kyang kun bzang dang //
NK045(bi)002:3906: 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK045(bi)002:3907: rnam thar rgya mtshor mnga' dbang 'byor bar shog /
NK045(bi)002:3908: bstan 'dzin dam pa zhabs brtan bzhed pa grub //
NK045(bi)002:3909: bstan pa rin chen phyogs brgyar rgyas pa dang //
NK045(bi)002:3910: mkha' khyab 'gro kun bde zhing chos dang ldan //
NK045(bi)002:3911: kun kyang ye shes chos sku'i gnas thob shog /
NK045(bi)002:3912: rgyal ba nyi ma dam chos 'od zer can //
NK045(bi)002:3913: tshogs mchog pad+ma'i tshal rab rnam rgyas pa //
NK045(bi)002:3914: dge legs nyin mor byed pa'i dpal des ni //
NK045(bi)002:3915: rmad byung bkra shis dpal du 'bar gyur cig //
NK045(bi)002:3916: ces pa'ang rig 'dzin sna tshogs rang grol mchog gis gzhung 'di spar du bsgrub par bzhed pa'i tshe /
NK045(bi)002:3917: spar byang smon tshig tu gzhung rtsom pa po mi
NK045(bi)002:3918: pham rnam par rgyal bas dga' ba chu 'brug gi
NK045(bi)002:3919: lo'i khrums stod zla ba'i tshes gza' rgyu skar dge
NK045(bi)002:3920: ba'i dus kyi char gang shar smras pa dge legs
NK045(bi)002:3921: su gyur cig // ces pa'ang rdzogs sprul lnga pa
NK045(bi)002:3922: thub bstan chos kyi rdo rjes spar du bsgrub dges
NK045(bi)002:3923: 'brel thog ma gyur rnam mkhyen rdzogs byang myur thob
NK045(bi)002:3924: su gyur cig // rgyur gyur cig // mang+ga lam //
